description: Job Description:  ·      Proactively scope the technical solutions required to address customer requirements and challenges, assess customers’ met and unmet needs, and recommends solutions that optimize value for the customer and Hanshow; Monitor deal progress from a pre-sales perspective and keep an open eye on how solutions can be maximized in customer and commercial value; 主动确定解决客户需求所需的技术解决方案的范围，评估客户满足和未满足的需求，并推荐能为客户和汉朔优化价值的解决方案；从售前的角度监控交易进度，并关注如何最大程度地提高客户和商业价值的解决方案持； ·      Facilitate and provide workshops, as well as create high Level visionary demos and building and validating value scenarios as well as selling and communicating concepts. Present solution, capabilities and credentials in proposal defense meetings and customer discussions; 促进和提供研讨会，创建高水平、有远见的演示，并建立和验证价值方案以及销售和交流概念。在提案答辩会议和客户讨论中提供解决方案，功能和凭据； ·      Deliver RFx responses and create customer proposals and POC; 传递RFx响应并制作客户proposals和POC； ·      Pro-actively build and keep knowledge and skills up to date; 主动建立并保持知识和技能的最新状态； ·      Coordinate closely with sales and service resources to align solution design with customers’ business requirements; Enable the sales team to position Infrastructure management services solution proactively; 与内部销售，销售支持和服务资源紧密协调，以使解决方案设计与客户的业务需求保持一致；使销售团队能够主动定位基础架构管理服务解决方案； ·      Meet assigned targets for profitable sales growth in assigned product lines, market areas, channel, or teams supported; 在分配的产品线，市场区域，渠道或支持的团队中实现分配的利润增长目标； ·      Provide coaching and professional development to team members and pre-sales associates in order to enhance their product knowledge, technical acumen, and technical sales skills. 为团队成员售前同事提供指导和专业发展，以增强他们的产品知识，技术敏锐度和技术销售技能。  Job Qualifications: ·      At least Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electronics, Telecommunication or related fields; 至少具有计算机科学，电子，电信或相关领域的本科学位； ·      From 3 – 5 years of related experience; 3-5年相关经验； ·      As we attentive to your work-life balance, we offer flexible work rules (depending on your function) and we will ensure the well-being and safety of our employees; 考虑到您的工作与生活的平衡，我们提供灵活的，远程办公（取决于您的工作安排），并确保员工的健康和安全； ·      Commonly use Gantt charts, MySQL, Microsoft tools such as MS project, MS excel, MS power point, MS Visio etc.; 熟练地使用甘特图，MySQL，Microsoft工具（例如MS Projects，MS excel，MS Power Point，MS Visio等软件； ·      Have at least one of skills in Linux operating system except Windows, and have relevant experience; 掌握Windows以外的Linux操作系统中至少一种技能，并具有相关经验； ·      You are dynamic, stress-resistant and a team player; 您是充满活力，抗压和团队合作精神的人； ·      You can coordinate multiple projects at the same time and are good at assessing risks; 您可以同时协调多个项目，并且擅长评估风险； ·      Ability to participate in multi-lingual meetings, good communication skills; 能够参加多语言会议，具有良好的沟通能力； ·      Language: Chinese, English, Spanish (only for South America) 语言：中文，英语，西班牙语（只针对南美区） ·      Have the ability to build and expand the network with customers; 与客户建立和扩展网络的能力； ·      Have project management skills to drive initiatives to the required outcome; 拥有推动计划取得所需成果的项目管理技巧； ·      You love and understanding for technology; 对技术的热爱与理解； ·      Have eagerness to Learn. 拥有学习的热情； ·      Driving license is preferred 拥有驾照的优先。  About Hanshow：  Founded in 2012, Hanshow is a leading provider of ESL and smart store solutions serving traditional retail, new retail, pharmacies, department stores, fashion, health care, and the entertainment industries, etc. We provide ESL and smart store solutions in 12,000+ stores in 50+ countries. Hanshow is a trusted partner among retailers worldwide. We strive to enhance the shopping experience by developing cutting edge technology and providing services to solve our clients' in-store challenges. Our innovative spirit begins with our global team, improves the way we operate, and ultimately helps us deliver compelling end-to-end solutions.   汉朔(Hanshow)是全球领先的数字化门店解决方案提供商，具备自主研发创新、软硬件方案集成及全产业链资源整合的能力。公司成立于2012年，总部位于浙江嘉兴，研发与管理中心位于北京，主要服务于传统零售、新零售、百货时尚、医药健康、文化娱乐等领域。随着零售行业多元化发展，汉朔基于对零售及互联网领域变革的深刻理解，始终坚持以创新与研发为核心驱动，通过提供数字化、高效率、重体验的门店解决方案及服务，帮助客户建立核心竞争优势。 目前，汉朔已为全球超过50个国家和地区、12000多家门店提供电子价签产品及数字化门店解决方案，国内零售百强占有率超60%。   Website: https://www.hanshow.com/ Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hanshow

Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 产品专家  主要职责  保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。  通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友宣传特斯拉。  收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销售主管完成门店的销售目标。  对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 ? 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。  认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。  建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。  通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和要求。  和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地区、跨地区之间）。  员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。  其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。  职位要求  应届毕业生或1到2年零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验；  对企业文化高度认可。  出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。  良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的变革。  深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 ? 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。  能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。  持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

工作职责:  Job Description Summary  As a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets. GE Product & Market awareness Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition. Compliance Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required. 任职条件:  Qualifications / Requirements Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience. 2 years of strategic sales experience. 2 years experience in healthcare. Proven key account management and project planning skills. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact. Quality Specific Goals Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, colour, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: Senior Sales Specialist – Shanghai  Location: Shanghai  Department: AsiaPac Analytics - HK & North Asia  The Portfolio Analytics Group is responsible for the company’s portfolio and quantitative analytic applications. Typically, the primary market for these products is Investment Managers, but certainly any organization with a portfolio management or quantitative analytics component could also be considered a prospective client.  The ideal candidate will be highly technical, intellectually curious, possess strong interpersonal and presentation skills and be motivated to help FactSet maintain its position as the market leader in the portfolio, quant and risk analytics space.  Primary Responsibilities Help drive new business and achieve sales targets for the year Become an expert in portfolio management, risk analytics and quant workflows along with FactSet’s corresponding product offering Defend and drive revenue across user base Manage client engagement and relationships Travel extensively to meet with clients and prospects in China As part of the Group, the successful applicant will be expected to work towards a personal and group target, contributing across the board as regards client contact, internal & external training and product development and awareness. The job will include product demonstration and product trial management, cross-group presentations and conference attendance.  Requirements Native Mandarin speaker and fluent in English Minimum 5 years’ experience working in or selling to the buy-side. Demonstrate ability to identify new prospects, and build and maintain solid client relationships Good knowledge of investment management workflows, applications and challenges Willingness to learn portfolio applications, the underlying calculations and related theories Independent worker who will take initiative in all aspects of the role Excellent communication and presentation skills Willingness and ability to travel Strong coding skills is a plus CFA charter candidate is a plus

2022 Global Management Trainee(GMT) Program Location: Shanghai/上海   Program Information  We can only grow at the pace of our talent. The GMT program will prepare you for a fast-track career at Budweiser APAC. It’s part of our drive to recruit, develop & retain people better than ourselves. We believe in investing in our future leaders today. Through an intensive rotational training program, in-depth exposure to our business operations, and relevant experiences right from the beginning, our program is designed to fast-track the careers of future leaders and change-makers. The GMT program takes place over 15-18 months. Throughout the program, GMTs will gain a 360 view of the business while holding roles in both our Supply (Brewery) and Commercial (Sales & Marketing) organizations, as well as flexing creative and analytical muscles through project work in an area of interest.  Our GMT Program Highlights: Rotational Program To develop a deep understanding of our business, you will be immersed into functional areas such as Sales & Marketing, and Operations & Logistics during a 15-18 months period. Global Induction Your experience will begin with an induction to our company’s culture, vision, and strategy. You’ll join other trainees from around the world and meet our CEO and senior leaders. On-the-Job Experience We know you are a high-achiever and want to be allowed to have a real impact on our business. Being a GMT, you will be able to achieve this from day one. Fast Career Growth with Senior Leadership Exposure  Your training is just the foundation. Your first role is where you’ll make a difference, and the rest of your career at Budweiser APAC is where you will leave your mark and have an impact. From entry-level to Zone President, everyone has a seat at the table and is expected to bring their best every single day.   Qualifications  You’ll need to be ambitious, curious, bold, and resilient, ready to take on tough challenges, and be determined to deliver results. We’re looking for a global mindset and a desire to connect with people at all levels. We prize a sense of ownership and a desire to make an impact. You own your future, and the speed of your career growth will depend on your talent, efforts, and results.  Minimum Requirements: Students graduating between August 1, 2021, and July 31st, 2022 in China or between January 1, 2021 to July 31, 2022 for students studying overseas; Bachelor degree at least, preferably in Science, Technology, Engineering, Business or related degree; Work authorization in the country for which application is being submitted Geographical mobility High proficiency in both written and oral English Quickly adapt to the new environment  Ideal Profile: Innovative and strategic Strong data analytical and logical skills Cross-functional interest Ambitious and self-driven Adaptive, comfortable with ambiguity Ability to effectively manage several projects at the same time Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment Strong leadership and influencing skills  Employment Type Full-time
industries: Consumer Goods, Food & Beverages, and Wine and Spirits

Careers that Change Lives  A Day in the Life  Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned. Promotes and sells Medtronic's products and services within an assigned geographic area and /or specific customer accounts to meet or exceed sales targets. Responsible for developing, building, and strengthening long-term relationships with stakeholders including distributors and healthcare professionals. Responsible for pursuing leads, assessing needs and providing product services to maximize the benefits derived from Medtronic's products and/or services. Promotes and establishes education of the company's products and/or services. Conducts market research including customers and competitors activities. Implements market development plans/strategies and changes as needed. Communicates customer feedback on new products and/or modifications to existing products or applications to internal stakeholders including R&D, Operations and Marketing. Must Have: Minimum Requirements Bachelors degree required Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience and working knowledge of company products and services Nice to Have  About Medtronic  Together, we can change healthcare worldwide. At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology, therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life. We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday. It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.  We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives. Help us shape the future.  Physical Job Requirements  The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)  Additional Information Posting Date: Jul 20, 2021 Travel: No

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  You will be responsible for developing and implementing a sales plan for assigned channel/distributor aimed at achieving and exceeding sales turnover and financial return, within the most cost-effective route and time-frame. Target new business accounts and opportunities as well as existing customers.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Primary Responsibilities: Develop and implement a sales plan for assigned channel/distributor aimed at achieving and exceeding sales turnover and financial return, within the most cost-effective route and time-frame. Target new business accounts and opportunities as well as existing customers Actively manage the relationship with the assigned distributor to ensure alignment with company objectives Proceed distributor/channel with the support & information needed to facilitate their effectiveness Developing and managing regional KOL, build regional product strategy Maintain a high level of technical and commercial competence on relevant products, techniques and applications. Accurately forecast sales and growth opportunities within designated territory. Prepare and participate in business reviews/forecasts for Regional Sales Management, to ensure a constant flow of information between Channel/Distributor and the Company. Maintain an awareness of competitor activities and developments and ensure that this information is collected and made available to the Regional Sales Manager. Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for business decision. Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE. Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers. 任职条件:  Qualifications Required Minimum 2 years relevant healthcare industry experience or minimum 3 years customer management experience Bachelor's degree or a minimum of 3 years of account management/development experience. A proven track-record of achieving and exceeding sales targets, and a desire to grow new business Experience and understanding customer needs and business drivers and using this knowledge to develop account plans and strategies (knowledge of the existing account areas/channels would be advantageous). Excellent interpersonal skills including, teamworking skills and good communication skills Persistence and tenacity in developing prospects and customers, and able to close business Strong presentation, analytical and customer service skills Self-starter able to manage time and organize and prioritize workload Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

VACANCY REFERENCE NUMBER 125345  Please note that Evonik will not accept any unsolicited application documents sent by staffing firms. Develop new customers in the territory. Establish close relationship with purchasing department. Coordinate sales order, logistics, and potential inventory management Provide primary source of market/customer intelligence to assist business development strategy and to maximize company competitiveness and success. Communicate current and evolving customer needs to assist Research and Development strategy. Prepare and implement sales forecasts in association with management to maximize product line sales and business development. Identify promotional and other marketing support needs. Contribute to Marketing Plan development. Support trade show promotion by attendance at industry related meetings. Manage the Technical Support in the Territory Provide on-site technical support to customers, helping them implement PKI technology, migrate assays from therapeutic areas to HTS. Provide technical support and training by phone and e-mail to Chinese customers for all PKI products Generate and maintain demonstration reports and monthly customer feedback reports to provide record of technical development work on behalf of customers Critical Success Factors Technical Skills A science degree in a relevant field, Master of Biological Sciences or Ph.D. desirable A minimum of three years experience working in a customer technical support, sales roles or Assay Development/High Throughput Screening within the HTS market, with proven success In depth knowledge of theoretical and applied PKI technology A solid understanding of the industry and market conditions affecting the territory/product line(s) Strong Computer skills, including Usage of Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point and Graph Pad Prism Core Competencies Strong leadership skills High level of initiative and self motivation Excellent negotiating skills Ability to effectively manage time and priorities Aptitude to learn new systems and retain technical information Commitment to customer excellence principles Demonstrated ethics and integrity Ability to work with limited supervision Commitment to continuous improvement principles Excellent communication skills including the ability to articulate and transfer information Proven ability to implement positive change Highly effective time management skills for self and team Strong communication skills both written and oral are also needed. Fluent in English (reading, writing, and speaking). Creativity and flexibility Working Conditions BSL1 lab environment including BSL2 cell culture facility Drug discovery/screening systems Home office Travel: 50%

The ideal candidate will lead the account development and penetration strategy for assigned customers or regions. They should be skilled at building and maintaining relationships with clients and work to provide exceptional customer service to clients.  Location: Tianjin, Hebei or Beijing  Responsibilities Selling Synventive Molding Solutions products to new and existing customers. Communicate customer wants and needs to the organization. Forecast upcoming sales. Providing customer and competitor market information. Promoting teamwork between Sales, Service, and Operations through professional communication. Other tasks assigned by Regional Manager.  Qualifications Bachelor degree or above, Injection molding background. At least 5 years working experience in Automotive industrial. Hot runner hands on skills preferred. Injection molding molds design and injection molding knowledge needed. Communication and interpersonal skills. Microsoft outlook, word, excel, etc. skills. Written and oral English.

SUCCEED IN OUR  Experienced Team  INEOS Styrolution is the leading global styrenics supplier, with a focus on styrene monomer, polystyrene, ABS Standard and styrenic specialties. With world-class production facilities and more than 90 years of experience, INEOS Styrolution helps its customers succeed by offering innovative and sustainable best-in-class solutions, designed to give them a competitive edge in their markets, and at the same time, help make the circular economy for styrenics a reality. The company provides styrenic applications for many everyday products across a broad range of industries, including automotive, electronics, household, construction, healthcare, packaging and toys/sports/leisure. In 2019, sales were at 5 billion euros. INEOS Styrolution employs approximately 3,600 people and operates 20 production sites in ten countries.  We are looking for a  Sales Account Manager  Shanghai , China (CN)   Purpose /Role of the job： Supports the global/regional key account business/transplants in East China. Maintain key account sales & service within the territory. Business develop in Key accounts, explore new business opportunity; develop Electronics & Household customers and new applications to achieve even beyond the existing sales target.   Environment/Context/Complexity of the job: Internal: Account managers, CSO, Plant QC, R&D, Technical Managers, RHQ External: Customers, compounding service providers, distributors, test centers, Associations  Responsibilities/ Accountabilities of the job: Key Result Areas : East China Key account business activity Major Activities Operational actions for E&H EC and global key account local support. Develops & reviews contractual agreements, supply chain & product flow concepts & service - partner management for E&H business. Outcome  Deliver annual target CM1 result at premium margins and direct/guide local E&H key account managers. Key Result Areas : Maintain existing business (East China) Major Activities Communication with existing customers and regular visit to ensure order collection follow customers’ inquires Maintain all technical and service record and case history on customer sales. Maintain good relationship with customer related key persons to stable business share Outcome  Achieve target of sales volume and profit Key Result Areas : Business Development (East China) Major Activities Work with Key account managers to scout the market trend to seek new business chances both for customers and Styrolution. Coordinate customers' seminars to promote new products and solutions from Styrolution. Contact related industry associations to collect market and industry information Identify and visit potential customers and lead the development process until business achieved Outcome  Open up new business successfully Key Result Areas : Technical consultant Major Activities Verify the customers’ complaint on site, and contact internal and external related parties to lead the whole process until problems solved. Serve customers’ concern such as material selection, process optimization, mould optimization, etc. Manage local compounding service providers in the region to ensure them delivering qualified service and products to end customers Outcome  Solve customers’ technical related issues and achieve sales target Key Result Areas : Reporting Major Activities Obtain, update and evaluate market of responsible customer/industry on time sales activity report, forecast or any requested report accurately and punctually GKA business support and reporting. Outcome  Make management understanding market / customers for decision making   Required profile: Level Of Education & Knowledge Bachelor degree, preferably Polymer Science and Engineering Experience In General Min. 5 years in plastics industry related technical service, business development etc. Preferably having work experience in an international company Technical Skills Fundamental knowledge about polymers and polymerization process Plastics processing trouble shooting. Fluent in English and Chinese, both writing and speaking Competencies, Behavioral Skills Strong customer focus Very good negotiation skills Good interpersonal and presentation skills For more information please contact Sally Lu.  INEOS Styrolution Polymers (Shanghai) Co. Ltd., 25F, Central Towers, 567 Langao Road - Putuo District, Shanghai 200333, P.R.China  #Business Management

Cooperate with Commerce Department and finance department to review the orders of agents, coordinate the order entry system, urge the payment collection and delivery.  7. Improve employee engagement in team with leadership and achieve the target with measurable planning.  8. Facilitate the sales activities and monitor the sales performance of dealers, including daily dealer management.     Person Specification：     1. College degree or above, major in medical equipment or medicine is preferred  2. With 3 years above sales experience in government field with experience in channel sales management and end customer management  3. Good communication skill  4. Good English and computer skills

description: Responsibilities Manage the customer’s Tesla experience in the most positive way. Welcome all walk in guests, answer questions and enthusiastically educate all customers and fans about the benefits of going electric, generally publicize going electric knowledge. Responsible for collecting qualified customer information, assist market events, explore customer needs, stimulate customer demand, cooperate with Owner Advisor to meet store’s sales target. Provide high quality service to existing Tesla owner community. Help Tesla enthusiasts and future owners stay up to speed with Tesla by promoting company’s updated news. Employee must learn about the company and products related knowledge, keep up with industry trends and best practices Develop amazing customer relationships on the sales floor and during test-drive experiences to ultimately create a brand experience customers will recommend to their friends. Competency certification, Probation Review, otherwise he or she will not be able to meet the full time employee’s requirement. Communicate with the external clients and partners in a professional way, and also ensure effective communication and great cooperation with internal colleagues (Among same and different function/ store/region). Keep inventory full and neat (if applicable). Other Responsibilities: Perform other related duties as assigned, based on the business need. Requirements Fresh graduate or 1-2 years’ work experience in retail, industry and key account sales with proven track record to meet or exceed targets and goals. Highly appreciate Company culture and value. Strong communication and customer service experience required. Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry and key account sales experience preferred. During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is required to pass the probationary period. Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 主要职责 保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。 通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友宣传特斯拉。 收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销售主管完成门店的销售目标。 对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。 认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。 建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。 通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和要求。 和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地区、跨地区之间）。 保持库存充足和整洁（如适用）。 员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。 职位要求 应届毕业生或1到2年零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验； 对企业文化高度认可。 出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。 良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的变革。 深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。 能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。 持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

工作职责:  Job Description Summary  As a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets. GE Product & Market awareness Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition. Compliance Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required. 任职条件:  Qualifications / Requirements Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience. 2 years of strategic sales experience. 2 years experience in healthcare. Proven key account management and project planning skills. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact. Quality Specific Goals Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: As a Retail Partner Specialist E-Commerce you will be responsible for driving the growth of Stokke’s retailer.com route to market in the APAC region. Through you deep knowledge in the fields of digital marketing and e-commerce, you will proactively enable key accounts to optimize their online performance. Plan, execute, and scale global initiatives in your region and be a part of the E-Commerce organization, representing APAC in our global setup.  The position is located in Shanghai, China.  Some of the key responsibilities are the following: Main point of contact / expert for key account managers and beyond Developing Stokke’s presence and performance on retailer.com Roll-out of retailer.com initiatives, including end-to-end implementation and follow-up Facilitation of joint business plans with key account managers and beyond Distribution of content and product data Monitoring and evaluation of retailers’ performance and derivation of recommendations Creation of best-practice examples Moderation of digital marketing and e-commerce workshop, and on-site retailer visits  Requirements: Commercial education on Bachelor or Master level Profound understanding of the digital landscape in the APAC region (WeChat, TMALL, Rakuten and others) Several years of experience with Key Account Management within international online consumer sales Strong interpersonal and communication skills, both verbal and written: Fluent English and Mandarin language skills, Japanese is an advantage Excellent analytical and project management skills Passion about Stokke’s mission in support early childhood development, sustainability, and timeless Scandinavian design  Why join Stokke? You will be a part of a company that creates smart and sustainable premium products, that through bonding between child and parent stimulate the child’s development Stokke is an advocate for ethical trade practices and ensures that our business connections take part in a joint responsibility If you want to commit to create high quality products, designed for children and generations to come, we want you to be a part of our team Stokke offers an extensive benefit package to its employees

jobTitle: Sales Executive II, Central & West China
location: Oil Field Orchard Team, Hubei, China
description: Location:  Field Based, CN  Brand: RS Components  Function: Sales  Role Purpose  Responsibility for optimising sales income from assigned portfolios, an RS Key Account Manager strives to become the first point of contact for a customer to address all their purchasing and service requirements. Primary focus is on building effective relationships within a specified group of key accounts to gain a clear understanding of current and future needs and drive significant incremental sales.  Key Accountabiities  To effectively use the RS value proposition to differentiate RS from our competitors in the minds of their contacts; Provide solutions to meet customer needs by the implementation of relevant and cost-effective value added services ; Partner with Internal Sales closely to identify and build up clients’ needs and strategy to achieve company goals in responsible field ； Develop and execute sales plan for key accounts ； Maintain and further grow exiting customers, while developing new markets to expand business mainly via off line, such as frequent customer visit, or organize customer onsite Roadshow and/or In-House Seminar for contacts expansion and cross-selling, especially for RS Pro brand and/or Anchor Supplier Brands ; Maintain accurate customer records, and can well leverage CRM database as one of the key channels to main and manage sales; Work closely with Internal Sales & Technical Support to develop specific accounts, quotation and fulfill orders ； Work with Customer Service to provide excellent customer service experience, and to raise customer satisfaction rate (NPS); To continually expand relevant technical knowledge and to develop an understanding of the RS product and service portfolio, their application in key areas and the benefits they provide to customers. Complete any other top-down task from company, such as participating product training, marketing campaign, CI projects, EH&S, and etc.; Responsible for AR collection with support from finance team; Share best practice across the business in order to support the activities of the team whilst achieving individual goals and targets. Provide monthly reports to include data on performance against sales targets and key metrics Issue, follow up and convert profitable quotations  Person Specification  5-10 years sales experience in MRO or Electronics industry with vision on industry development; Result driven, target-oriented, diligent with self-motivated to finish field billing target; Accept frequent travel and work under pressure; Strong verbal and written communication skill and a good team player; Familiar with software tool like excel, PPT, ERP (CRM, SAP, 销售易 ), etc.; Technical background is preferred, or equivalent approved experience working with customer technical peer. English: CET 6 preferred College degree or above

Support Business director / Sales Manager to formulate the sales plan and acitivites in accordance with local strategy, and identify market-specific needs, trends and opportunities for business growh. Maintain the network of cooperative relationship with business partners (dealers) and customers Prepare regular sales performance analysis, forecasts, and identify critical issues. Explore new accounts/business opportunities to build Strykers‘customer pool Prepare reports on market trends, consumer habits, competitor information on a monthly basis Compile customers‘feedback to drive high quality service and to expand business portfolio Education & Experience Degree holder in medicine or medical, or sales and marketing related area At least 3 years‘ relevant experience in medical devices or healthcare industry Prefer experience in, or direct exposure to, the healthcare product or medical device industry. Proven record in channel management Physical & Mental Requirements Excellent problem solving & interpersonal skills Results-oriented with good negotiation &communications skill Strong business acumen Demonstrated ability to build and maintain key business relationships internally and externally. Demonstrated ability to work both collaboratively and independently in a cross-functional and team-oriented environment

description: Responsibilities 根据全国产品销售计划和区域市场的情况，执行公司的区域销售策略； 完成区域销售指标，树立产品和公司的品牌形象； 维护和开发区域专家；向医生传递和培训相关产品的信息，确保医生能深入了解公司产品特性； 管理并培训相关的经销商，确保经销商团队对产品有深入了解； Basic Qualifications 本科或以上学历，医学检验、或者临床、诊断背景； 5年以上大型或合资器械企业的销售及销售管理工作经验； 扎实的临床或者检验领域知识； 熟悉CM产品佳； 具有较好的医生教育知识和经验； 较好的经销商管理能力； 优秀的分析，沟通及解决问题的能力； 优秀的表达和人际能力。

Design solutions to drive safe living and quality of life  Be the front line seller who drives sales, identifying and generating opportunities for different kinds of customers. You will foster client satisfaction by maintaining regular customer contact and managing customer expectations. You will develop customer relationships through attending trade shows, seminar, and similar events. You will provide education of Honeywell product through technical presentations, seminars and workshops. You will maintain, and provide reports and opportunity status using our customer relationship management system. You will provide competitive intelligence and market trends. You will provide forecast/demand input to Sales Inventory Operations Planning (SIOP). jobTitle: Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , Hubei
description: Work is no longer a place. It’s what you do. And how you do it. More fluid, more flexible, powered by your imagination and by some amazing technology! That’s where we come in. We’re Poly. We’re a global outfitter of pro-grade audio and video technology so that employees everywhere can look and sound their best from anywhere. Join us as we pursue our disruptive vision to bring professional audio and video meeting technology and services to everyone. Be a part of our journey!  As an Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , (ICAM) you will work as part of our APAC Inside Sales Team. You will workwithin a defined geographical territory, ( Mainland China) and initiate, own and close sales opportunities on Products and New Service through interacting with a nominated set of Poly Channel Partners , as well as being responsible for the successful on-boarding, development and retention of such Partners.  You will be expected to generate and drive a sufficient pipeline of deals to ensure financial targets are met.  The role requires an active cooperation with multiple departments in Poly and so relationship building, and people skills are essential.  主要职责： 根据公司业务方向，开拓三四级城市渠道 渠道认证：渠道客户的选择、认证； 新产品上市的渠道规划与沟通； 管理负责渠道中 Poly耳机音频和视频业务，完成公司销售目标 完成负责渠道的策略和任务规划 善于利用和整合资源，促进不同团队合作，共同高效完成业绩目标 职位要求： 有一定的 IT 行业渠道销售经验优先 优秀的沟通、协作、谈判能力 勤奋，能够在快节奏的环境中工作和成长 2 年以上相关销售工作经验 全日制本科及以上学历，英语可作为工作语言优先 Our Culture  At Poly, leadership principles aren't just something we talk about, they're something we live and breathe. We believe in creating a work environment where people feel empowered, supported, and included –where trust and transparency are built into the way we work - where creativity, curiosity, and continuous improvement are encouraged and nurtured every day. C3 – Customer. Customer. Customer: Customer obsession is everyone’s job. You enjoy solving customers’ problems - big or small. You work closely with customers, channel partners and their teams to deliver innovative solutions. Raise the Bar: You take pride in your work and know details matter. You know that shavings make a pile. You seek every opportunity to continuously improve teams, products, and processes. Communicate Courageously: You speak with candor but aren't a jerk. You constructively challenge your teammates to get to the best possible outcome or decision. Once a decision is made, you fully align and stay aligned. Onward and Upward: You learn from the past but focus on the future. You rapidly adapt to changes in the marketplace. You help to create solutions that move the company forward with energy, momentum, and results. Own It: You know your business, your customers, and your team – inside and out. You don't sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. You act with integrity, spend money like it’s your own, and put Poly first. Take the Leap: Speed matters in business. You encourage and require those around you to think strategically and act decisively. Poly values calculated risk taking. Ride Together: We are one team. We do what we say we’ll do, we treat each other with respect, we have each other’s back, and we hold each other accountable. Leaders Lead: You know you are part of a larger global community and make decisions as good stewards of the earth, its resources and its people. Our Commitment as an Equal Opportunity Employer  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, race, age, religious creed, national origin, physical or mental disability, ancestry, color, marital status, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, medical condition, genetic information, accessibility needs, or any other protected class or category recognized by applicable equal employment opportunity or other similar laws.  No matter where you’re based, you’ll experience a company that believes that teamwork and collaboration drive maximum impact, seeks well-rounded talent to focused on providing the best customer experience, and understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint. And, top of mind to us is continuously and purposefully building an inclusive culture that empowers all of our team members, across the globe, to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.

description: Every day, Global Payments makes it possible for millions of people to move money between buyers and sellers using our payments solutions for credit, debit, prepaid and merchant services. Our worldwide team helps over 3 million companies, more than 1,300 financial institutions and over 600 million cardholders grow with confidence and achieve amazing results. We are driven by our passion for success and we are proud to deliver best-in-class payment technology and software solutions. Join our dynamic team and make your mark on the payments technology landscape of tomorrow.  JD Pending  Global Payments Inc. is an equal opportunity employer.  Global Payments provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), national origin, ancestry, age, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, veteran status, genetic information or any other basis protected by law. Those applicants requiring reasonable accommodation to the application and/or interview process should notify a representative of the Human Resources Department.

description: 职位目的： 识别，确认和获取相关产品的销售机会。结合当前不断发展的客户需求，创建和管理销售和市场计划 利用标准程序和流程建立和执行销售计划和技术支持。维护并增进已有的客户关系 Purpose of Job： Identify, qualify and close sales opportunities in related products. Create and manage sales and marketing initiatives, incorporating current and evolving customer requirements. Utilize standard procedures and processes to establish and execute both sales plan and technical support. Maintain and improve customer relationship 工作职责： 根据公司要求以及相关市场策略及时完成各自的销售指标、有效利用自己的能力以及公司资源独立开发新市场、新客户； 维护并增进已有的客户关系； 与指定区域的经销商紧密合作，管理和监督经销商的业务结果和业务能力 向客户（终端用户）推广公司的产品及提供服务。 与服务团队紧密协作，协助维修工程师和应用支持专员安装仪器、技术支持，确保客户满意度 开展客户技术交流，收集市场和行业信息 完成上级领导交代的其他项目。 Key Responsibilities Achieve Sales target assigned by company, develop new customer and market for responsible products, maintain and improve customer relationships Work closely with distributors, manage and monitor distributor’s sales performance and capabilities Promote company products and services to the customers (end users) Work closely with service team, coordinate instrument installation and application solutions with service engineer and application specialist to ensure customer satisfaction Carry out technical communication with customers, collect market and industry information Complete other tasks assigned by line manager 任职条件： 医学检验或者生物医药相关专业背景本科以上 3年以上医疗行业一线销售工作经验，熟悉分子/免疫/小化学发光类产品者优先 良好的沟通能力，积极主动，以及团队精神 Bachelor’s degree of clinical diagnostics or Bio-pharmaceutical related At least 3 years sales experience in medical industry Good communication, Be proactive and team sprit

该职位来源于猎聘  Responsibilities Drive the sales strategy for the team Drive Consultancy Sales and proactively create demand within the account. Coordinate the sales process within the sales team. Manage business development efficiency related to deals in the account. Shape and close deals, working collaboratively with the Client Service Lead and LOBs’ Lead. Provide oversight for the account’s most critical and/or complex opportunities: Lead negotiations. Contribute to management of client expectations by setting the initial expectations effectively. Drive cross-LOBs services sales within the account, defining sales strategies, capabilities and references to support the expansion of application maintenance and managed services of EDMS. Close the loop by providing feedback to service and/or product offering teams around competitive intelligence and product/service innovation. Qualifications Bachelor or master degree on Technology related. Familiar with international financial institution working style and culture, ability to engage these stakeholders effectively 10 years or more sales experience in IT or ICT services industry with 2-3 years or more sales experience focusing on key account. Sales team management experience with solid sales performance. Excellent professional business discipline Key account/client domain knowledge Ability to strategies sales strategy Good sales acumen Good Communication skills Understand and ability to apply social styles technique to manage stakeholders

说明  What You Will Do In Your Role To be expert of assigned OEM account and expert of TSBU, knowing well TSBU technologies, products, organizations, process, etc…), represent TSBU in front of customer. Acting as communication channel between TSBU and sales force. Also leader and coordinator for platform design-in opportunities. Conduct Product trainings/introductions to customers/sales team/distribution team. Build relationship with OEM core team, especially connector related. Filter out real opportunities and work with Sales team to create CRM opportunities and support the New CRM opportunities to be Won. Collect information or conduct survey at specified OEM for Connector Technical Requirements/Specifications/Design Trends and Market trends information. Analyze relative information, develop and initiate new development opportunities. Create strategy in terms of TSBU revenue and profit growth, lead team to execute to achieve the goal. Ensure Molex advanced technology and products being introduced and accepted by OEM to generate more opportunities, taking necessary actions to secure a Molex existing business. Performs other related duties as assigned by management. The Experience You Will Bring  Requirements EDUCATION: Bachelor degree in Business or Technical area of study. WORK EXPERIENCE: 6-10 years experience as a Product Manager, Product marketing specialist, Sales Manager, Sales engineer, Product Engineering Manager, Product engineer or Project Manager at connector company for automotive industry or Automotive tier 1 including device maker and harness maker. SKILLS & ABILITIES: Familiar with automotive connector industry (basic knowledge, industry standard, OEM requirement). Strong business/market sense and negotiation skills to achieve business goal/solve problem for win-win scenario. Strong analytic and executive ability with clear strategic direction, able to lead team to create plan and implement with positive result English. Communication skill by which can express the opinions and facts accurately to Internally/Externally. Know well about OEM. OTHER: Be willing to travel to customers and other Molex locations frequently as needed. What Will Put You Ahead EDUCATION: Master Degree. WORK EXPERIENCE: Automotive Industry Experience Connector Industry Experience. SKILLS & ABILITIES: SAP. Commercial experience with Cost Analysis and Quote Development.

description: Responsibilities Manage the customer’s Tesla experience in the most positive way. Welcome all walk in guests, answer questions and enthusiastically educate all customers and fans about the benefits of going electric, generally publicize going electric knowledge. Responsible for collecting qualified customer information, assist market events, explore customer needs, stimulate customer demand, cooperate with Owner Advisor to meet store’s sales target. Provide high quality service to existing Tesla owner community. Help Tesla enthusiasts and future owners stay up to speed with Tesla by promoting company’s updated news. Employee must learn about the company and products related knowledge, keep up with industry trends and best practices Develop amazing customer relationships on the sales floor and during test-drive experiences to ultimately create a brand experience customers will recommend to their friends. Competency certification, Probation Review, otherwise he or she will not be able to meet the full time employee’s requirement. Communicate with the external clients and partners in a professional way, and also ensure effective communication and great cooperation with internal colleagues (Among same and different function/ store/region). Keep inventory full and neat (if applicable). Other Responsibilities: Perform other related duties as assigned, based on the business need. Requirements Fresh graduate or 1-2 years’ work experience in retail, industry and key account sales with proven track record to meet or exceed targets and goals. Highly appreciate Company culture and value. Strong communication and customer service experience required. Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry and key account sales experience preferred. During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is required to pass the probationary period. Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 产品专家  主要职责 保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。 通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友宣传特斯拉。 收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销售主管完成门店的销售目标。 对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。 认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。 建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。 通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和要求。 和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地区、跨地区之间）。 保持库存充足和整洁（如适用）。 员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。 职位要求 应届毕业生或1到2年零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验； 对企业文化高度认可。 出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。 良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的变革。 深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。 能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。 持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

Make an impact. Build the career you’ve always wanted. Join our team and experience more.  What’s In It For You  Ecolab is seeking an Administrative Assistant to support senior management and team members. In this role, you will participate in various projects and activities and provide advanced administrative support to leaders and the business. We are looking for a driven and resourceful Administrative Assistant who wants to work in an exciting and challenging environment. The job responsibilities for the Administrative Assistant would include (but are not limited to): The opportunity to take on some of the world’s most meaningful challenges, helping customers achieve clean water, safe food, abundant energy and healthy environments The ability to make an impact and shape your career with a company that is passionate about growth The support of an organization that believes it is vital to include and engage diverse people, perspectives and ideas to achieve our best What You Will Do Coordinate meeting logistics, including reserving conference rooms, equipment setup, and creation of presentations and preparing meeting materials Pull reports and information from Ecolab systems Calendar management across time zones Manage financial administrative tasks related to corporate card use and expenses and manage accurate processing of departmental invoices Coordinate domestic and international travel arrangements including processing of visas for international travel Provide support with HR related items including hiring, on-boarding, promotions & transfers, terminations, talent planning, salary adjustments, tracking of recruitment activities, etc. Compile and edit presentation details from multiple people and sources; Distribute reports to stakeholders Prepare and maintain agendas, action item lists, issues lists and program plans; Escalate issues promptly Exercise judgment and make decisions to promote smooth workflow and prioritization Ensure that internal and external client demands are met Create, organize and manage various SharePoint sites and shared drives Location:  Minimum Qualifications  Business/Division/Leader role will support: High School Diploma or equivalent Intermediate proficiency in MS Office (Outlook, Excel, PPT) Immigration sponsorship is not available for this position Preferred Qualifications Bachelor’s degree 1 year of administrative experience Ability to successfully manage multiple, competing priorities to meet deadlines Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with a strong customer service focus Organizational skills and attention to detail Ability to anticipate needs, be resourceful, and use sound judgment and tact Critical thinking, analytical, and problem solving skills Learning agility; Ability to quickly gain knowledge of organizational operations, procedures, and staff Ability to work independently, as well as collaborate in a team environment Reliability, flexibility and approachability Process oriented, adaptable, reliable, flexible and approachable Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion  At Ecolab, we believe the best teams are diverse and inclusive, and we are on a journey to create a workplace where every associate can grow and achieve their best. We are committed to fair and equal treatment of associates and applicants. We recruit, hire, promote, transfer and provide opportunities for advancement on the basis of individual qualifications and job performance. In all matters affecting employment, compensation, benefits, working conditions, and opportunities for advancement, we will not discriminate against any associate or applicant for employment because of race, religion, color, creed, national origin, citizenship status, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expressions, genetic information, marital status, age, disability, or status as a covered veteran.  In addition, we are committed to furthering the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) through Affirmative Action (AA). Our goal is to fully utilize minority, female, disabled and covered veteran individuals at all levels of the workforce. Ecolab is a place where you can grow your career, own your future and impact what matters.

jobTitle: Key Account Manager - For CRAC market, Airconditioning Channel
description: Multinational company. 2nd largest electric motor manufacturer Location flexable, Hiring potential people manager  About Our Client  our client is a leading manufacturer of electric motors, electrical motion controls, power generation and power transmission products serving markets throughout the world.  Job Description  Position Summary: Work together with product/marketing and engineering team, and through a close customer collaboration providing the most competitive blower solution to their applications. Utilize sales expertise and application know-how makes the client the obvious choice and drive sales growth and profitability improvement in CRAC market. Major Responsibilities: * Responsible for the assigned accounts with defined AOP targets. * Build awareness of the client's abilities in CRAC industry and establishing Regal as a "preferred supplier" with CRAC end-users. * Develop CRAC segment plans and manage accordingly, incl. pricing and terms & conditions, customer profitability, customer engagement. * Establish and expand the market network (e.g. associations, committees) * Develop and manage relations with customer's key decision-makers (e.g. engineering department, procurement). * Develop and manage the sales pipeline, i.e. drive relationship building activities into opportunities to be managed initially as leads, then opportunities, then sales orders. * Share insights and work closely with internal PM, Operation, Engineering teams.  The Successful Applicant  Bachelor degree above in engineering Minimum 3 years application and product technical knowledge/experience from CRAC market, 5 years above Motor & Bl Candidate comes from competitor ( who has direct experience ) to the direct target customer list that aligns with company's wish list. Candidate who can bring the direct account business would be a great plus.  What's On Offer  Complete leadership training programme from the organisation for the candidate. Working in multinational company which allows the broad perspective in global business grow. A designed potential people management role for this particular channel ( 1st employee in this channel from China) Competitive working flexibility and location.  Contact: Chloris Liu  Quote job ref: 4221054
industries: Mechanical or Industrial Engineering and Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing

description: WHY DUPONT ELECTRONICS & INDUSTRIAL (E&I)?  There’s never been a more exciting time to join us. It's a time of incredible progress at DuPont — a time of momentum. It's the time for change makers, for the doers and pioneers, to create essential innovations the world needs. We pursue new technologies and performance materials that enable your designs to be smaller, more complex and more powerful than you could ever imagine.  DuPont is a technology leader, serving the semiconductor, circuit board, display, digital and flexographic printing, healthcare, aerospace, industrial and transportation industries. Why wait for a better future? Invent a better n ow. Build the next thing that changes everything!  Job Description Responsible for overall demand forecast accuracy, customer needs, problems and troubleshooting, interests, competitor activities, and positive/negative potential for existing or new products and services. Achieve agreed upon sales targets and key project milestones within schedule. Present, promote and sell products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers. Responsible for developing and maintaining relationships through all management levels with key customers Manage the balance between price, customer value, and cost to achieve the company’s profitability objectives. Proactively alert potential supply risk and co-work with supply chain for issue resolution. Effectively work with functional teams within DuPont to drive satisfaction both within DuPont and at customers. Teams include Quality, Demand/Supply chain, R&D, manufacture and marketing, etc. Responsible for making deals, negotiating contracts, managing conflicts, and tackling problems. Resolve customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; making recommendations to management. Monitor competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, competitor’s activities, sample delivery schedule and result. Introducing the product offering and customer value proposition to customers Distributor management JOB QUALIFICATION More than 5 year of successful experience in display industry for Sales and Field Service. Experience in OLED is plus. Knowledge in OLED material, panel manufacture, processes and value chain or general consumer electronics. Experience working directly with China OLED panel makers is highly desirable. Proven work experience as a sales representative or field/customer service role. Experience on distributor management is preferred. Excellent selling, communication, time management and negotiation skills. Good interpersonal and communication skills. Ability to quickly and effectively build relationships, interact, and communicate information with internal and external stakeholders. Good strategic thinking, an influencer, communicator, problem-solver with strong customer-orientation, and execution. Highly self-motivated and target driven. Good team player. Degree in Business/Marketing/Engineering/Material science or related fields Demonstrated ability to build relationships and communicate across the organization Excellent communication and presentation skills Ability to travel up to 50% of the time Location Beijing, Chengdu, Wuhan, Shanghai Fluent English skills. Korean is plus DuPont is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability or any other protected class. Are you an experienced BD Manager looking forward to joining a global ASX listed organization and take your next career step?  As part of our sales team, your role will responsible for the new customer development in South China. Reporting to the Regional Sales Manager, South China, this position will be based in our Guangzhou office.  The key responsibilities of this role include: Fulfil the new customer development targets, including new customer number, revenue, profit. Push dynamic flow and meet annual flow targets in volume and value Together with the rest regional team fulfil the whole regional sales targets  Major Accountabilities： Meet/exceed all agreed upon volume, revenue, dynamic flow and other sales budgets. Prospect, develop and close business at all revenue levels (small, medium and large). Maximize growth opportunities and market share through profitable contracts. Manage relationship with key customers, internal sectors and business partners. Work with Customer Service to monitor and control AR in line with Company's policy. Establish relationships with the prospects/customers, to maximize growth opportunities in new and existing markets and negotiates profitable contracts. Develop agendas, proposals, presentations for customer business proposals and reviews. Acts as “bridge” between Manufacturers and Retailers in order to generate advocacy for the company program (Drive flows).  The ideal candidate will possess the following skills, experience and qualifications: Associate degree and above, solid experience demonstrated B2B sales experience in Logistics, packaging solution or FMCG supply chain environment. Demonstrated ability to explore and develop new business. Sales and negotiation experience. Good communication and negotiation skills Result driven, self-motivated and dedication Front line B2B field sales experience a must Good problem-solving and presentation skill. Knowledge of sales process/funnel management.
jobFunction: Sales, Business Development, and Supply Chain

description: Hydrogen fuel cell products and solutions International Exposure  About Our Client  The company is a wholly foreign-owned enterprise, specialized in the development and manufacturing of hydrogen fuel cell products and solutions.  Job Description  Leading the engagement with automotive OEMs on collaboration opportunities for fuel cell powertrain development and commercialization Developing commercial opportunities in the rail, marine, and UAV markets Working with market and technical teams to evaluate customer requirements and develop winning proposals and account strategies Negotiating and closing sales and service agreements, monitoring and ensuring delivery of customer commitments Maintaining strong relationships with state and local government policy makers Working with industry groups to positively influence the growth and adoption of fuel cell vehicles Maintaining in-depth knowledge of the fuel cell industry and providing regular and timely updates on market activities and competitive intelligence  The Successful Applicant  Over 5-years' experience in automotive or energy solutions sales Demonstrated record of winning and managing large corporate accounts Experience in negotiating complex commercial contracts involving product development, sales, and after-sales service Experience in creating end user demand and driving sales through OEM channels Basic systems engineering knowledge of energy solutions for motive applications  What's On Offer  Competitive salary package; -International exposure  Contact: Jiazi Luke  Quote job ref: 4223198
