description: Ready to lead, disrupt and reinvent the sleep industry?  We are Emma – The Sleep Company. One of Europe's fastest-growing startups, we are now the world's leading D2C sleep brand. In 2020 our revenue grew from €150 to €405 million. We're pushing the boundaries of technology to transform the world of sleep. And we want your help to pull it off.  But Emma isn't for everyone. We're a highly ambitious, hard-working team that pushes you to produce your best work yet. We don't want average, we want high-performers who chase growth and set ambitious goals. Want your ideas to have impact and your career to grow? Then Emma is the right place for you.  What You'll Do You will contribute to Emma’s revenue and margin growth via expanding Emma’s physical footprint in China You will identify the China franchise strategy and manage the channel/sales development of Emma retail partners and multi-brand franchisees. 25% Sales Strategy Identification and Implementation You will be responsible for managing and executing sales strategy in China; ensuring the achievement of brand representation, sales and gross margin across all business channels. You will identify brand and product growth opportunities to ensure the maximization of sales across all existing and new product categories. You will liaise with the operations team to ensure accurate forecasting, on-time logistics and accurate inventory control. You will plan and organize seasonal trade shows for partner retailers and franchisees and lead them to placing seasonal PO in line with budget plan. 35% Business Development: You will identify multi-brand retail channel opportunities to grow franchisee revenue volume. You will strategically develop Emma partner retail channel as a key focus area. You will recommend potential areas for brand marketing investment to drive regional brand awareness and sales. You will identify potential product collaborations that are in-line with brand strategy. 30% Account Management: You will act as the primary contact point for all Emma partners. You will strategically contact and manage all customers with regular touch-bases. You will build strong professional relationships with all accounts. You will develop a strong understanding of target consumer, trends and competition in key markets. You will travel within China to the key cities to gain a full understanding of the opportunities that exist. You will provide the Head of Retail with data and analysis on all business areas under management. 10% Team Management: You will lead the team to achieving company sales target. You will recommend suitable franchise team KPIs. You will manage and keep team stable and effective. You will develop and grow team as required by business needs. You will follow communication procedures, guidelines and policies. What You'll Bring To Us You are a degree holder in business or relevant discipline. You have over 6 years of experience in franchise / account management in retail (within the furniture or sleep products industry a plus). You are detail-oriented with strong analytical skills. You are fluent in both English and Chinese. What We Offer A combination of personal and company growth to accelerate your career and help you reach your goals. The chance to work on exciting and challenging projects either independently or as part of a dedicated, international team. Responsibility and decision-making authority from day one—you'll create an impact with new, innovative ideas and help shape our company DNA. To work and learn from experts in diverse fields and get to know your team members at exciting company events. Become an Emmie  At Emma, you'll be joining a highly ambitious company on a global mission to lead, disrupt and reinvent the sleep industry. Ready to work hard and help us get there? Directly apply through our application portal and become part of our exceptional team.  Emma proudly celebrates diversity. We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to promoting inclusion in our workplace. We consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, ethnic origin, religion or belief, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability or age.  Information regarding COVID-19: Your application will continue to be processed as usual by our recruiting team. All interviews take place via video call or phone.
industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  As a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets. GE Product & Market awareness Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition. Compliance Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required. 任职条件:  Qualifications / Requirements Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience. 2 years of strategic sales experience. 2 years experience in healthcare. Proven key account management and project planning skills. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact. Quality Specific Goals Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: Selling company products to bring in new business. Assist Line Manager / MD in achieving company targets. Identify new business opportunities. Co-ordinate with overseas offices in closing new businesses. Provide marketing information & statistics report for Management to set strategy whenever necessary to On-going training in Operation process in order to enhance product knowledge. Complete the sales tasks and give sales report in good quality. Any ad hoc job assigned by Managers. To take up additional assignments/tasks as required to meet with the Company needs. The company operates over 130 offices in 40 countries around the world to create fast and efficient solutions for a wide range of industries. As a family-owned business, we are very employee-oriented and want to work with you to develop your career and personal goals. Take a look at our Mission & Vision.  If you are looking for a challenging position in an innovative and dynamic international company, we want to get to know you!  Privacy Policy  Apply now! It will only take a minute, we promise!

description: We are looking for a marketing executive to join our regional team and be based in our Shanghai office. This is a full time position.  ComplianceAsia is the largest independent compliance consulting firm in Asia servicing financial industry clients. Due to the continuing expansion of our business in across the region and in Shanghai we have an opening for a candidate to join our marketing team.  Responsibilities:  Execute marketing activities that aligned to the marketing strategy and plan, the activities will focus primarily on Shanghai and the Mainland China region working closely with our team in Hong Kong SAR. Provide daily support in preparing marketing, sales documents and WeChat social media content Shape and execute virtual or in person local events Maximise exposure of ComplianceAsia’s brand through marketing activities   Requirements:  BSc degree in Marketing or Business. 1-5 years’ working experience Ideally prior experience working in professional or finance services industry Strong interpersonal, engagement and time management skills with the team and the firm Fluent in English and Mandarin

General Summary  The Business Development Manager is responsible for target build and closure through market development. Accountability will center on margin and relationship building but will include prospecting, forecasting, achievement of sales objectives and directing activities across functional groups in support of account goals. Expectations include the ability to sell at all levels of management and build relationships that ensure Avient will continue to get the first and last look. Being skilled at customer centric selling approaches and effectively selling the value of our products and services are also keys to success. Individual must have the ability to assist customers in problem solving to deliver solutions, bring energy, enthusiasm and professionalism to their daily routines, and able to perform the function independently and effectively coach and direct personnel in marketing and other disciplines to achieve results. This individual will be able to influence effectively at the peer level, as well as with the next level of the organization, as a thought leader influencing cross functionally. Up to 75% travel is required.  Essential Duties And Responsibilities Profitable revenue growth, including robust, sustainable and profitable new business development. Approach the sales process with a high degree of professionalism and effectiveness by successful utilization of customer centric selling skills and tools, such as use of scorecards, business reviews, EVE tools, high/wide/deep, 5 warning signs, prospecting & new account calls, development of a robust sales funnel, collecting ARs, avoidance of bad debts, cross selling, and effective CRM system management. Develop account relationships, account plan, identify opportunities and capture the specification for Avient’s products at strategic accounts within assigned geography, application or industry. Establish, track and close new business targets consistent with short- and long-term objectives at designated accounts within the assignment. Develop contact matrix and establish strong relationships with key decision makers and project facilitators. * Prospecting and cold calling. Deliver the planned results (AOP). Understand key players, applications, requirements, trends, and needs as well as Avient’s potential and share within the targeted industry. Become an industry and product expert to leverage successes across the industry. Coordinate closely with regional and global teams as well as collaborating with the technical area as necessary to accelerate and drive profitable growth through solutions selling to targeted accounts. Monitor the competition to better understand issues and threats and develop plans to eliminate barriers. Implement Avient’s, pricing and market strategies as well as business practices. Negotiate customer contracts and value packages to insure an acceptable return on Avient resources invested. Participate in strategy development, help position the business and develop the offer. Assist in defining the target markets, and commercial strategy. Establish individual performance standards, goals and objectives-- measure and provide feedback. Develop written Account Plans for strategic accounts including metrics to define annualized sales potential at each account. Develop, execute and manage sales plans and budgets. Manage expenses and report in a timely fashion. Manage strategic relationships, cultivate new alliances, and monitor competitive activity. Requirements Bachelor’s Degree or above- Preferred in Polymer Materials More than 7 years of experience in Sales Function. Experience in the Telecom, IoT and Semicon industry will be a plus. Strong ownership, self-motivated. Good communication and presentation skills Good command of Microsoft office, experience in salesforce will be a plus.

description: BASF has been a committed partner to Greater China since 1885. With large production sites in Shanghai, Nanjing and Chongqing, as well as a global and regional research and development hub in Shanghai, BASF is a major foreign investor in the country’s chemical industry. BASF posted sales of approximately €8.5 billion in 2020 to customers in Greater China and employed 8,948 people as of the end of the year. For further information, please visit www.basf.com/cn/en.  Objectives The primary function of this role is to implement Transportation, Performance Materials Greater China including Engineering Plastics, PU Systems and TPU sales & marketing strategy in new business development and customers’ management by initiating contacts with existing and potential customers within the Interior Floor & Structural market sub-segments. Conduct NEV business development in Anhui area according to the regional strategy and objectives. Conduct NEV OEMs and Battery markers Management, which located in Hefei, and look for opportunities on new projects. Development and implementation of Best Business Practices. Main Tasks Sales Development Conduct existing business and develop new projects in existing & new customers to ensure both volume and margin growth. Develop sales plans; secure and expedite orders. Supervise and consolidate the sales forecast. Strategic Tasks and Implementation Identify key accounts and develop key account profiles. Implement the sales and marketing directions per agreed directions Product/Industry/Business Development Scout for new business opportunities in the respective sales areas / key accounts and develop a business plan. Suggest product developments and requirements to Sales Manager or LBM and support its implementation. Customer Management Conduct field visits, seminars, presentation and attend to customers’ inquiries. Provide prompt response related to quality, technical applications, inquiries, and other related issues; conduct customers’ assessments and analyses. Align with Regional and BCH functions to solve customers’ issues. Credit Management Monitor the growth of the customers’ business, review and coordinate with credit control to make appropriate credit recommendations. Follow-up on payment collections and ensure on-time payment from the customers Marketing Implement pricing policy and support product launch processes. Monitor and review marketing/promotion campaign’s execution. Support public relation and marketing communication campaign for related business. Market Intelligence Conduct studies/analysis on market trend, competitors, products’ applications and technology, service needs. Requirements Bachelor or above At least 3 years working experience in PU industry Automotive background is preferred PU technical know-how and applications. Key account management experience

Job title: Regional Sales Manager 职位：区域销售经理 Division/function: Sales-APAC 所属职能部门：亚太区销售 Business unit / department: Sales 所属业务部门：销售 Location (country, province/state/city): China, Shenzhen/Beijing/Wuhan/Chengdu/Guangzhou 工作地点：中国，深圳/北京/武汉/成都/广州   EXFO develops smarter network test, monitoring and analytics solutions for the world’s leading telecommunications service providers, network equipment manufacturers and web scale companies—and we love what we do! With over 2,000 employees in more than 25 countries, EXFO is no. 1 worldwide in fiber optic test solutions, has the largest active assurance deployment and delivers unmatched insights into subscriber experience. Our unique blend of intelligent hardware, software and professional services enables our customers’ network transformations related to fiber, 5G and 4G/LTE, virtualization and big data analytics. We’re always looking for top talent to help us lead the way in a thriving industry with boundless opportunities. EXFO 致力于为全球领先的电信服务提供商、网络设备制造商和网络级公司开发更智能的网络测试、监测和分析解决方案。EXFO 在 25 个国家/地区拥有 2,000 多名员工，是光纤测试解决方案领域的全球领导者。我们的主动保障解决方案部署量位列前茅，还能够为客户提供关于用户体验的独到见解。我们提供出色的智能硬件、软件和专业服务，帮助客户根据光纤、5G 和 4G/LTE、虚拟化以及大数据分析领域的趋势实现网络转型。我们求贤若渴，诚邀优秀人才加入，与我们一起在这个蓬勃发展、充满机会的行业共创辉煌。  Job summary 职位描述 EXFO is seeking a dynamic, self-motivated & customer driven Regional Sales Manager with a proven track record of increasing sales within China. This individual is familiar with manufacturing, develop and research area in telecommunication industry, will drive the business development and the customer engagement process. This individual will establish, execute and drive the sales strategies with the responsibility for delivering or exceeding EXFO Wireline solution sales targets. EXFO寻求精力充沛、积极进取、以客户为导向的候选人；在中国区从事销售工作且有良好的销售业绩。熟悉光通信制造，研发领域，将负责推动相关行业的业务发展和客户互动过程，制定、执行和完善销售策略，完成甚至超额完成 EXFO 制定的测试方案的销售目标。   What you’ll do 工作职责 Sales Focus: 销售方面：  Establish sales strategy, sales objective, and support needs for optical and electrical testing solution. And dedicated on system, subsystem and transceiver R&D and manufacturing market. Identify customers and key market potentials to penetrate and develop business as well as strategic sales plans. ·      针对光通信系统，子系统已及光模块领域的研发，生产过程中的光学及电子测试方案制定销售策略和销售目标并确定需求；寻找并发展潜在的客户和关键市场，壮大业务，制定战略和销售计划。 Manage the pipeline of opportunities from current and prospective customers to ensure that sales goal can be met. Position Purpose: Do you want to work for Australia’s leading natural healthcare company? Do you want to work for an organization that gives people a choice to invest in and take control of their health and wellbeing, as well as their career? Blackmores is thrilled to give our consumers the choice to make living well each day a natural way of life.   Key Responsibilities:  Achieve business target through leading and managing ecommerce sales channels e.g. Red (小红书), Pinduoduo (拼多多) and Kuaishou (快手短视频) in China Work with the TP to ensure the smooth daily online store operation, including but not limited to content, campaign, promotions, merchandising, customer experiences & service, and performance analysis Build a high-effective relationship with the ecommerce platform and be familiar with the operation mode and be sensitive to business intelligence of industry and platform Enhance brand presence online by proactively managing online portfolio, product page, activity Budget planning and control, provide forecast to supply chain team for production Choose and design activity which fit into consumer/customer needs while also fit into brand strategy, then implement in customer site Any other related work assigned by China Leadership in line with China sales business strategy Develop new business opportunities through channel expansion where necessary    Candidate Profile: A bachelor’s degree in Sales & Marketing, Business Administration, Ecommerce, or related fields Deep understanding of China digital ecosystem and eCommerce landscape Proven 5 years plus experience in e-commerce sales and operations, understand the principle of User Experience Strong analytical skills and business-driven thinking Demonstrate as independent self-starter who is able to work with a start-up mentality and agility Have worked with cross functional teams and have demonstrated results effectively to communicate findings.

Company Overview  Come and work with us the “TT Way” which means we do the right thing, bring out the best in each other, achieve more together, champion expertise and get the job done…well! With approximately 4800 colleagues we operate from 27 locations around the world. Building the expertise of our people is critical to the future success of our organisation.  TT Electronics is a global provider of engineered electronics. We collaborate with customers in the transportation, industrial, medical, and aerospace and defence markets, providing them with engineering expertise and support through a global network of specialists and world class facilities. As a responsible employer we encourage all our people to “give something back” by supporting the local communities in which we operate.  Located in Suzhou, a beautiful city by the Yangtze River, the Global Manufacturing Solutions (GMS) business enjoys a high reputation as low volume/high mix manufacturer of products ranged from box-build, PCBA and cable assembling.  Role Overview And Responsibilities  Introduction  The Business Development Manager is responsible for identifying prospective opportunities, developing new customer relationships, new sales and new customer logo’s development. The BDM is the senior level within the sales team implementing Power Kuantan strategic sales plan.  Key Responsibilities  Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following. Other duties may be assigned. Comprehensive knowledge of all facets within Power Solution Division and TT Electronics PLC. Group. Ability to communicate and present Power Solutions Organization Sales and Marketing overview. Regularly meet with prospective new customers to identify strategic opportunities that align with Power Kuantan new business growth objectives. Prepare and execute strategic penetration plans for his/her territory and/or assigned strategic market segments and assigned customer targets. Proven ability to identify cross- selling opportunities for all TT Electronic PLC Divisions. Responsible to ensure all new business opportunities meet the Power Solution Division financial requirements. Accountable for forecasting, planning and achieving new business objectives Subject matter experts in assigned market segments. Extensive understanding of key Power Solution market differentiators and competitive landscape. Comprehensive knowledge of prospective customer’s end-market. Ability to align customer expectations with Power Solution service offerings Lead reviews of new business plans with Power Solution Kuantan site leaders. Completion of bi-weekly and monthly reports and CRM data as required. Establish positive Customer relationships at all levels. Assist in transitioning new customers into the Account Management Team. Ensure all new customers engage in Power Solution approved supplier agreements. All agreements and contracts must be approved and signed by the GMS VP/GM or designee. Core Requirements  Qualifications, Skills and Attributes  To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The Individual must be able to maintain confidentiality and have good Judgment. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. A pleasant professional image is expected at all times. Candidate will be expected to exhibit high ethical standards and promote the same within the company.  Desireable Skills And Experience  Education/Experience/Credentials: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent work experience in related field, with a thorough knowledge of customer applications in the following vertical markets -Medical, Military/Aerospace, Industrial, Transportation and Instrumentation. Strong technical and sales background in the magnetics, components sector. Five plus years direct selling experience in managing components/magnetics sales team.  Language Ability: Excellent communication both written and verbal.Ability to read and analyze periodicals, business reports, correspondence and procedure manuals. Ability to write reports, business correspondence, and procedure manuals. Ability to effectively present information and respond to questions from groups of managers, customers, Team Members and the general public. Ability to effectively present information and respond to questions. The Individual must possess strong skills in grammar and proofreading.  Math Ability: Ability to calculate figures and amounts such as discounts, interest, commissions, proportions, percentages.  Computer Skills: Ability to use office software, including Word processing, Spreadsheets, Databases, Slide Presentations, Internet browsers, E-mail, and business systems software.  Travel Requirements : Necessary travel will be required to support job functions, expected 50-60% to support the customer base.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Mechanical or Industrial Engineering, and Staffing and Recruiting

description: 工作职责:  Position title: Field Account Manager Reports to: Manager of AT Sales China Countries in scope of responsibility: Appointed territory in China  Responsibilities Proactive sales of the whole Advanced Therapies product portfolio/solution offers /new products by both in-person and remote interaction to assigned accounts, ensure customer centric selling approach Develop business plans/rolling forecast for assigned account sites Analyze customer needs and present/demonstrate our products/solutions/value proposition as well as create quotations, negotiation and closing the deal with the customer Drive critical after-sales activities and facilitate things moving forward with acceptable time and quality Facilitate internal resources allocation to satisfy customer needs Build and maintain a strategic customer relationship management Propose strategic customer collaborations for potential accounts to support the long-term business growth Use CRM to share customer’s requests and status along the selling process Explore new business opportunities or cross-selling points via the interaction with customers Key Capabilities/ Skills Graduate qualification in a discipline or equivalent experience in biopharma industry 5+ years sales experience in the biopharma industry is preferred Proactive, result driven and collaborative attitude Good negotiation skills Economical and financial know how Good analytical and presentation skills Good interpersonal and communication skills in dealing with people of different levels Flexible and willing to travel Project management Facilitation skill Ability to travel up to 60% (Adjusted based on Sales region) Interfaces & Rights Interfaces to other functions/ roles: AS/IAS, Marketing, NCAS, INSO, Sales Support, Customer Service, Service, Customer Quality Decision rights: Offer prices acc. to quotation thresholds (escalation path) Access to tools/ platforms/ data: SF.com, ESS, Concur, Configurator 任职条件:  Same as above

主要职责  1.管理客户关系并提供相关服务，根据既定的市场开发原则在指定区域开拓新的客户，并保持从现有客户获得持续的销售业绩。  2. 提供销售，活动及成本预算方面的信息，以利于销售经理做出有效的判断。  3. 在既定的客户中，根据系统的调研和沟通，最大可能的发现影响客户现在及未来的商业机会及购买决定。  4. 制定客户开发计划，并达到销售目标。  5. 随时给医疗专家提供产品技术支持。  6. 在负责的相关销售区域，了解当地的医疗市场及影响客户选择的竞争对手策略。  7. 学习以保持对公司产品、临床应用、管理法规要求的质量标准和业务政策的及时理解。  任职要求  1. 2年及以上稳定的医药产品销售经验(药品，耗材，设备均可）  2. 本科及以上学历（医学/药学/生物学等专业背景优先）；  3. 良好的沟通能力；  4. 良好的人际交往能力；  5. 良好的团队意识；  6. 良好的英文基础（CET-6，书写及口语）；  7. 可适应长短期出差；

JoVE is the world-leading producer and provider of science video solutions with the mission to improve scientific research and education. Millions of scientists, educators and students at thousands of universities, colleges, hospitals and biopharmaceutical companies worldwide use JoVE for their research, teaching and learning. Our institutional clients comprise over 1,000 universities, colleges, and biopharma companies, including such leaders as Harvard, MIT, Yale, and Stanford. As a rapidly growing company, with offices in the USA, UK, Australia, and India servicing clients in over 60 countries, we are seeking talented and ambitious individuals to join our company.   The Role  We are seeking a bilingual marketing professional to implement localized marketing and lead generation activities across China. The successful Marketing Specialist will create and execute marketing campaigns, seek out customer testimonials, identify opportunities for local lead generating activity and act as a liaison for the sales team. The role is based in mainland China (Shanghai or Beijing preferred) and reports to the APAC Marketing Manager.   Responsibilities  Plan and execute a comprehensive and localized lead generating campaign plan  Implement a marketing strategy based on the corresponding academic calendar, including any holidays to take into consideration Translate marketing materials and web assets as needed in simplified Chinese and if possible, in traditional Chinese as well Collaborate with the Social Media Manager on outreach for the covered region, including paid and targeted campaigns on all social channels like WeChat and Baidu Collaborate with the Global Campaign Marketing Manager and APAC Marketing Manager on press releases/blogs/case studies Help organize/host webinars and regional conferences (where applicable and travel permitting) throughout the covered region  Support key sales initiatives in China and implement bespoke marketing campaigns based on specific regional needs Responsible for all email marketing within the region - disseminating campaigns including new product announcements, onboarding emails, trial support, etc. Look out for topics of discussion within the covered region in which we can get involved either over social media, via blogs, and more Testimonial outreach to scientists, faculty and librarian audiences Report and analyze campaigns for effectiveness and efficiency  Qualifications  Bachelor’s degree in business, marketing or related field 2-3+ years of experience in B2B or digital Marketing Excels in running marketing campaigns on WeChat, Baidu and similar platforms Experience working with inbound Marketing Software (HubSpot, Pardot, Marketo) or marketing email provider (Constant Contact, Mail Chimp) Working knowledge of CRM (Salesforce) is preferred Marketing/internship experience or working knowledge within Publishing, Ed-tech, education or science is preferred Excellent written and spoken skills in English and Mandarin.

You will be responsible to conduct marketing campaign, product promotion, implement territory marketing plan, improve territory distributors and customers’ product cognition, increase customers’ coverage and sales volume.  Main Tasks & Responsibilities Conduct key project promotion, including Tumor, Thyroid, Hormonem, Cardiac, PCT etc., and increase regional sales volume of these related products. Support sales team and distributor teams to achieve sales target Work closely with sales and distributors, develop and maintain regional TOP/Focus customers, assist with sales and distributors to develop TOP/Focus customers, maintain and improve reagent consumption Train and develop resellers, improve reseller’s product recognition Responsible for marketing campaign, including hospital meetings, area events etc. to make more customers aware of Roche products. Develop and maintain regional speakers. Submit weekly report and monthly report  Basic Requirements of the Job You should hold at least bachelor degree in Clinical Diagnostics Science or Business Administration.You should have Good command of English in both spoken and written,  MS office software application Product & Application Expertise Experience in hospital laboratory diagnostics work or 3 years Marketing/ Sales or Application experience in a similar industry

Partner Sales Manager Location: Guangzhou/Chengdu  Main duties: Delivers agreed revenue and recruitment targets into all Study Group Higher Education programmes. Develops the customer value proposition for Study Group’s Central China based agents Identifies opportunities to grow key accounts into higher value tier.  Ensures maximum levels of competitor and market awareness Effectively operates in a commercial, cost focused environment Monitors the sales pipeline and forecast accurate future sales opportunities across team. Positively engages with and contributes to the HE Brand, Agent and APD teams and to the wider Global Sales and Marketing team Supports the leadership of a best in class sales team through setting and communicating high standards of performance and behaviour  Essential Criteria: Educated to Degree standard or compensating industry experience Experience of working in account sales planning and implementation. (such experience does not have to be from the higher education sector) Experience of working in a sales matrix team, both in-office and remotely (virtually) Minimum of two years’ experience of working in the higher education sector Experience of developing and implementing recruitment strategies IT literate with a good working knowledge of Microsoft Office Experience of face to face sales An ability to deal professionally with all staff, clients, partners and students A quick learner able to understand and action effectively new tasks Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail Ability to work flexibly and independently with limited supervision and remote management. Ability to set own targets and strategies Ability to present to large groups in a confident and persuasive manner Ability to research and analyse market trends and produce reports Excellent bi-lingual skills in Chinese and English both written and verbal Excellent interpersonal skills Self-motivated, enthusiastic and a positive attitude  Desirable Criteria: Bachelor’s degree and above /or overseas study experience Experience of International student recruitment within a Higher Education sector Experience of writing/designing promotional campaigns Experience of channel sales (i.e. through agent network or similar)  About Study Group We are a global pathway provider in International Education, working collaboratively with a number of Top Tier Universities. Voted as the 2017, 2018 and 2020 Global Pathway Provider of the year, our people are united with the shared ambition of providing a world-class UK education to talented students from across the globe.   Organisational Compliance Study Group is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of its students, and expects all staff and volunteers to share the same dedication. Applicants will be required to undergo child protection screening appropriate to the role, including checks with past employers, an Enhanced Check from the Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) and overseas criminal records if appropriate. Study Group processes your information in line with data protection regulations. Please see our Privacy Policy
industries: Higher Education, E-Learning, and Education Management

Have we got a job for you?!  Client Business Manager, Shanghai/ China  Build Your Career | Have Fun | Make a Difference  About Payoneer  Payoneer’s mission is to empower businesses to go beyond – beyond borders, limits and expectations. In today’s digital world, Payoneer enables any business of any size from anywhere to access new economic opportunities by making it possible to transact as easily globally as they do locally.  Payoneer’s digital platform streamlines global commerce for millions of small businesses, marketplaces and enterprises from 200 countries and territories. Leveraging its robust technology, compliance, operations and banking infrastructure, Payoneer delivers a suite of services that includes cross-border payments, working capital, tax solutions and risk management. Powering growth for customers ranging from aspiring entrepreneurs in emerging markets to the world’s leading digital brands like Airbnb, Amazon, Google and Upwork, Payoneer makes global commerce easy and secure.  Payoneer Has Accumulated Numerous Prestigious Accolades, Including But Not Limited To  Payoneer is a leading fintech company built to disrupt today’s way of commerce.  Payoneer - one world, one platform, endless opportunities.  About Payoneer China  Ever since its inception, Payoneer China has grown at a blistering speed with 250+ employees serving hundreds of thousands of customers. Payoneer China currently is the market leader in cross border payments for ecommerce, B2B trade, and mobile applications. We are also well positioned to grow our business into other business verticals, delivering a portfolio of products and services.  This is a unique opportunity for talents to participate in a fast-moving environment to provide disruptive products and solutions that solve real commercial challenges. It is also a great opportunity to super charge your career and to amplify professional growth, business acumen, and cross industry experience.  If you’re an experienced leader, manages operations in the Fintech industry, loves to get things done, collaborates with colleagues all over the world and is interested in joining a fast-growing global company that is trusted by the world’s top digital brands and truly cares for its customers, join us at Payoneer!  With over 2000 employees globally, fast processing and delivery of payments is at the heart of our success. Our customers rely on us to make fast and cost effective worldwide international payments. The Payoneer team is dedicated to overcoming the complexities associated with cross-border commerce. We believe in being hi-tech hi-touch, developing the most cutting-edge solutions while remaining friendly and approachable  What’s the job?  We're looking for a motivated self-starter who can operate in a fast-paced environment to grow new and existing accounts. The ideal candidate is comfortable with technology products and services, possesses the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, and has a proven track record of success managing executive and C-level relationships at large and dynamic corporations.  What You’ll Do Own retention and growth KPIs for managed clients in various digital commerce verticals (travel, ecommerce, music, publishing, freelance etc) for which Payoneer manages payments flows and complementary services Develop and nurture relationships with key client stakeholders including senior management while understanding decision making process for managed accounts Maintain and grow revenue through strategic business plan creation, consultative selling, and upsell opportunities Develop and apply account plans (using established methodology) for each managed account designed to meet client needs and partner with client to achieve their directives Negotiate contract extensions, pricing, and work collaboratively with internal stakeholders to execute on revenue goals and objectives Interpret data (market data, competitive data, proprietary data, and client supplied data) to include in data-driven decision-making process and to create a clear view on status of client Participate in review forums with internal business stakeholders where account plans are presented to management for approval and to solicit support Conduct QBRs with clients to track against both Payoneer and clients KPIs Identify potential new products/services and supply inputs to product and R&D teams to place on roadmap in order to serve clients with a long-term view Communicate the value of Payoneer through account review processes and prioritize plans to achieve objectives Be a steward to resolve operational issues that may be affecting the client by working with technical teams to drive resolution on behalf of client What We’re Looking For 8+ years of experience in a client facing role in high growth technology firms, payments firm, fintech space or in a financial institution Ability to work with all teams, including sales/bd, finance, marketing, risk, customer care, legal, product, professional services and compliance Expert communicator who is motivated to own all aspects of the client relationship and be the client’s advocate within Payoneer Excellent and presentation skills and able to productively facilitate meetings with up to 20 participants Able to travel (when safe to do so) to clients on regular basis Creative problem solver with the ability to think out of the box but also to know how to plan, prioritize, and execute on strategies to meet client needs and revenue goals Excellent written and verbal skill in both Mandarin and English

About Us  Gore is a materials science company focused on improving lives through discovery, product innovation and rewarding careers for our Associates.  About The Industry  Saving lives and improving the quality of life for patients is at the core of everything we do. This meaningful work gives purpose to our lives and inspires us to create solutions that make a difference in the lives of others. Learn more at gore.com/products/industries  About The Role  We are looking for a Field Sales Associate to join our Medical Product Division Sale Team in Zhengzhou, Henan who will be accountable for meeting or exceeding the sales forecast in Henan province.  Responsibilities: Develop profitable sales opportunities, proactively make sales calls Develop new business to align with Gore business needs Ensure the KOL management, market data collection, etc., are effective, build, maintain and defend long-term customer relationships Ensure the cooperation with other product specialists are active and constructive, to achieve team goals and objectives Implement value pricing principle, be a value seller, skilled in the use of premise-based forecasting techniques Implement Gore’s product strategy, understands the needs of the customer  Required Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in medical or medicine Proven sales background, preferably with a minimum of 5 years in the medical devices sales area Will have worked in or able to demonstrate an understanding of the imperatives of a business environment Clinical background in interventional areas or sales experience to this environment Strong communication and interpersonal skills A high level of self-motivation and passion, ensuring the ability to work under minimal supervision Commercial acumen High integrity Capable and ability to travel extensively up to 60% and attend weekend conferences as required  What We Offer  At Gore, we want our Associates to have fulfilling careers driven by curiosity and commitment. In return, we commit to our Associates by offering comprehensive, competitive rewards in the form of compensation, benefits, an Associate stock ownership-type plan, and opportunities for growth and development. Learn more at gore.com/careers  We believe in the strength of a diverse workforce and inclusive work environment. Our Talent Acquisition Team welcomes your questions via email at AP_TA@wlgore.com  Job  Sales  Primary Location  Asia-Pacific-CN-SH-Jing'an  Travel%  60%  Shift  Day  Schedule  Full-time

Inspired by kids and imaginative play, ZURU is one of the fastest growing toy companies in the world that is known for it's agility, creativity and new-age manufacturing techniques.  Zuru also operates a consumer business, Zuru Edge, delivering disruptive brands in big, stodgy consumer goods categories  We are growing rapidly with launch of more successful brand planned ahead in the year and we are inviting analytical, self driven individuals for our Sales Operations team.  The Sales Ops Analyst would be responsible for sales analysis, forecasting, internal and external collaboration with planners and analysts, reporting and supporting sales presentations.  As Sales Ops Analyst, you will oversee optimising company item assortment and in stock levels, reporting and coordinating with company supply chain on shipment requirements and working with Sales Managers to ensure a successful flow of orders and product.  Job Duties Create ladder plans utilizing statistical models, sales projections, POS data, order flows, event calendars, and other market intelligence collected from various business sources including distribution centers to manage and monitor accounts. Pull reports and data to manage each sku and the supply to each store. Recommend and write orders to move product through the supply chain. Analyze store level POS data to identify potential out-of-stock issues Monitor and report on key replenishment metrics, forecast accuracy, replenishment, inventory, and service as indicated by specified retailers. Investigate stocking, delivery, and product activity issues. Manage transfer requirements by location, find root causes and implement solutions. Effectively analyze and execute Inventory Policy settings to support Seasonal Activity Order Management - maintain a high level of accuracy on orders, pricing, execution of allocations, comparison of forecast to trends Analyze corporate, DC, and store level forecasts on continued basis to identify risk and opportunities Compile reports and insights from available third party and retailer data on own brand v competitor brand activities and sales performance including but not limited to promotional tactics, uplift, market share, and present this to sales managers with key recommendations. Assist with scorecard analysis for both internal and external meetings. Assist with key meeting prep. Desired Skills & Attributes Bachelor’s degree in finance, Mathematics, Business, or related field Strong background and experience with data mining and statistical analysis Minimum 1 year experience as a business analyst or similar role for a FMCG company, with responsibility for analyzing POS-based data and formulating insights and recommendations for retailer. Highly effective at developing presentation materials that are clear, concise, and compelling. Excellent command of Microsoft Office. Very proficient in excel

description: 关于WeWork中国 WeWork是全球领先的办公空间服务平台。截止至2020年第三季度，WeWork已建立了859个社区，覆盖38个国家共151个城市，拥有54万名会籍。自2016年WeWork进入中国以来，已经在上海、香港、北京、广州、深圳、杭州、苏州、南京、武汉、成都、西安、台北建立约100个社区，是一家兼具全球品牌优势及战略资源的中国企业，更高效、更扎实、更贴近中国市场需求，协同中国本土合作伙伴，继续致力引领中国未来的灵活办公方式。我们通过独特的办公空间、体验和生态提升企业雇员的效率和福祉，赋能“人才推动型”成长企业共同成长。  我们的产品 空间：将原来复杂的房地产租赁模式转变为简单的会员制模式，并以低于传统办公空间的价格所提供的空间即服务平台； 灵活性：提供能够根据需求定制各种大小的办公空间，或者以分钟、月及年计费的灵活的办公空间解决方案； 科技：办公空间内所需要的技术解决方案：从IT服务（包括专业带宽），到任何时候都能预定一间会议室； 社区：坚持“会员第一”的使命，从而为各种规模的企业提供有意义的社区和全球化的人脉。  主要职责 管理电话咨询渠道内的客户线索 新客户开拓：开发潜在客户（通过陌拜，电话，社交媒体，网络，大型活动等） 现有大、中、小企业客户的关系培养与维护 充分了解客户需求，向目标客户指引和展示WeWork的地点、产品和业务解决方案 在客户的整个购买过程中充当客户的主要联络点，并与公司其他团队密切合作，以保证新客户顺利入驻 运用创新的销售策略，提高WeWork市场认知度  经验与要求 3年以上销售经验 具备Salesforce经验者优先 有商业房地产销售经验者优先 有B2B业务解决方案者优先 有新客户拓展经验者优先 具备开拓新市场的能力 具备优秀的展示与沟通能力  Responsibilities Inbound lead management Lead generation and prospecting (i.e., cold calling, social media, networking, events, etc.) Existing sales pipeline management Cultivating and maintaining small, midsize and large business relationships Partner with New Member Development and Community teams to ensure successful placement and follow up of new members Utilizing innovative and creative sales tactics Touring and demonstrating WeWork locations and business solutions with potential members  Qualifications 3+ years of sales experience Experience with Salesforce a plus Commercial real estate sales experience a plus B2B business solutions experience a plus Business development experience a plus Ability to establish and nurture C-level relationships Ability to penetrate new markets Presentation and communication skills required Detail orientation and organization skills required College/University graduate with 4-year degree preferred
industries: Real Estate, Commercial Real Estate, and Facilities Services

Internal contacts include all sales department staff members as well as other related department staff in other offices of the company to gain information or to resolve problems. Only new work is reviewed before issue, all other work is handled independently, reporting status to managers/supervisor. Education & Skills  ESSENTIAL QUALIFICATIONS: A university graduate with a major in medical laboratory science or medicine-related science Good command in computer application with Outlook, PowerPoint and Excel is a must Working Experience A minimum of four-year working experience in IVD field with strong sales track record Being experienced in the business of diagnostic industry Functional Competencies Develops professional expertise by maintaining contacts in the industry Continues to develop depth in specific disciplines by studying innovations and changes in the field Systematically gathers relevant information, considers a broad range of issues or factors Grasps complexities and recognizes relationships among problems or issues Continuously learns from experiences, particularly non-routine challenges Focuses on key tasks when faced with limited time and resources Quickly identifies projects and initiatives requiring special attention Has broad conceptual framework and experience to achieve objectives Defines resources necessary for project/program completion Understands goals, objectives and barriers to achievement for defined area of focus Typically serves as a project or team leader for a complex business concept or application May provide informal or formal feedback to individuals in the team Tailors messages to ensure clarity and maximum impact Attends external seminars and visits customers and other companies to continue learning Works in cross-functional teams to improve processes that cross department boundaries Recognizes, respects and leverages the unique talents of all team members Monitors and understands the impact of expenditures on business results and customer satisfaction Applies knowledge of company's decision-making structure to achieve objectives Integrates customer needs and functional unit objectives to achieve business unit objectives Must demonstrate strong interpersonal and communication skills

POSITION SUMMARY:  To maximize business opportunities in Beijing and Hebei by effectively developing, managing and supporting end customers and channel partners. Grow the sales of related product portfolio and provide direct and efficient sales service to increase customer’s satisfaction and loyalty.  ESSENTIAL JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:  * Responsible for the fulfillment of revenue target of assigned territory and sales target. * Work with Marketing, Clinical Solutions, Field Application and Customer Care team of Cepheid to develop added value packages to increase customer loyalty and maximize business potential. * Maximize business opportunities and grow revenue across the Cepheid product portfolio for the territory wide key accounts including but not limited to CDC, Hospitals, Government Laboratories, Independent Labs, VCT clinics, etc. * Develop Key Opinion Leaders for Cepheid products by proactive communication on product and technology, regular & frequent sales visits and marketing & academic programs or specific evaluation projects. * Identify Key Account’s current and potential spend and strategic value. * Develop partnerships and long-term relationships with existing and new key customers. * Manage tender process and submissions in key accounts and be an active coordinator among Cepheid, customers and distributors. * Monitor and report on competitor activity and market trends in the responsible territories. * Play an active role in the establishment of key reference sites and training center. * Participate in Application, Sales and Marketing programs as required. TRAINING RESPONSIBILITIES: (REQUIRED)  * Complete all assigned and required training satisfactorily and on time MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:  Education and Experience (in years):  * Bachelor degree or above, preferably in clinical medicine, laboratory medicine, pharmaceutical, molecular biology, microbiology, or related major, Master degree is a plus. * At least 3 years sales management experience in MNCs of medical device or IVD or pharmaceutical industry. * 3+ years sales experience in hospital, clinical laboratory, and/or life science markets. Knowledge and skills:  * Excellent understanding of hospital customer and/or Govt. department purchasing process. * Good knowledge of the infectious disease and/or oncology diagnostic market as well as related techniques * Excellent professional selling skills to government departments, laboratory technicians, clinicians and healthcare professionals. * Trackable record in meeting sales targets, distribution development and/or team management. * Strong interpersonal communication and organizational skills and planning ability. * Strong execution ability in the field and is willing to accept frequent travels. * Good team player with open mind, self-motivation. Creative but result oriented, can work under pressure with optimistic. * Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint applications. * Proficient in both Mandarin and English. The statements in this description represent typical elements, criteria and general work performed.  They are not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills for this job.

Are you an experienced BD Manager looking forward to joining a global ASX listed organization and take your next career step?    As part of our sales team, your role will responsible for the new customer development in North China. Reporting to the Regional Sales Manager, North China, this position will be based in our Beijing office.   The key responsibilities of this role include: Fulfil the new customer development targets, including new customer number, revenue, profit. Push dynamic flow and meet annual flow targets in volume and value Together with the rest regional team fulfil the whole regional sales targets  Major Accountabilities： Meet/exceed all agreed upon volume, revenue, dynamic flow and other sales budgets. Prospect, develop and close business at all revenue levels (small, medium and large). Maximize growth opportunities and market share through profitable contracts. Manage relationship with key customers, internal sectors and business partners. Work with Customer Service to monitor and control AR in line with Company's policy. Establish relationships with the prospects/customers, to maximize growth opportunities in new and existing markets and negotiates profitable contracts. Develop agendas, proposals, presentations for customer business proposals and reviews. Acts as “bridge” between Manufacturers and Retailers in order to generate advocacy for the company program (Drive flows).  The ideal candidate will possess the following skills, experience and qualifications: Associate degree and above, solid experience demonstrated B2B sales experience in Logistics, packaging solution or FMCG supply chain environment. Demonstrated ability to explore and develop new business. Sales and negotiation experience. Good communication and negotiation skills Result driven, self-motivated and dedication Front line B2B field sales experience a must Good problem-solving and presentation skill. Knowledge of sales process/funnel management.   Come join an extremely successful performance and growth oriented team, we'd love to hear from you. A highly competitive compensation and benefit package including retirement benefits, educational reimbursement, and more is offered in conjunction with an exciting, fast paced work environment. Come and work with us… Handle the World's Most Important Products. Everyday. www.chep.com/jobs EOE   About us:  CHEP is a global leader in supply chain logistics employing more than 14,000 people in 60+ countries. More than 300,000 supply chains choose to utilize CHEP products and solutions to optimize efficiencies and eliminate waste throughout the world. CHEP’s “share and reuse” core business offering pioneered the shared and circular economies more than 50 years ago. Today, the company provides consultative solutions surrounding the efficient and sustainable movement of goods—and manages a global pool of 300 million pallets and containers shared and reused by growers, raw material suppliers, manufacturers, wholesalers and retailers to produce, warehouse, transport and merchandise consumer and industrial goods.   As one of four Brambles growth companies, CHEP and Brambles provide you unparalleled opportunities to advance and accelerate your career. You’ll be joining an international growth company with an advantaged business model. You’ll be working for a company that is changing the way goods get to market. You’ll optimize 300,000 supply chains instead of just one. You’ll join an efficient and collaborative team who punches above its weight. You’ll be working for the good of humanity.

description: ✨ ABOUT LAUNCHMETRICS  Launchmetrics is the leading Brand Performance Cloud used by Fashion, Luxury and Beauty (FLB) executives to connect with the modern consumer in a constantly changing landscape. With over a decade of industry expertise, we have helped more than 1,000 customers create inspiring, impactful and measurable experiences.  Our Brand Performance Cloud provides companies with the tools and intelligence they need to optimize the use of their creative assets, execute powerful brand amplification programs and measure their brand performance. The company’s AI-driven and proprietary Media Impact Value gives customers the ability to benchmark their performance against 2,000 competitors worldwide. Launchmetrics' intelligence empowers these companies to grow their businesses and streamline their processes, bringing a sharp focus to profitability, accountability, and efficiency while enabling the type of quick decision making required for agility.  Founded in NYC and with operating headquarters in Paris, we have employees in eight markets worldwide and offer support in five languages. We have  been the trusted brand performance technology to brands worldwide such as Dior, Fendi, Shiseido, NET-A-PORTER and Adidas as well as partners like IMG, the Council of Fashion Designers of America, the British Fashion Council, and Camera Nazionale Della Moda Italiana.     💡 ABOUT THE SALES TEAM  We’re a small but mighty team of Sales Leaders and Executives, Account Managers, and Business Development representatives, distributed across 10 different countries worldwide.   We work diligently to build relationships with our global prospects and customers to help them identify their challenges and needs and articulate how these can be addressed through our Brand Performance Cloud.   Our mission is to showcase the great value and power our suite of products, services, and insights can bring to the marketing departments behind the world's biggest and best Fashion, Luxury, and Beauty brands.      🎯 ABOUT THE ROLE  The Regional Account Executive will be responsible for achieving new business targets and helping close new deals. As the Regional Account Executive, you will oversee the prospect’s engagement from prospecting, demo, to closing. You will also collaborate closely with Customer Success to ensure successful onboarding and positive customer engagement to ensure adoption.    Missions:   Develop your own sales pipeline. Hunter approach to initiating conversations with prospects such as C-level executives, Head of Public Relations, Communications or Marketing Departments.  Manage a portfolio of accounts. Success will mean satisfied, engaged customers that understand the value of our product offerings, high customer retention levels, and significant revenue expansion.  Be commercially aligned and focused to meet monthly new business targets.  Using customer data to present value of the service using clear numerical and verbal reasoning  Establish ongoing interaction with key stakeholders and decision-makers within the customer base to align current and future solutions to their strategic or tactical objectives.  Develop new and existing C-level relationships within a portfolio of accounts.  Create customer advocates and references for our offering.  Have new business growth in both MRR and services along with Improved renewal rates within assigned accounts.     🏆 ABOUT YOU  Your Profile   You can speak, read, and write English fluently. A big plus if you speak any of these 3 Asian languages Mandarin, Japanese or Korean  You have high energy, self-awareness, and commitment  You are a challenger seller with strong influencing skills  You have ability to work effectively as an individual as well as part of a global team  You are able to present confidently to an audience from all levels within a global organization  You can track record in reaching and exceeding goals in any fields  You can demonstrate an ability to cope with a complex and changing environment while projecting a positive sales attitude   You have strong strategic selling skills and business acumen & pipeline management skills  You have prior sales experience with software demonstrations is a bonus   You are bachelor degree or above.  You’ll be our rockstar if   You have knowledge about the Fashion, Luxury and Beauty industry  You have passion with social media, digital landscape, or software technology  You have experience using Salesforce    💥 WHAT DO WE HAVE TO OFFER?   A fantastic opportunity to participate in the development of a disruptive international company in an incredible work environment – cool, casual, fast-paced with a passionate, driven and fun team. Our people thrive under autonomy and can easily have a strong impact on our business, customers and organization. By joining us, you will have a chance to work in a cutting edge yet established global organization with more than a decade of sustainable growth and leading investors as partners.   At Launchmetrics, we care about each other and pay extra attention to things like:   Work-life Balance   Flexible Working  Team Building   Growth & Development  Health & Wellness   Diversity & Inclusion      🤝 WHAT CAN YOU EXPECT FROM OUR RECRUITMENT PROCESS?   Step 1: Intro Call   Step 2: Meet & Greet   Step 3: Skills Assessment   Step 4: Culture Fit Interview   Step 5: Leadership Interview
industries: Marketing and Advertising, Apparel & Fashion, and Luxury Goods & Jewelry

description: Job Title： Hitachi Vantara – Inside Sales Representative (内部/电话销售) Location: Beijing (北京)  What You'll Do 工作范围： You will build direct relationships with customers while working with channel partners to maximize new sales opportunities and renewals within your territory. 您将通过电话和客户及渠道合作伙伴直接建立联系，在您负责的领域内最大限度的开发新销售机会和拓展现有用户新需求。 You will manage all aspects of the full sales cycle to help customers reach their business goals. 您将负责并管理Hitachi Vantara解决方案的销售全流程，帮助客户实现其商业目标。 • You will position and sell the entire Digital Infrastructure portfolio. 您将通过电话的方式销售公司Digital Infrastructure（数字化基础架构）解决方案。 • You will seek to understand our customers’ business challenges and advise on the value derived from our solutions to address their pains. 您将通过电话的方式了解我们客户面临的业务挑战或者需求，并根据公司现有的解决方案给客户提供有价值的建议，帮助客户解决他们的业务挑战/困难。 • You will become a trusted advisor to help our customers with their immediate needs, as well as their long term goals. 成为客户信赖的顾问，满足他们目前的业务需求并帮助他们实现长期目标。 • You will accurately forecast your monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue streams; driving growth in your account base. 准确预测您的每月，季度和年度销售收益， 推动客户增加采购量。 • You will be responsible for driving new business, as well as fostering your account base. 开发更多的新客户，扩充您负责的区域内的客户资源。  Who You Are您是谁： • Goal-oriented and motivated by performance rewards 目标导向，以绩效奖励为动力 • Seek to achieve and exceed annual sales goals 努力实现并超过年度销售目标 • A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders 强有力的内部和外部合作者  Skills and Qualifications技能和任职资格： • 3+ years of B2B selling experience in a similar or adjacent industry 3 年以上B2B销售经验在IT行业或者相近行业优先考虑 • Experience owning the full sales cycle (prospecting, validating, negotiating, and closing the sale). 具备全流程销售经验背景 • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business 具有开拓者精神，积极开发新的商业机会并实现业务增长 • Demonstrate strong sales achievement (i.e., consistent achievement at or above quota, or a history YoY growth in your target market) 良好的销售业绩 • Passionate about sales and building positive relationships 拥有销售热情并积极拓展客户关系 • Possess strong business acumen and can articulate the value of a solution to address customers’ current and future needs 敏感的商业嗅觉， 清晰阐述Hitachi Vantara解决方案得价值，以解决客户当前或者未来得商业需求 • Engage in active listening to identify customers’ pain and help them derive the value and potential impact of a timely solution 积极倾听客户的痛点并及时给客户提供有价值的潜在解决方案 • Phenomenal communication/presentation skills 较强的沟通/表达能力 • Thrive in a team environment and enjoy sharing ideas and best practices 融入团队，愿意分享知识和最佳实践 • Experience using digital selling tools such as Salesforce and TechTarget 使用过Salesforce and TechTarget 系统优先考虑

Business Development/Inside SalesTeam Leader, Greater China  As a member of the Stratasys inside sales team, this role drives the sales of Stratasys solutions through a proactive approach on phone / email / social media to existing and new accounts in China. Ideal candidate will work closely with internal marketing and sales members, as well as channel partners to research potential accounts, identify key players and source new sales opportunities before passing to sales team for development.  Essential Duties And Responsibilities Actively conduct demand generation activities such as outbound calls, personalized emails, networking, social media engagement to reach out to potential prospects, understand needs and generate interest to achieve quarterly targets Research accounts and identify key players in targeted industry or sub-segment based on sales requirement and market opportunities Partner with other functions (marketing, applications, customer support) to run outbound campaign to new prospects and installed base initiatives Match Stratasys solution and application to satisfy customer needs and pain points Maintain database and manage pipeline movement from lead creation, qualification to solution selection Route qualified opportunities to respective account manager or channel partner for further development and closure Respond in a timely manner to inbound inquiry from incoming phone, email, and website etc. by marketing, promotions and sales executives Act as primary point of contact for requests for information, quotes and general follow-up activities with the designated customer base Any other ad-hoc projects & tasks as per guided by management Education, Skills And Experience Minimum 3 years of enterprise/B2B inside sales or direct sales experience in the technology/high-tech/ hardware industry for cross-Asia region Native mandarin speaker (verbal and written) with excellent business English proficiency Self-motivated, result-driven and strong desire to succeed with a “can-do” spirit Outgoing personality with high listening skill working directly with customers in a consultative approach Associate degree in business administration, statistics or related field; university matriculated a plus Computer literate, proficient in MS office. Experienced with Salesforce.com, Analytic tools an advantage Possess conflict resolution skills and escalation management Ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines and adapt to changes in a fast-paced environment
