description: DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™  Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam.  More information can be found at www.dsm.com .  The Challenge  The Commercial Lead sets up value strategy for the entire sales organization. On transaction level this role is the gatekeeper to ensure execution of the set strategy in every deal. The Commercial Lead also plays an instrumental role in stipulating contracts and agreements with 3rd parties, by doing which company’s compliance of all kinds of laws are safeguarded. This includes especially conformity to anti-competition and anti-trust laws.  The Commercial Lead works with the global commercial team to jointly compose and update pricing policy for all product lines. This requires ongoing contacts with external environment and finding out truthful information for key decisions. The dynamics in the regional market represents a complex value chain which includes suppliers, distributors, traders and end users.  The role needs to handle internal negotiations with global supply sources so as to make sure there is a healthy balance between “honoring market’s voice” and “capturing best value” for our company. These discussions require logical thinking and a good skill of presentation of value chain.  On operational level the role approves contract deals within the authority. In case of disagreement with the sales organization the Commercial Lead needs to have constructive dialogue with the sales force. His/her own knowledge about the market development will help to have facts-based, meaningful conversations during these circumstances.  The role is also responsible for setting up and tracking budgets inside our systems. This requires high sensitivity and accuracy on details. Because a good system maintenance in order is not only critical for business steering, but also critical in inspiring each sales individual. Creation of a fair and accurate base of allocation is a People Business which is critical for the organization.  The Position  Key Areas of Accountability / Responsibility Pricing: Approve quotation Push quotation approval by communicating with commercial manager in Basel Communicating with sales, regional managers, distributors to implementing price strategy from HQ Attending biddings with sales, discuss bidding strategy before the bidding with HQ and responsible sales person, to make the success of the bidding Customer credit control: push payment by communicating with sales team. Law suit of long term overdue Credit limit and sign credit waver Communication with Finance to get the agreement on how to deal with over credit limit and overdue. Forecast and IBP Input forecast on a monthly basis for key products Ask regional managers for forecast updates on a quarterly basis for both TQ and premix Review IBP of both Straights and Premix, give decision and solution for slow moving products Allocation Monitor replenishment of key products P remix: view cost of each formula which need special price, discuss with sales to decide the price to offer. attend premix meeting to review and solve critical issues. Customer complain Budget Input MAMO information ( once per year) Goods and products return approval Authorities pricing for all product line pricing escalation to regional VP if beyond own authority all commercial terms, including value, volume, rebates, refunds, special logistics requirements all other contractual and legal terms within own authorities External market situations (dynamic, growth, many steps in value chain)  Multiple product lines  Diverse end-use industries  Gatekeeper positions (connection as mediator) between HQ and regional sales teams  Regional commercial and legal requirements and practices  People elements (need to connect and motivate internal teams without being the line manager)  The Ideal  This position needs to understand the commercial environment, the dynamics of the marketplace, the industries that it supports. Strong business acumen and communication skills are required. Strong analytical skills are mandatory, along with the ability to organize, motivate and influence others.  Minimum of 10 years' experience in related industry. Preference for experience in marketing/sales to the Food or Pharma industry.  Royal DSM is an equal employment opportunity and  affirmative action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Job Description  Highly motivated self-starter responsible for achieving assigned sales quotas and goals and for the overall sales strategies and results of a major geographic/continental area, region, or country. All sales are made through channel partners. Use and partner with Channel Partner Account Executives on lead generation, account planning and new account development and/or growing existing accounts.  Must effectively sell F5’s products and services using technical, interpersonal and customer knowledge to influence customers and assist them in applying the products/services to their needs resulting in revenue generation. This is typically an individual contributor role. This is a quota carrying role.  Primary Responsibilities  Responsible for identifying and qualifying long-term and short-term business opportunities and with enthusiasm identifying and addressing bold threats.  Develop relationships and use channel. Including account planning and lead generation with channel partners; building relationships and developing opportunities with channel partners by effectively communicating and demonstrating F5 solutions. This also involves training channel partners on the F5 story and technical solutions and developing a territory plan focused on channel use  Develop and deliver sales presentations and close sales in a professional and effective manner. Including: developing technical presentations and workshops  Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, technical developments and government regulations that effect target markets  Understand organization’s business needs, develop application of products and services and effectively communicate F5’s technical valued solutions to meet those needs. Including: researching and developing lists of potential customers; identifying and qualifying business opportunities, making regular sales calls to develop relationships and following-up on sales leads  Prepare formal proposals and present to all levels of the organization including executive level  Lead negotiations, coordinate complex decision-making process, overcome obstacles to closure and close sales in a professional and effective manner  Assume a leadership role in coordinating territory strategy and tactics for sales support team (inside sales, systems engineering, channel manager)  Assume full responsibility for accurate sales forecasting by demonstrating in-depth knowledge of sales cycles from initial contact through the procurement process and ensure SalesForce is utilized appropriately and maintained on a regular basis  Build and update annual account plans, figure out market strategies and goals for each product and service  Responsible for territory planning through research, development and maintenance of long and short range sales and marketing plans  Develop and maintain detailed account profiles for large accounts in territory, to be reviewed by management on a quarterly basis  Provide regular updates to manager concerning account issues, financial status, etc.  Meet or exceed sales quotas and revenue goals  Develop and maintain communications in a coordinated and professional manner with all levels of staff and customers  Support the APAC management team in special projects and strategic planning.  Responsible for upholding F5’s Business Code of Ethics and for promptly reporting violations of the Code or other company policies.  Performs other related duties as assigned.  The Job Description is intended to be a general representation of the responsibilities and requirements of the job. However, the description may not be all-inclusive, and responsibilities and requirements are subject to change.  Qualifications  Knowledge, Skills and Abilities  Bachelor degree or higher in business administration or engineering, or equivalent work experience.  At least 8 years of sales, or meaningful experience.  Should be hands-on and be able to perform the function independently.  Consistent track record in a fast-growing company of medium size from the information technology/networking industry.  Must have maturity in building interpersonal capability and sales growth whilst handling costs.  Language Requirements  Must be able to read, write and speak English and Mandarin fluently.  Must also be proficient in local language as this role supports our local customers.  Multiple language skills are a plus.  Background Screening  This role involves customer facing engagements and may be subject to additional background check requirements per customer requests. All screenings and results will be subject to applicable law and F5 policies, and may be used to figure out work assignment or further employment eligibility.  The Job Description is intended to be a general representation of the responsibilities and requirements of the job. However, the description may not be all-inclusive, and responsibilities and requirements are subject to change.Phishing Alert  Please note that F5 only contacts candidates through F5 email address (ending with @f5.com) or auto email notification from Yello/Workday (ending with f5.com or @myworkday.com).  Equal Employment Opportunity  It is the policy of F5 to provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and employment applicants without regard to unlawful considerations of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, sensory, physical, or mental disability,marital status, veteran or military status, genetic information, or any other classification protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws.This policy applies to all aspects of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, discipline, and termination. Reasonable accommodation is available for qualified individuals with disabilities, upon request.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Purpose of role： The role exists to manage local workshop partners in the sales territory. The role is accountable for delivery of the PCO IWS indirect workshop sales strategy and execution of market offer strategy. The role is also responsible of finding and developing prospect partners, and finally contribute to territory distributor’s sales performance. Accountabilities Implement country PCO IWS indirect business strategy within territory by translating it into clear business plans. Deliver IWS channel strategy by developing new customer and continuously improving existing customer in store share in top workshops. Work closely with IWS Territory Manager and Distributor Sales team to secure and improve Castrol market share in workshop level, and finally contribute significant financial performance to distributors. Leverage cross function resources and joint approach for the best outcome. Develop, agree (both internally and externally) and implement the market offer strategy with the Channel partner, providing permanent support in all areas of its contents, and in particular regarding: sales capability (skills and knowledge) customer offer deployment, coverage and satisfaction financial Return on Investment and cash flow performance brand representation and compliance HSSE and Ethical compliance Collect the information about the key customer database and manage the pipeline of key customer development. Develop and manage the business relationship with the key customers in the area by using the tools and resources smartly to deliver the desired business results. Share field findings and experience at team level, extracting comparable information. Improve and deliver customer experience in targeted sectors and customer groups. Ensure delivery of our promises by seeking continuous improvement and efficiency in all operations making sure the voice of the customer is represented in every decision we make. Drive standardization of our sales offers in line with our basic customer offer. Ensure that all activities conducted through 3rd parties or intermediaries in country comply fully with our own CoC and local competition legalisation. Ensure compliance with country regulations, bp Group, Segment and regional policies and standards. Experience & Expertise Minimum 3 years working experience in distributor sales and management Track record of delivery of sales targets and performance Experience/track record/confidence representing the company externally and dealing professionally with distributors and workshops. Experience of managing negotiations at senior level. Capability to work independently but also skillful on teamwork. Ability to develop and implement strategic and tactical business plans. Ability to be hands on and drive the business with direct responsibility Flexibility of thought and action to be able to respond to changing market environments and dynamic business situations Adapted for frequent business travel We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.

Job Description  This role is a CBA position who will manage Discrete Graphics business. This role will responsible for demand/supply management, revenue forecasts, rebate accruals and processes rebates for DGx product lines. He/She will be working closely with customer on demand collaboration and apply judgment based on roadmap and pricing strategy in order to provide accurate demand signal to factory. In addition, he/she will manage daily order fulfilment, revenue forecast management by considering all the key factors such as supply, customer raw demand, consumption, inventory, pricing strategy to provide accurate revenue forecast to BU Ops and field sales. For quarter end closing activities, he/she is required to support accrual booking, carry out quarterly SOX control on all relevant contracts to ensure 100% compliance and meet audit requirements.  Qualifications Bachelor degree preferred. Business, Economics or Supply Chain concentrations preferred. 2+ years related experience Excellent communication and collaboration skills Advanced working knowledge of Excel Ability to synthesize complex data into a clear actionable conclusions A 'can-do' approach and attitude, willingness to take informed risks in order to achieve desired organization and Intel goals Ability to quickly digest problems and drive solutions across a dynamic stakeholder base Innovative and self-directed Flexible and ability to embrace change in a fast paced environment Inside this Business Group  Intel's Sales and Marketing (SMG) organization works with global customers and partners to solve critical business problems with Intel based technology solutions. SMG works across business units to amplify the customer voice and deliver solutions that accelerate their business. We work across numerous industries, including retail, enterprise and government, cloud services and healthcare as examples. The operations team focuses on forecasting, driving alignment with factory production and delivering efficiency tools and our marketing capability drives demand and localized marketing in locations around the globe. Our sales force navigates a complex partner and customer ecosystem while shaping product roadmaps, driving value for our customers, and collaborating to harness emerging technology trends to deliver comprehensive solutions.

Are You Ready to Join Our Team? We are busy, growing quickly and have an incredible workforce who are committed to becoming the #1 Software company in the world. Come join HCL’s fast-growing, $1.8B+ software business and make an impact from Day 1! This is an exciting time to be joining HCL Software, as we expand, invest and grow. HCL Software is building a newly team of Digital Product Sales Specialist who will report to a Digital Product Specialist leader. This role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, expand and develop new business and actively seek new sales opportunities. HCL Software is the Software Business Unit of HCL Technologies. We have 20+ products in our Software Suite including - BigFix, Workload Automation, AppScan, DevOps, Domino, Notes, Connections, Same Time, Unica, Verse, Digital Experience, Commerce, Mainframe Solutions. People with Pre-Sales, Software consulting, IT Delivery role who are interesting in Sales are also welcome for this role.  We are building a Digital Sales Hub and we are looking for DevOps Product Sales Specialists. The Digital Product Sales Specialists DevOps are responsible for driving Enterprise Software Sales for the above-mentioned products in their territory. The individual will be responsible for the following:  • Deep understanding of any one of the HCL Software products or their competition. • Drive software license sales in their territory to achieve/exceed their sales targets. • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business. • Identify gaps in the client DevOps practice, process, and skills with the intent to address, educate, and bring their teams together to drive consensus through transparency and collaboration. • Articulate AHEAD’s framework and engagement approach around our DevOps offerings from a technical and business perspective • Understanding and experience with various cloud platforms such as Google and AWS. • Experience working with DevOps technology. • Ability to solve customer specific business problems and apply DevOps solutions. • Route qualified large deal opportunities to relevant Field Product Specialists or partners to pursue further. • Experience in “owning” a portfolio of accounts. • Sales Planning, Budgeting, Forecasting for their territory or cluster. • Ensure attainment of revenue and associated targets. • Will cold-call prospects that are generated by external sources of lead. • Demonstrable ability to communicate, present and influence key stakeholders at all levels of an organization. • Ability to learn and adapt quickly in a fast-paced, dynamic, team-oriented environment. • Proven ability to juggle and sell multiple products at a time, while maintaining sharp attention to detail. • Develop sales opportunities by researching and identifying potential accounts. • Set up and deliver sales presentations, product/service demonstrations, and other sales actions. • Provide updates and reporting on forecasting and other sales activities such as pipeline development and active deals as part regular sales cadence. • Emphasize product features and benefits, quote prices, discuss credit terms, and prepare sales order forms and/or reports.  Key Responsibilities • Demonstrated ability to convert prospects and close deals and achieve Sales Quotas. • opportunity qualification, pre-call planning, call control, account development, and time management • Success in qualifying opportunities involving multiple key decision makers. • Strong knowledge of sales principles, methods, practices, and techniques • Strong problem identification and objections resolution skills • Able to build and maintain lasting relationships with customers. • Capture customer information, identify key players, including addresses and phone numbers, for future follow-up. • Source new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound cold calls and emails • Route qualified opportunities to the appropriate sales Specialists for further development and closure. Team with channel partners to build pipeline and close deals. • Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas. • Deal Approvals & Delegation • Microsoft Dynamics CRM - Lead Management & Opportunity Management • Ensure sales, finance and legal policies and procedures are met as per HCL Software Legal Terms & Conditions  Candidate Specific Skills • Experience in Sales Management, Lead Generation; Offering Campaign Management • Experience and track record of carrying a sales quota for Bookings and Pipeline Creation in Digital Segment • Opportunity Identification & qualification; Business Development; Client Centric Marketing • In-depth understanding of the sales process • Strong analytical and organizational skills. Able to perform basic calculations and mathematical figures. • Self-motivated, with high energy and an engaging level of enthusiasm • Ability to meet travel requirements, when applicable • Ability to work individually and as part of a team. • Language Proficiency - Excellent in Malay, Cantonese, Mandarin  Job Specific Skills • Familiarity with HCL Software products • CRM skills, preferably with MS Dynamics and excel • Sales cadence and deal review experience • Excellent communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills in English   https://www.hcltech.com/candidate-privacy-notice

description: Main Work Content and Responsibilities: 1. Develop domestic and overseas autonomous driving markets, follow up existing customers and actively explore potential new customers in the region in charge. Target customers include: RoboTaxi/Bus/Truck technology companies, Mobility-as-a-Service companies, intelligent driving departments of automotive OEMs, pilot areas of intelligent transportation, etc.; 2. Follow up business processes, including customer quotation, sample trials, customer visit, business negotiation, contract signing, project payment etc.; 3. Collect key customer and market information, establish and maintain key accounts, update CRM information, manage key customer services, establish and maintain good relationships with key customers; 4. Regularly update the market demand and order forecasts, and manage projects overview; 5. Participate in industry-related exhibitions and conferences, and actively get involved the autonomous driving ecosystem.  Job Requirements: 1. Bachelor degree or above education, candidates whose major are science or engineering or with experience in AI industries are preferred; 2. Strong interest and clear career plan in AI, smart transportation and other high-tech industries; 3. Deep understanding of customer needs and sales processes, with strong negotiation skills and customer oriented service attitudes. 4. Attentive, responsible, persistent, and open-minded personality with strong communication, coordination, interpersonal and public speaking skills. 5. Good team work spirit, flexible and willing to go on domestic and overseas business trips. 6. Spoken English is not required for domestic account managers. Overseas market developers are required to: take English as a working language, and those who are familiar with different cultures/working styles in Europe, America, Asia-Pacific, etc. are preferred.  Job Highlights: 1. Opportunity to get deeply involved in intelligent driving projects of BAT level key accounts, and to enrich industry experiences. 2. Opportunity to build up and broaden a social network in the intelligent driving industry.

Job Title： Hitachi Vantara – Inside Sales Representative (内部/电话销售) Location: Beijing (北京)  What You'll Do 工作范围： You will build direct relationships with customers while working with channel partners to maximize new sales opportunities and renewals within your territory. 您将通过电话和客户及渠道合作伙伴直接建立联系，在您负责的领域内最大限度的开发新销售机会和拓展现有用户新需求。 You will manage all aspects of the full sales cycle to help customers reach their business goals. 您将负责并管理Hitachi Vantara解决方案的销售全流程，帮助客户实现其商业目标。 • You will position and sell the entire Digital Infrastructure portfolio. 您将通过电话的方式销售公司Digital Infrastructure（数字化基础架构）解决方案。 • You will seek to understand our customers’ business challenges and advise on the value derived from our solutions to address their pains. 您将通过电话的方式了解我们客户面临的业务挑战或者需求，并根据公司现有的解决方案给客户提供有价值的建议，帮助客户解决他们的业务挑战/困难。 • You will become a trusted advisor to help our customers with their immediate needs, as well as their long term goals. 成为客户信赖的顾问，满足他们目前的业务需求并帮助他们实现长期目标。 • You will accurately forecast your monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue streams; driving growth in your account base. 准确预测您的每月，季度和年度销售收益， 推动客户增加采购量。 • You will be responsible for driving new business, as well as fostering your account base. 开发更多的新客户，扩充您负责的区域内的客户资源。  Who You Are您是谁： • Goal-oriented and motivated by performance rewards 目标导向，以绩效奖励为动力 • Seek to achieve and exceed annual sales goals 努力实现并超过年度销售目标 • A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders 强有力的内部和外部合作者  Skills and Qualifications技能和任职资格： • 3+ years of B2B selling experience in a similar or adjacent industry 3 年以上B2B销售经验在IT行业或者相近行业优先考虑 • Experience owning the full sales cycle (prospecting, validating, negotiating, and closing the sale). 具备全流程销售经验背景 • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business 具有开拓者精神，积极开发新的商业机会并实现业务增长 • Demonstrate strong sales achievement (i.e., consistent achievement at or above quota, or a history YoY growth in your target market) 良好的销售业绩 • Passionate about sales and building positive relationships 拥有销售热情并积极拓展客户关系 • Possess strong business acumen and can articulate the value of a solution to address customers’ current and future needs 敏感的商业嗅觉， 清晰阐述Hitachi Vantara解决方案得价值，以解决客户当前或者未来得商业需求 • Engage in active listening to identify customers’ pain and help them derive the value and potential impact of a timely solution 积极倾听客户的痛点并及时给客户提供有价值的潜在解决方案 • Phenomenal communication/presentation skills 较强的沟通/表达能力 • Thrive in a team environment and enjoy sharing ideas and best practices 融入团队，愿意分享知识和最佳实践 • Experience using digital selling tools such as Salesforce and TechTarget 使用过Salesforce and TechTarget 系统优先考虑

description: About Us  Gore is a materials science company focused on improving lives through discovery, product innovation and rewarding careers for our Associates.  About The Industry  Saving lives and improving the quality of life for patients is at the core of everything we do. This meaningful work gives purpose to our lives and inspires us to create solutions that make a difference in the lives of others. Learn more at gore.com/products/industries  About The Role  We are looking for a Field Sales Associate to join our Medical Product Division Sale Team in Hangzhou, Zhejiang who will be accountable for meeting or exceeding the sales forecast in Zhejiang, Fujian provinces.  Responsibilities: Develop profitable sales opportunities, proactively make sales calls Develop new business to align with Gore business needs Ensure the KOL management, market data collection, etc., are effective, builds, maintains and defends long-term customer relationships Ensure the cooperation with other product specialists are active and constructive, to achieve team goals and objectives Implement value pricing principle, be a value seller, skilled in the use of premise-based forecasting techniques Implement Gore’s product strategy, understands the needs of the customer  Required Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in medical or medicine Proven sales background, preferably with a minimum of 5 years in the medical devices sales area Will have worked in or able to demonstrate an understanding of the imperatives of a business environment Clinical background in interventional areas or sales experience to this environment Strong communication and interpersonal skills A high level of self-motivation and passion, ensuring the ability to work under minimal supervision Commercial acumen High integrity Capable and ability to travel extensively up to 60% and attend weekend conferences as required  What We Offer  At Gore, we want our Associates to have fulfilling careers driven by curiosity and commitment. In return, we commit to our Associates by offering comprehensive, competitive rewards in the form of compensation, benefits, an Associate stock ownership-type plan, and opportunities for growth and development. Learn more at gore.com/careers  We believe in the strength of a diverse workforce and inclusive work environment. In support of our values and continued success we are proud of Associates around the world who support an inclusive work environment, strive to reflect the diversity of the communities where we operate, and ensure all Associates and external partners are treated with fairness, dignity and respect.  Our Talent Acquisition Team welcomes your questions via email at AP_TA@wlgore.com  Job  Sales  Primary Location  Asia-Pacific-CN-SH-Jing'an  Travel%  60%  Shift  Day  Schedule  Full-time

工作目标  向PLS/MOE学校提出解决方案，以支持学习者提高学习效率； 在指定区域内推动销售增长，达到月度/年度财务目标； 收集和分析客户的需求痛点来促进业务创新  主要职责 1 华南区核心城市的业务维护及开发（深圳市） a) 深圳市国际学校及大中型教培机构客户的维护与开发 b) 配合Spark独家代理商进行全国性渠道的开发与整合工作 c) 制定销售计划，包括潜在客户的生成、跟踪和推进。 d) 及时了解和评估竞争对手和竞品，确保培生在市场上保持竞争优势。 e) 对指定区域的销售渠道进行管理与维护，确保经销商向学校提供高质量的服务 f) 主动开发终端用户，并维护集中数据库  2. 华南区域内新客户、新业务模式的开发 a) 广东省内（东莞、佛山、惠州、珠海等）科技公司的合作 b) 新的业务模式的开展，如电子授权、OMO、定制出版等 c) 新的客户群体开发与合作（少年宫、图书馆）  3. 华南区域核心省份的业务开发（福建省） a) 分析该区域市场机会，识别关键目标客户，特别是对巨大潜力的客户，建立联系数据库。与潜在客户建立初步沟通或跟进有效人员(经理，销售代表等) 提供的线索，促进项目发展。 b) 传统学校/机构客户的开发（侧重语言类素质教育培训） c) 新业务类型、新合作方式（与教育科技类公司合作，发展新的项目及业务模式）  4. 业务单位的职责 a) 按要求向部门经理提交月度报告。 b) 确保部门经理及时了解业务问题。 c) 与业界紧密合作，建立互信，以创新解决方案，满足学校未满足的需求  工作要求  a) 至少5年以上B2B行业销售计划和执行经验，有教育行业和跨国公司经验者优先 b) 具备商务专业水平的中英文沟通能力; 具备专业的英文邮件写作能力，口语流利者优先 c) 有条理、系统的思考者和执行者 d) 能够在没有监督的情况下工作 e) 学校能力强并好学 f) 支持团队工作 g) 愿意经常出差  亮点  a) 有教育部门工作经验，尤其是学校工作经验者优先。 b) 有中小学(K-12) 工作经验者优先。 c) 有跨国公司工作经验者优先。 d) 有海外留学/工作经验者优先。

Background and Executive Summary Our Business is growing exponentially in China and in order to provide better service to the local customers, distributors, and end-users, we are looking for an experienced Inside Sales Service Specialist to join our team, Location is in Guangzhou, China. The new team member will alleviate the workload of the Richmond team and strengthen physical communications within China. The role will take care of the operation and process after the orders are finalized with the customers. She/He will have access to the company’s SAP system and cooperate with customer accounts or other relevant departments within the mills. This person will also handle the receiving and dispatching of all samples.  Job description - Knowledge of SAP and entering orders into SAP system - Follow-up with customers; proactively inform customers of the status of their orders and provide the proper details to answer questions. - Pursue production, logistic, and delivery details and troubleshoot any issues regarding orders. - Close communication with customers and sales - Daily sales operation and supporting - Able to work collaboratively with various departments to resolve customer issues - Collaboration and regular meetings with the key players at the mill - Samples management and record keeping.  Qualifications: - 5-8 years experience or Import/Export knowledge preferred - Knowledge of paper and packaging industry preferred but not mandatory - Excellent Word, Excel, PowerPoint, must have SAP system skills - Excellent written and spoken English - Cross-functional collaboration and teamwork project management skills - Good problem solving with a strong analytical sense - Customer and results-oriented, can work under pressure - Quick and careful learner, can work efficiently and effectively - Self-disciplined and self-motivated; Independent

description: Investment Bank Associate Position - China July 22, 2021  Location: Beijing or Shanghai  Pacific Gate Partners is a cross border middle market investment bank. Our clients are American and European high-tech companies interested in strategic partnerships with Chinese industrial groups or Private equity funds for corporate financing, commercial development, merger and acquisitions.  Role  The retained candidate will participate to the successful execution the sales of client’s mandates. He or she will be sourcing prospects in public and state-owned companies as wells as in private equity funds interested in investing in or acquiring our client. The role will also include assistance of our clients all along the evaluation of and by prospects, the negotiation of the T&Cs and the closing.  Job Duties  Working as a team member, the sales duties will include the following.  Develops and maintains a corporate, individual, institutional and SOE prospects base Identifies prospects having a strategic interest in investing, acquiring or merging with clients Successfully secures corporate financing on behalf of clients Successfully secures mergers and acquisitions on behalf of clients Guides clients through negotiations with investors or acquirers to optimize terms and conditions while securing a successful transaction Works extremely long hours during busy seasons and as demand warrants  Skills and Qualifications  The selected candidate will have at least the following profile or better. One year experience in Investment banking sales positions, ideally in TMT sector Proven knowledge and competencies in analytical reasoning, research, statistics, and investing; Plus experiences in various legal issues  Personal Skills include： Critical Thinking, Decision Making and Problem Solving, Verbal and Written Communication Skills in both English and Mandarin; Interpersonal Skills.  Personal attitude in working environment includes: Organization, Attention to Detail, Multitasking, Working under pressure Able to travel up to 50% of the time Ambition, Ethics and an acute sense of Responsibility. Bachelor or Master Degree in Electronic Engineering or Financial majors is preferred

该职位来源于猎聘  Responsibilities Pre-sales activity will include delivery of technical expertise during the sales process including presentations, seminars, individual consultation, and hands-on demo experiments if needed. Executes technical and application based presentations on illumina’s sequencing and microarray platforms, applications and/or workflows. Post-sales activity includes working with post-installation customers providing additional workflow or applications training in strategically important labs. Supporting/assisting customers with sequencing assay design to accelerate adoption of targeted sequencing on illumina’s platforms. Attendance at tradeshows/conferences in relevant fields. Be the point person for dedicated illumina User Group Meetings in collaboration with field marketing and support team to provide sample to data workflow training Assists sales and field marketing on new strategic initiatives requiring both technical and market knowledge Works collaboratively with territory account managers, marketing, service and support teams to ensure effective account/customer management and communication through pre-sales, during and- post-sales cycle, including review and meeting account pull through targets and goals Escalates technical issues to Technical Support for possible resolution for strategically important labs. Develops and maintain positive relationships with customers in assigned territory Listed responsibilities are an essential, but not exhaustive list, of the usual duties associated with the position. Changes to individual responsibilities may occur due to business needs.  Preferred Requirements Life science industry experience preferred Applied Market Knowledge is a plus Extensive experience and understanding of leading genetics technologies and how they can be applied. Detailed knowledge of technological developments and trends in the sequencing markets Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills in Mandarin and English. Strong negotiation skills and ability to persuade Ability to travel within region to carry out primary responsibilities. All listed requirements are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.  Preferred Experience/Education Typically requires a Bachelor’s degree and a minimum of 0-2 years of related experience; or equivalent work experience. 岗位概述  Responsibilities 售前活动将包括销售过程中的技术知识演讲，如介绍演讲、研讨会、个别咨询等，在必要时，进行演示实验。 对因美纳测序和微阵列平台的应用或工作流程进行技术层面和应用层面的介绍。 售后活动包括与安装产品后的客户的协调，提供在具有重要战略意义的实验室中所需的工作流程或应用培训 支持/辅助客户的相关测序阵列设计，加快在客户因美纳平台上目标测序进程。 参加相关领域的展览会/大会。 作为与现场营销和支持团队合作的专项人员参加因美纳用户组会议，提供样品数据工作流程培训。 提供销售或现场营销新战略项目时所需有关技术和市场知识。 与区域客户经理、营销、服务和支持团队合作工作，保证有效的大客户/客户管理以及负责售前、售中和售后过程的沟通，包括回访和会面已经取得成果或达成目标的客户。 作为技术支持提供技术升级，为具有重要战略意义的实验室提供可能的解决方案。 提升和维护责任区域内客户的良好关系。 以上所列的任务和职责是本岗位的基本功能。然而，各种商务条件下可能需要完成额外的任务和职责。  Preferred Requirements 有生命科学行业经验者优先 有应用市场知识者加分 具有领先的遗传学技术及其应用方面的丰富经验和充分理解 具有技术发展和测序市场趋势的详细知识 优秀的中文普通话和英文口头和书面交流和介绍演讲技能 良好的谈判技巧和说服能力 能在负责区域内出差并完成主要职责 Preferred Experience/Education 科学学科的硕士以上学历（分子生物学、遗传学、或基因组学和/或生物信息学优先）

description: Primary Purpose            We're looking for an enthusiastic CRM Associate Manager, who will be responsible for improving and managing the customer journey on different platforms including Ecommerce and Retail channels. companyName: 复纳科学仪器(上海)有限公司
description: 你的日常工作包括（岗位描述） 1、负责Forge Nano原子层沉积（ALD）相关产品在在中国市场的推广及销售工作; 2、参加各种学术会议及研讨会，为客户介绍ALD表面工程的优点,普及ALD知识； 3、与客户保持密切沟通，并将客户需求传达给技术团队，协助完善产品定制并提供客户反馈以进行改进  4、与管理团队沟通客户需求、产品开发和生产需求，并快速解决客户的技术问题 5、开发潜在客户、跟进有效意向客户、制定方案、发布报价转化订单； 6、维护既有用户关系、提供相关技术支持。  我们希望你（任职资格）: 1、化工、材料或相关专业的硕士或者博士毕业； 2、愿意接受新事物，有开创精神，乐于奉献； 3、卓越的沟通能力和客户服务意识； 4、出色的研究和提出解决方案的能力； 5、优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员； 6、精通英语书面和口语； 7、能够接受频繁出差和年度出国。  优先招聘: 1、具有原子层沉积（ALD）设备销售经验最佳； 2、具有向汽车、电池、催化剂、3D打印或其他化学行业中的实验室、大学、一级供应商和OEM销售过研发服务、收费制造服务以及实验室或工业规模设备的经验。  产品简介 Forge Nano Inc.是使用原子层沉积（ALD）进行表面工程和工业级高精纳米涂层的全球领导者，创始之初便获得了大众集团以及LG集团总计2000万美金的初始投资。Forge Nano致力于通过纳米技术为工业带来突破性的技术革新。我们正在寻找杰出的人才以担任技术销售经理这一重要的角色！技术销售经理将负责目标市场的销售和业务开发工作——识别新客户、新业务机会并与我们的客户保持长期关系。你将与营销和技术团队紧密合作，以成功执行、开发和完善公司的销售计划。该重要角色主要负责为中国市场客户原子层沉积表面工程技术的前景、积极确保健康的销售渠道，并使用公司CRM软件在所有阶段跟踪销售过程。

description: Senior Sales Representative  UPT Equipment, UOP China  Summary  UOP is a wholly owned subsidiary of Honeywell. It is an international supplier of process technology, products, equipment, engineered systems, and technical services to the petroleum refining, petrochemical, gas processing and energy industries and is a leader in the research and development of petroleum and petrochemical processing. Our broad objectives center on the continual development and improvement of petroleum refining technology.  This position is for equipment sales activities in the assigned region and reports to the Sr. Sales Manager, UPT China.  MAJOR AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY include the following (Other duties may be assigned):  Product lines: Technologies and Equipment for Refining and Petrochemicals Industries, including PET solid state polycondensation (SSP) projects;  Customer base: Refining, Petrochemicals, Chemical Fiber Producers and EPC contractors in China;  Meet individual sales target and provide good contribution to meet the team target;  Develop effective customer relationships through the sales process;  Work with UOP technical teams to prepare, translate and issue technical proposals and technical presentations;  Make technical presentations to customers, design institutes and EPCs;  Draft, negotiate, and finalize appropriate technical and commercial agreements;  Prepare project specific technical and sales strategies for each sales event;  Organize and lead internal RFQ/proposal review and bid strategy meetings;  Gather competitive intelligence;  Work with customers to set expectations for UOP’s service interaction by working closely with UOP’s regional service managers;  Act as a gateway into UOP for refining and petrochemicals customers in region;  Provide needed background and context information to allow UOP to determine best path forward with specific customer needs and requests;  Assist SBU management with managing the interface with key clients;  Assist in identifying and communicating cross-SBU project opportunities to the relevant SBU.  Candidate must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily, per Honeywell standards. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.  Basic Qualifications  University level engineering degree (Chemical Engineering, Chemical Fiber, Chemical Machinery, Equipment preferred);  At least 5 years working experience with preference given to the Refining, Petrochemicals or a related industry. Ideally the candidate has experience for PET bottle grade polycondensation (SSP);  PC literate;  Able to communicate fluently in English and Chinese, both spoken & written;  Demonstrated communication and interpersonal skills;  Strong presentation skills and verbal and written communication skills;  An ability to work independently;  Strong analytical skills;  Building Strong relationships;  Strong desire to win;  Highly motivated;  Team player;  Customer focus;  Comfortable with 50% travel.  Additional Information JOB ID: HRD138079 Category: Sales Location: #1 Building, No.14 Jiu Xian Qiao Road,ChaoYang District,Beijing,BEIJING,100016,China Exempt

description: Have we got a job for you?!  Senior Business Development Manager, Shenzhen, China  Build Your Career | Have Fun | Make a Difference  About Payoneer  Payoneer’s mission is to empower businesses to go beyond – beyond borders, limits and expectations. In today’s digital world, Payoneer enables any business of any size from anywhere to access new economic opportunities by making it possible to transact as easily globally as they do locally.  Payoneer’s digital platform streamlines global commerce for millions of small businesses, marketplaces and enterprises from 200 countries and territories. Leveraging its robust technology, compliance, operations and banking infrastructure, Payoneer delivers a suite of services that includes cross-border payments, working capital, tax solutions and risk management. Powering growth for customers ranging from aspiring entrepreneurs in emerging markets to the world’s leading digital brands like Airbnb, Amazon, Google and Upwork, Payoneer makes global commerce easy and secure.  Payoneer Has Accumulated Numerous Prestigious Accolades, Including But Not Limited To  Payoneer is a leading fintech company built to disrupt today’s way of commerce.  Payoneer - one world, one platform, endless opportunities.  About Payoneer China  Ever since its inception, Payoneer China has grown at a blistering speed with 250+ employees serving hundreds of thousands of customers. Payoneer China currently is the market leader in cross border payments for ecommerce, B2B trade, and mobile applications. We are also well positioned to grow our business into other business verticals, delivering a portfolio of products and services.  This is a unique opportunity for talents to participate in a fast moving environment to provide disruptive products and solutions that solve real commercial challenges. It is also a great opportunity to super charge your career and to amplify professional growth, business acumen, and cross industry experience.  We’re looking for  We’re looking for an experienced Senior Business Development Manager, based in our Shenzhen or Shanghai office to join our China team. description: Why We Work at Dun & Bradstreet  We are at a transformational moment in our company journey - and we’re so excited about it. Each day, we are finding new ways to strengthen our award-winning culture, and to accelerate creativity, innovation and growth. Our purpose is to help customers improve business performance with Dun & Bradstreet’s Data Cloud and Live Business Identity, and we’re wildly passionate and committed to this purpose. So, if you’re looking to make an immediate impact at a company that welcomes bold and diverse thinking, come join us!  Requirements 1.利用公司提供的或者自己获得的销售线索, 通过电话或者面谈形式联系到企业相关负责人，展开对邓白氏注册企业身份验证信用认证与展示服务产品的顾问式销售工作。 2.定期与合作客户进行沟通，建立和维持良好的长期合作关系。 Ability 1.本科及以上学历，普通话流利。 2.具备良好的沟通与逻辑表达能力以及谈判能力，有销售或客服经验者尤佳。 3.逻辑思维清晰，有团队荣誉感。 4.有服务或咨询类无形产品的销售经验者优先 Dun & Bradstreet is an Equal Opportunity Employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, age, national origin, citizenship status, disability status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, genetic information, protected military and veteran status, ancestry, marital status, medical condition (cancer and genetic characteristics) or any other characteristic protected by law. We are committed to Equal Employment Opportunity and providing reasonable accommodations to qualified candidates and employees. description: Job Description  Reporting to associate director - marketing communications A&P, the marcom manager – B2B should lead brand building initiatives and implementation aiming to achieve No. 1 brand preference and consideration among business customers; include A&D and Developers.  This role will collaborate across multiple business functions; i.e. category strategy, product marketing, marcom, trade marketing, project sales team and technical support team to ensure unified campaign strategy, clear roles and responsibilities, sequenced execution and implementation of campaigns.  This Position Is Accountable On Below Items Support associate director of Marcom A&P to identify marcom B2B objectives, KPIs and strategy. Craft annual B2B campaign proposal and calendar with consensus among key stakeholders of business and organization. Collaborate with research team to explore and identify the insights ofvarious types of customers respectively and drive actions based on the findings and implications. Collaborate with creative team and design/industry media to initiate topics and generate contents. Develop measurement matrix as the evaluation of effectiveness of the campaign and generate post campaign report. Collaborate with PR and Project Trade Marketing team to explore opportunities for brand to leverage; include industry seminar, Designer Events, Awards etc. Develop and consolidate relationship with industry media, KOLs (design guru) and guilt to probe valuable cooperation for endorsement. As a champion of 2B campaign to lead and coordinate across functions; drive the progress, facilitate cooperation, optimize resources, control the budget and ensure an on time delivery of key result s . Requirements  Skills/Requirements  Above 10 years experience and have a good track record in marketing communications. Having B2B communication experience is an advantage for this position.  University degree; prefer major in business or communication  Proficient in both written and spoken English  Knowledge of architecture and design industry is preferred.  Good leadership, Self-motivation, Strong accountability  Good project management, communication and coordination skill.  Good Team Player. Requirements Above 10 years experience and have a good track record in marketing communications. Having B2B communication experience is an advantage for this position. University degree; prefer major in business or communication Proficient in both written and spoken English Knowledge of architecture and design industry is preferred. Good leadership, Self-motivation, Strong accountability Good project management, communication and coordination skill. Good team player. Why Work at Kohler Co.?  Kohler Co.'s mission is to contribute to a higher level of gracious living for those who are touched by our products and services. We understand that it takes investment in our associates’ development to make that happen.So, we offer ongoing investment in each individual’s personal development and the opportunity to collaborate with others across functions and roles at Kohler.  In addition to the investment in your development, Kohler offers a benefits package including a competitive salary, health, vision, dental, 401(k) with company matching, and more!  About Us  Beyond the competitive benefits and compensation, Kohler proudly offers a rich history, steeped in creativity and a commitment to our associates and communities.We invite you to learn more about our culture and company at www.kohlercompany.com .  It is Kohler’s policy to recruit, hire, and promote qualified personnel in all job classifications without regard to race, creed, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, disability or veteran status.If, as an individual with a disability, you need reasonable accommodation during the recruitment process, please contact kohlerjobs@kohler.com . Kohler Co. is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer.

About Us 工作职责财务回报 监督竞争对手的活动并协助监察市场动态。 在洲际酒店集团的范围内将销售线索提供给适合的人员。 根据在销售策略中既定目标，向新的、现有的、有可能的客户进行销售，并与其谈判商定最适合的价 格以争取最大的利润。 销售酒店的所有设施。 设立和保持定期的销售拜访模式，与目标市场的主要人物会面。 进行市场调研和分析。 根据酒店的营业需要，与业务联系人、会务策划者、游客和会展局、旅行社、旅游运营商、航空公司、公司客户、政府部门和其它客人发展并保持联系。 需要时出差对酒店进行推销，发展潜在的业务机会。 监测现有业务，并在销售策略会上提出建议以扩大业务。 发展现有业务，并建立和寻找发展业务的机会。员工团队 及时与运营部门进行沟通。 与会务统筹部进行沟通并保持良好的关系。宾客体验 通过客户管理，向现有的客户提供服务。 对客户进行拜访。 招待客户。 策划并实施使客人熟悉环境的现场考察活动。 对客人的需求作出反应以超越客人的期望。 保持高质量的出品和服务以便在向客人销售酒店服务和设施时说明。 当客人提出请求时,协助和陪同客人到达他要去的酒店区域。 了解酒店的特别推广计划和活动以便在客人有需求的时候做出回应。 了解酒店目前的所有信息以便向客人提供咨询。 执行能够提高客人满意体验的工作程序。企业责任 配合酒店的节能计划。 配合人事部，做好酒店对社区的义务工作。 Your day to day 任职要求技能要求 具有代表酒店，品牌和公司与顾客，员工和第三方交往的能力 具有解决问题，推理，号召，组织和培训能力 精通微软办公软件 良好的写作技能学历 最好具有市场营销，酒店管理，商业管理或相关领域的学士学位或大专学历。经验 1-2年相关工作经验，或与此相当的教育与工作经验结合的背景。 Apply

工作职责:  The Field Account Manager will be responsible for revenue growth within an assigned group of accounts, proactively selling the full range of the BioProcess portfolio, and developing strong customer relationships in order to leverage our position within the target organizations. Position:  Field Sales Representative  Job Description:  Define critical markets and new customers in the assigned sales territory, plan strategy and develop all key relationships to ensure strong foundation for solution selling. Maintain and promote relationships with customer contacts who may be determining design opportunities and deal with existing business challenges. Ensure customer satisfaction as it pertains to supply chain management and other value added services. Requires experience interacting with vendors and customers in a technical and engineering environment. Extensive understanding of pricing programs and models within the electronics industry. Must be able to prepare comprehensive internal quarterly business reviews (iQBR), presenting strategic plans and implementation steps to grow sales, demand creation and improve customer service. Ability to lead regular QBRs with major customers that unlock additional sales opportunities. Experience creating demand for Arrow products and services. Ability to work with engineers and designers to specify, select and resolve electronic board designs with Arrow franchised suppliers. Must be able to promote and sell the value add, supply chain, and full life cycle programs offered by Arrow. Requires proficiency in sales tracking systems, SalesForce.com, Oracle Establish and build relationships with key suppliers. Job Complexity  Has limited discretion to vary from established procedures Works under general supervision Beginning to solve some straightforward problems Has limited work experience involving basic concepts and procedures but requires formal training in theories/concepts in own function Experience / Education  Typically requires a 4 year degree and 2–4 years of related experience; or an advanced degree without experience; or equivalent work experience.  Location:  CN-Shenzhen, China (Honghua Rd)  Time Type:  Full time  Job Category:  Sales

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Manage all aspects of engagements with existing and new customers for our UOP organization. You will build relationships and understand customer business in order to provide appropriate products or solutions. You will define sales and growth strategy toward key customers while aligning with critical sales business objectives. You will identify opportunities and build credibility with customers Utilize your product knowledge to deliver the value proposition to the customers  Key Responsibilities Develop strong and solid pipeline and update it in SFDC timely. Deliver agreed sales AOP and revenue. Develop account planning through the sales process. Organize and lead internal RFQ/proposal review and pricing/bid strategy meetings. Prepare and issue commercial offers. Draft, negotiate, and finalize appropriate agreements to close sales. Forecast sales with high accuracy - Project description, estimated contract value, timing, probabilities and actions. Prepare project specific sales strategies for each sales event. Gather competitive intelligence for submission to Product Line Managers and Marketing. Manage receivable collection efforts with finance staff. Work with customers to set expectations for UOP's service interaction by working closely with UOP's project managers. Complete win/loss reports for projects in a timely fashion. Assist SBU management with managing the interface with key clients. Assist in identifying and communicating cross-SBU project opportunities to the relevant SBU Assist Sales Leader in developing sales strategies to drive growth. YOU MUST HAVE Bachelor's degree (or above) in Chemical or Mechanical Engineering. At least 10 years Sales and/or technical experience with preference given to refinery & petrochemical, or a related industry, such as coal chemical or steel industry. Ideally the candidate will have significant sales related (Account Management) experience. PC literate. Able to communicate effectively in English, both spoken & written. WE VALUE Demonstrated communication and interpersonal skills. An ability to work independently and under the pressure. Strong analytical skills. Building Strong relationships. Strong desire to win. Highly motivated. Team player. Customer orientation. Technical or application mindset. Experience in a global organization. Comfortable with 50% travel. Strong presentation skills and verbal and written communication skills Strong business acumen, bias for action and results orientation.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  职责描述： Build solid, long-lasting relationships with our client's management. Increasing sales with existing clients. Seeking new clients to achieve current and future budget objectives. Introduction of new products and handling of customer briefs. 任职要求： Proven Sales and Marketing Experience in Fragrance business. Are you interested in demand planning management?  The LEGO always make contribution to the world and has a transparent and open culture in daily work. We are looking for the excellence talent who can bring your demand planning management experience to grow up with LEGO.   Core Responsibilities   Develop and deliver a portfolio demand plan that takes input from both Marketing and Sales, facilitates agreement with Marketing/Sales on plan and prepares plan and recommendation for China Leadership Team along with assumptions/risk assessment for final approval of formal submission of MG China Monthly work with Marketing on flow plan by portfolio incorporating investment & activity plan Responsible for SKU level forecast by month (through exception based planning), including submission in system Work with both Marketing and Sales on SKU level transition plan, track execution and call out risk and drive agreement when off-track Manage portfolio productivity with Marketing/Sales by target setting and driving necessary action Drive agile action to address new demand trend at weekly cadence and incorporate the insight into long-term plan   Play your part in our team succeeding  The scope of the Market Operations team is to deliver best-in-industry in-stock availability and retail stock turns with optimized  operational cost via excellent demand planning and execute best practice order management and customer service. The department is a part of the MG China organization.  Do you have what it takes?   5+ years experience of forecasting or planning in a consumer products company (working experience involved S&OP preferred) Bachelor degree or above from recognized university Excellent in MS office, excel, PPT Fluent in both Chinese and English   Join the global LEGO family  Children are our role models. Their curiosity, creativity and imagination inspire everything we do. We strive to create a diverse, dynamic and inclusive culture of play at the LEGO Group, where everyone feels safe, valued and they belong.  The LEGO Group is proud to be an equal opportunity and an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, colour, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status.  We support our employees in being there for the moments that matter in life and celebrate families of all kinds, the loved ones that make us who we are. Being part of the LEGO Group also means taking part in our annual Play Day, playing a part in building a sustainable future and continuing our mission to “inspire and develop the builders of tomorrow.”  The LEGO Group is fully committed to Children’s Rights and Child Wellbeing across the globe. Candidates offered positions with high engagement with children are required to take part in Child Safeguarding Background Screening, as a condition of the offer.  Thank you for sharing our global commitment to Children’s Rights.  Build your career brick by brick at the LEGO Group.

jobTitle: Corporate Assistant Sales Manager / Account Manage
description: 该职位来源于猎聘  职责描述：   Promoting cross selling across regions and business units and identify new potential business opportunities from global account.   Develop and maintain account relationships within and global account’s organization, with national wide Coverage.   Formulating cross-business-unit / Cross region solutions to fulfil end to end supply chain strategy.   Achieve the sales target which assigned on monthly/yearly basis.   Provide solution to critical operational issues. Involve local office team for issue resolving and new project implementation.   Lead responses to RFQ/RFP of the global accounts and drive the implementation afterwards.   Establish long-term strategic partnership with clients, account management, bid management and contract negotiation;   Support other internal organizations to secure the business opportunities or sales leads;   Share valuable market information within the team and the network for management strategic decision making;   Develop extensive knowledge of the customers’ industry, their customers and their critical business issues, incl. finance, operation and the supply chain.   Regularly review with customers on achievement of performance outcomes including collation of customer agreed KPI’s, organize the regular meeting with operations and service team.   Contract renewal or any new RFQ tendered for incremental business from the accounts.  任职要求： Bachelor degree, major in Logistics/Sales Marketing related preferred. 3 years relevant working experience. Deep understanding of Contract Logistics strategy, products and solutions for price, cost and commercial preferred. Familiar with local business environment and international business development trends, good sense of the industry development trend and requirements; Familiar with international logistics operation environment preferred; Project management skill, ability to find and develop new business and to write up logistics solution proposal. Self-motivated, proactive working attitude, leading, optimistic personality and capable to work in team Good command of English (written & spoken), excellent presentation skill, excellent communication and interpersonal skills Good PC skills, eg. Word, Excel, PPT, etc.

description: Job Location: SH & Shenzhen  工作职责: 协助商务团队完成客户的录入流程，准备录入流程所需文件，协调并跟进Salesforce进度; 根据客户需求和商务节奏，制定项目计划，跟进控制项目流程、进度及质量，跟进项目验收和交付等各项工作: 针对内部团队，沟通井协调资源资源，对项目交付过程中的问题主动进行及时跟进与解决; 了解并同时管理多个项目，并按照优先级进行管理，协助完成项目文档的归档和汇总: 协助提升商务团队的管理效率，并完成商务团队的任何其他临时任务;  职位要求: 本科以上学历; 有2年以上项目管理经验，熟悉项目管理工具和方法; 具有开放心态，强Owner意识，和出色的快速学习能力; 具备优秀的团队协调能力，以自标为导向，协助客户和团队沟通和解决问题: 学习能力 及执行力强，富有创新意识，能承受-定的工作压力; 英文读写流利，听说流利者优先考虑;  Please send me your updated resume if you are interested: renee.yang@surrienta.com

Huntsman’s PU Elastomers Division is now searching for a Sales Account Manager at Guangzhou. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving business on the aggressive growth path, penetrate and expand market share of footwear in PU and TPU, Strengthen stakeholder connection in casual and safety shoes field. This role is an individual contributor.  As The Sales Account Manager, You Will Fully comply with PU elastomer policy and EFUS1ON core value Sales budget fulfillment, manage the business to deliver the budget sales volume / value / contribution margin. Business management to exist and potential customers Well organize customer management and identify new business gain and penetrate into new market to expand FW market share under the guidance of sales manager. Business ownership to drive customer growth up and further move up system goods portfolio to cover unmet needs; Work closely with distributors to retain customer relationship and seek new opportunity, regularly review and manage distributor to generate clearly picture for end users’ business; Support market and brand, OEM to build up pipeline on whole value chain, work with cross functional team such as CS, Finance, production and supply chain to follow up order process and improve service quality. Provide high quality service to existing Tesla owner community. Help Tesla enthusiasts and future owners stay up to speed with Tesla by promoting company’s updated news. Careers that Change Lives  A Day in the Life  Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned. Promotes and sells Medtronic's products and services within an assigned geographic area and /or specific customer accounts to meet or exceed sales targets. Responsible for developing, building, and strengthening long-term relationships with stakeholders including distributors and healthcare professionals. Responsible for pursuing leads, assessing needs and providing product services to maximize the benefits derived from Medtronic's products and/or services. Promotes and establishes education of the company's products and/or services. Conducts market research including customers and competitors activities. Implements market development plans/strategies and changes as needed. Communicates customer feedback on new products and/or modifications to existing products or applications to internal stakeholders including R&D, Operations and Marketing. Must Have: Minimum Requirements Bachelors degree required Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience and working knowledge of company products and services Nice to Have  About Medtronic  Together, we can change healthcare worldwide. At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology, therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life. We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday. It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.  We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives. Help us shape the future.  Physical Job Requirements  The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)  Additional Information Posting Date: May 30, 2021 Travel: No

description: As the industry leader in water technology, we’re growing and need talented people like you to help us continue to protect the world’s most vital resource.  Nalco Water, an Ecolab Company, seeks a Business Development Manager to join its industry leading sales team. You’ll be responsible for revenue and profit growth of programs and services in targeted accounts. Using a consultative sales approach, you’ll build relationships with existing customers by executing system assurance programs that meet their key business needs. With strong account leadership, you’ll also convert strategic competitive accounts and sell new technologies to current customers.  What’s In It For You You’ll join a growth company offering a competitive base salary, bonus structure and benefits A company vehicle and cell phone A long term, advancing career path in service, sales or management Access to the industry’s most innovative training programs Support from a dedicated technical service team A culture that values safety first, including training and personal protection Pride in working for a company that provides clean water, safe food, abundant energy and healthy environments What You Will Do Execute strong team leadership by coaching and training other District Reps, championing corporate initiatives, and by planning and leading portions of District Meetings Generate and execute sales plans and strategies to close new opportunities within existing customer base, and in major, competitively-held accounts, to meet defined territory profit increase goals. Target % sales time will be approximately Work closely with large, strategic current and prospective customers to understand business needs and recommend continuous improvement and innovation plans that will maintain and grow sales within assigned territory Develop strong relationships with key stakeholders within current and prospective customers, including plant or facility executives Engage in problem solving by performing system analysis, interpreting data and providing written recommendations to ensure customer operations are performing at optimal levels Demonstrate the ability to stabilize jeopardy business in large, strategic accounts Territory/Location Information: This position is based in Territory covers about a radius of the surrounding area Targeted accounts are within the industries <%> overnight travel required As a trusted partner, your customers will rely on you for their success. Nalco Water is committed to seeing you succeed and provides innovative training programs to ensure you’re prepared to solve any customer problem.  Training programs are held in the field and at Nalco Water Headquarters in Naperville, IL; travel is arranged and paid for by Nalco Water. Based on your skill level and experience, topics covered may include technology, product, service, business and industry acumen, direct coaching and mentoring, sales management and leadership, classroom training and certifications.  If applicable, relocation assistance would be provided for the right candidate>  Minimum Qualifications Bachelor's degree Five years of technical sales or field sales support experience Possess a valid Driver's License and acceptable Motor Vehicle Record Immigration sponsorship is not available for this role Preferred Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in engineering (chemical, mechanical, industrial) or life sciences (biology, chemistry, etc.) Water treatment or specialty chemical industry experience Working knowledge of OR operations, wet end chemistry, pulp mill operations> About Nalco Water  In a world with increasing water shortage and contamination challenges, Nalco Water, an Ecolab company, helps customers conserve more than 161 billion gallons of water each year. We work with customers across the world in the light industry (institutional, food & beverage, transportation and manufacturing), heavy industry (chemical, power and primary metals industries), paper and mining operations to reduce, reuse, and recycle their water while protecting their systems and equipment. Nalco Water provides the unique opportunity to work with a broad suite of technologies to deliver automated monitoring systems, data analysis and deep technical expertise to increase efficiency, sustainability and performance for our customers.  Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion  At Ecolab, we believe the best teams are diverse and inclusive, and we are on a journey to create a workplace where every associate can grow and achieve their best. We are committed to fair and equal treatment of associates and applicants. We recruit, hire, promote, transfer and provide opportunities for advancement on the basis of individual qualifications and job performance. In all matters affecting employment, compensation, benefits, working conditions, and opportunities for advancement, we will not discriminate against any associate or applicant for employment because of race, religion, color, creed, national origin, citizenship status, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expressions, genetic information, marital status, age, disability, or status as a covered veteran.  In addition, we are committed to furthering the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) through Affirmative Action (AA). Our goal is to fully utilize minority, female, disabled and covered veteran individuals at all levels of the workforce. Ecolab is a place where you can grow your career, own your future and impact what matters.

The company and our mission:  BridgeU was founded with the belief that talent is equally distributed across the globe, but opportunity is not. We take pride in helping students discover and explore the best pathways available to them - wherever those opportunities may be. We help universities to discover and engage the schools and students that will contribute to their vibrant, diverse and successful programs and courses. In 2020, we believe BridgeU has never been more important to help students, schools and universities discover new opportunities globally and connect at a distance.  Today, BridgeU is the market leading provider of university and careers guidance software to international and globally-minded secondary schools. BridgeU is proud to work with secondary schools in over 300 cities across 119 countries. And, we partner with a growing number of leading universities, currently in 7 countries, to connect recruitment and admissions teams to the largest community of international schools available on one platform. Uniquely, BridgeU combines the culture and pace of a start-up with the support and stability of being part of Kaplan, part of one of the world’s largest and most diverse education providers.  As a Regional Manager (RM), you will be a key member of the Sales team, who are responsible for building and capitalizing on relationships with secondary schools, global education companies, governments, and universities from around the world. The BD team is our engine room for the company’s growth, and you will do this by developing good relationships with potential customers and helping them to see the value our product can bring them.  You will report to a Regional Director (Schools) and will develop relationships with customers in China helping them to understand our product and mission and the value we can provide them. We’re looking for someone who is not phone-shy, takes ownership of their targets and finds inventive ways to contribute to growing the business.  You'll be joining a smart, ambitious team, in an exciting, fast-growth environment. You will be a key hire in China and will have the opportunity to work closely with senior management, and influence how we continue to develop our business in China. . You will also contribute significantly to our marketing plans in China including the development of WeChat. We intend to growth the China business very quickly and we would hope to build the Chinese company around the successful candidate.  Requirements  What you’ll bring: You’re smart, ambitious and motivated by reaching and exceeding new business targets. You’re focused, detail-oriented and adaptable. You’re curious and ready to learn and fully absorb the climate and concerns of the education technology industry. You’re a strong communicator and effective team-player, and you are resilient in times of change You’re excited about the global education problem we’re trying to solve, and at the thought of making a big impact on the business You will speak Mandarin and English You have the ability to sell a compelling vision of a technology platform that’s changing the way in which students plan their futures You’re able to develop a deep understanding of a SaaS product as a key part of your role will be doing demos to customer - not only taking customers through the product features, but empathising and understanding their needs in detail, so you can establish best fit and be a trusted advisor to customers 2 years+ experience as a proven performer in a Sales role, ideally within Edtech/SaaS.  Benefits  What we’ll provide 23,000 RMB/month base salary and up to 40,000 RMB OTE Opportunities for flexible and remote working hours, encouraging everyone to have a healthy work-life balance Annual offsite: we organise a retreat once a year where the whole company gets together Personal development: books, courses and conferences that can help you learn and grow You will most probably be based in the Kaplan Shanghai office (Kaplan is our parent company) Career progression and development Private health insurance Employer’s MPF An open and democratic work culture where everyone can contribute, learn and teach  Equal Opportunities  We are a global team with a global mindset, cherishing and protecting diversity as one of our core values. We are always looking to diversify the talent in our team.  Applications from individuals are encouraged regardless of age, disability, sex, gender reassignment, sexual orientation, pregnancy and maternity, race, religion, belief, marriage or civil partnership. If you feel you don’t quite meet all the criteria in the job spec but have the potential to do the role, we’d still love to hear from you.

description: 岗位职责： 1、负责拉美区电商平台的渠道管理、流量运营、促销推广、进销存管理等运营工作； 2、围绕电商平台全年促销节奏，整合利用电商各种促销玩法，策划实施有效促销方案，提升整体销量，达成全年销量目标； 3、负责店铺日常维护，熟悉电商渠道的资源特点，争取平台资源推广品牌及产品，优化店铺及商品排名； 4、负责执行与配合公司相关营销活动，在平台内展开内容运营、视频直播及短视频等新媒体运营，增加店铺粉丝数与店铺流量，提升销售转化； 5、落实渠道促销活动策划、文案设计与上线，协同设计完成视觉输出与站内广告投放； 6、负责收集市场和行业信息，提供有效应对方案；  岗位要求： 1、本科以上学历，通信、计算机、电子商务、市场营销等相关专业； 2、3年及以上电商/大客户管理/渠道销售经验，具有优秀渠道管理能力及客户关系管理能力； 3、具备较强的市场敏感度和洞察力，熟悉手机/数码/家电等3C品类； 4、具备数据分析能力，对数据敏感； 5、性格外向，具备良好的沟通协调能力，优秀的文字及语言表达能力 6、接受海外出差，具备海外工作经验者优先。  工作地点：深圳（派驻墨西哥城）

Turnover FC, Gross Margin rate control, WIP, AR etc. Other tasks assigned by Management  Requirements:  University degree, majored in Commercial/Accounting is preferred; At least 3 years experience of commercial or financial controlling function including 1 year experience of SAP practice; Excellent English in both written and spoken.
