An Assistant Director of Sales manages the hotel sales and marketing plans by recommending growth efforts, monitoring progress, and ensuring that the hotel is competitively positioned within the local marketplace.  What will I be doing?  Responsibilities  Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards  As Assistant Director of Sales, you will be responsible for working closely with the Senior Management Team to drive business needs and expand existing business through promotional efforts and sales channels. An Assistant Director of Sales will work to develop the sales group and groom a high-performing sales team. Manage hotel sales and marketing plans to ensure they accurately interpret and support the objectives of the business and use these plans to focus the sales efforts for all market segments Work closely with the Senior Management Team to identify and drive focused activities on elements of the business that require additional support Contribute to the development of company sales and marketing initiatives by recommending, implementing and monitoring appropriate local activity Organise comprehensive information describing the range of products and services offered by the hotel and deliver this information through relevant sales resources and sales channels to existing and potential Guests Produce accurate and timely reports that meet the needs of the hotel and the management company Prepare and present, on a monthly basis, the contribution, focus and activity of the proactive sales team to the hotel owners and senior management team Cooperate with other departments in the hotel, particularly Reservations and the Banqueting Department, to create an exceptional Guest experience and build strong, comprehensive sales programs Contribute to relevant management meetings to develop and implement sales and marketing initiatives Prepare company contracts for the hotel in accordance with current business and pricing conditions Monitor offers, options and discounts for repeat bookings for groups, congresses and seminars in close cooperation with the Group Coordinator What are we looking for?  Skills  To successfully fill this role, you should maintain the attitude, behaviours, skills, and values that follow  An Assistant Director of Sales serving Hilton brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members. Positive attitude and good communication skills Commitment to delivering a high level of customer service Excellent grooming standards Strong leadership skills, whereas it is evident that you can effectively manage and motivate a team to perform beyond expectations Strong analytical skills so to understand key business indicators and competitive trends and develop approaches to these challenges Excellent selling capabilities and the ability and desire to coach selling techniques to Team Members Excellent organisational and planning skills Experience in a similar role with a proven track record It would be advantageous in this position for you to demonstrate the following capabilities and distinctions: Knowledge of local market Knowledge of hospitality Passion for sales and for achieving targets and objectives Degree-level qualification in a relevant field would be advantageous What will it be like to work for Hilton?  Hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. For nearly a century, Hilton has offered business and leisure travelers the finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. Our vision “to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality” unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. And, our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all!  Work Locations  Hilton Shenzhen Shekou  Schedule  Full-time  Brand  Hilton Hotels & Resorts  Shift  Day Job  Job Level  Director  Job  Sales

该职位来源于猎聘  Job Description  Title: Influence sales account manager  Essential Duties And Responsibilities  Strategically planning on business goals and tactic sales actions for the covered accounts  Deepen account engagement and extend the account coverage in customer organization  Drive customer demand on WD products by deeply engaging with key business units and technical/engineering units in customer organization  Work with OEM partners to ensure target WD product shares or volumes are secured in bid or deal  Frame, structure and update the consistent and accurate customer business information to management  Drive internal resource to bring fast response to the covered account’s technical requirement  Skills  Excellent experience on Account Management  Good business acumen dealing with challenges and uncertainties  Excellent B2B sales skills in entire sales cycle  Quick learning capability of new technology and new product by self-learning and onsite learning  Self-motivated with the ability to effectively multi-task and work collaboratively in a fast-paced, team environment  Ability to make clear, logical decisions based on facts, taking into consideration the big picture, long and short term effects, and exercising sound judgment when handling complaints, confidential and sensitive issues  Excellent verbal and written communication skills in Mandarin and English  Required  Master degree in CS, EE or relative engineering majors, MBA plus  5~10years enterprise salesexperience in leading IT hardware companies (HP, Inspur, Dell, Huawei etc)  Good account management skill and business development capability  Good understanding on IT business or Cloud business  Outgoing personality and team work spirit

Job Title： Hitachi Vantara – Inside Sales Representative (内部/电话销售) Location: Beijing (北京)  What You'll Do 工作范围： You will build direct relationships with customers while working with channel partners to maximize new sales opportunities and renewals within your territory. 您将通过电话和客户及渠道合作伙伴直接建立联系，在您负责的领域内最大限度的开发新销售机会和拓展现有用户新需求。 You will manage all aspects of the full sales cycle to help customers reach their business goals. 您将负责并管理Hitachi Vantara解决方案的销售全流程，帮助客户实现其商业目标。 • You will position and sell the entire Digital Infrastructure portfolio. 您将通过电话的方式销售公司Digital Infrastructure（数字化基础架构）解决方案。 • You will seek to understand our customers’ business challenges and advise on the value derived from our solutions to address their pains. 您将通过电话的方式了解我们客户面临的业务挑战或者需求，并根据公司现有的解决方案给客户提供有价值的建议，帮助客户解决他们的业务挑战/困难。 • You will become a trusted advisor to help our customers with their immediate needs, as well as their long term goals. 成为客户信赖的顾问，满足他们目前的业务需求并帮助他们实现长期目标。 • You will accurately forecast your monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue streams; driving growth in your account base. 准确预测您的每月，季度和年度销售收益， 推动客户增加采购量。 • You will be responsible for driving new business, as well as fostering your account base. 开发更多的新客户，扩充您负责的区域内的客户资源。  Who You Are您是谁： • Goal-oriented and motivated by performance rewards 目标导向，以绩效奖励为动力 • Seek to achieve and exceed annual sales goals 努力实现并超过年度销售目标 • A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders 强有力的内部和外部合作者  Skills and Qualifications技能和任职资格： • 3+ years of B2B selling experience in a similar or adjacent industry 3 年以上B2B销售经验在IT行业或者相近行业优先考虑 • Experience owning the full sales cycle (prospecting, validating, negotiating, and closing the sale). 具备全流程销售经验背景 • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business 具有开拓者精神，积极开发新的商业机会并实现业务增长 • Demonstrate strong sales achievement (i.e., consistent achievement at or above quota, or a history YoY growth in your target market) 良好的销售业绩 • Passionate about sales and building positive relationships 拥有销售热情并积极拓展客户关系 • Possess strong business acumen and can articulate the value of a solution to address customers’ current and future needs 敏感的商业嗅觉， 清晰阐述Hitachi Vantara解决方案得价值，以解决客户当前或者未来得商业需求 • Engage in active listening to identify customers’ pain and help them derive the value and potential impact of a timely solution 积极倾听客户的痛点并及时给客户提供有价值的潜在解决方案 • Phenomenal communication/presentation skills 较强的沟通/表达能力 • Thrive in a team environment and enjoy sharing ideas and best practices 融入团队，愿意分享知识和最佳实践 • Experience using digital selling tools such as Salesforce and TechTarget 使用过Salesforce and TechTarget 系统优先考虑

Job Summary  The Senior Account Manager is responsible for all sales activities, from lead generation through close in an assigned territory or set of accounts, and is responsible for maximizing sales profitability, growth and account penetration. The role sells products and services directly to end users primarily via face-to-face contact. The senior level role may be responsible for a larger territory, account base and/or quota.  Essential Functions  Performs sales activities for new and renewal business for an assigned geographic area, set of accounts or product/service line to achieve or exceed assigned revenue objectives Establishes, develops and maintains business relationships with current and prospective customers to generate new business for the organization’s products and services Creates and conducts sales presentations to match company's products/services with identified needs. Identifies advantages and compares organization’s products/services Sells products/services through telephone as well as face-to-face contact Remains knowledgeable and keeps abreast of the company's new and existing products/services to facilitate sales efforts Researches sources for developing prospective customers and for information to determine their potential Develops clear and effective written proposals/quotations for current and prospective customers Creates and maintains account plans for existing customers highlighting profile, share and value opportunities Coordinates sales effort with marketing, sales management, accounting and technical services groups Maintains sales records and prepares sales reports as required Provides accurate forecasts for new sales and renewal revenues Participates in trade shows and conventions; schedules training and seminars to enhance new business opportunities Maintains regular contact with customers to ensure satisfaction Maintains a regular schedule of contact via phone/on-site visits Alerts client to new or improved products/services Develops relationships with clients Relays client feedback to product development staff Job Minimum Requirements And Qualifications Minimum bachelor’s degree in an engineering discipline or bachelor’s degree with technical sales experience Minimum 5 years sales experience with a proven track record of success Demonstrated understanding of engineering analysis and technology Excellent communication and organizational skills and the ability to work independently Minimum travel of 50% Other Information Competencies of a high performing ANSYS sales person include: Expanding and Advancing Opportunities, Building Trusting Relationships, Devising Sales Approaches and Solutions, Initiating Action, Active Learning, Adaptability, Sustaining Customer Satisfaction, Becoming a Business Advisor, Sales Opportunity Analysis, Marshaling Resources Demonstrated knowledge of company's products/services and pricing practices a plus Knowledge of the specific territory, product line, or customer(s) a plus Proven/documented sales ability Professional appearance and presentation Heavy phone usage

The Account Manager builds effective relationships with entry- to mid-level client contacts. This role ensures the efficient coordination of projects from estimation to completion, and partners with the broader project team to ensure deliverables are completed on time and on budget. The Account Manager utilizes an understanding of the Company's and the client's industry, business, and products to identify opportunities to sell additional solutions to meet existing client needs.  Job Responsibilities Supports the Company’s profitability efforts by managing efficient, accurate, and timely coordination of the assigned project activities. Supports the Account Team in its effort to increase revenue through selling additional products and services across the business portfolio. Participates in the development of innovative proposals to capture both account growth and new business opportunities. Ensures the meeting of volume and revenue targets for each account. Builds new relationships and nurturing existing relationships with internal and external clients. Serves as the main day-to-day contact on current projects for clients, suppliers, external partners, and the Account team; provides timely responses to all inquiries. Participates in meetings with existing clients and internal teams to identify adequate new services/offerings to meet clients’ evolving needs as required; serves as the Subject Matter Expert on processes, capacity, timelines, etc. Ensures high quality standards in all client deliverables. Coordinates client-specific projects throughout the lifecycle, including estimate creation, selection of appropriate projects and sub-projects, assignment of resources, monitoring project progress, and generation of the client/project invoice. Translates client requests and requirements into detailed, and sometimes technical, instructions for project teams. Partners with the client, the Account Team, and project teams to resolve identified project issues. Ensures accurate and timely invoices are generated by maintaining correct project details and supporting evidence, including change orders and rework, throughout the project lifecycle. Initiates new data item requests utilizing the Master Data Management (MDM) process and guidelines to ensure accurate client, project, and financial details are available in the system. Partners with Client Integration and the Account Team to ensure a smooth transition for new clients; attend pre-integration and planning meetings as needed. Participates in cross-functional teams to develop and/or adapt processes, policies, and workflows to improve efficiency, accuracy, speed, quality, etc. Provides solutions for business-related issues and situations and generate specific plans that achieve objectives. Manages and balances marketing budgets to maximize Return on Investment (ROI) and drive incremental sales. Provides expertise on customer pricing and promotional planning. Plans, directs, and coordinates activities of employee(s) to ensure goals or objectives are accomplished. Mentors, coaches, trains and develops team. Additional duties as assigned. Desired Skills And Experience Bachelor’s Degree in Sales, Marketing or related field Advanced degree (MBA, Master’s) preferred 6+ years previous account management experience in a Creative Design Agency, Market Research firm or similar consulting environment; or equivalent combination of education and experience Prior managerial/supervisory experience preferred Occasional travel either locally, nationally, and/or internationally may be required. High degree of proficiency MS Office Suite, Outlook & Internet applications Strong analytical, prioritizing, interpersonal, problem-solving, presentation, budgeting, project management (from conception to completion), & planning skills Strong verbal and written communication skills (including analysis, interpretation, & reasoning) Solid understanding and application of mathematical concepts Ability to develop and maintain collaborative relationships with peers and colleagues across the organization, as well as, internal and external clients Ability to work well autonomously and within a team in a fast-paced and deadline-oriented environment. Ability to work with and influence peers and senior management Self-motivated with critical attention to detail, deadlines and reporting SGK is a global packaging and brand experience company. From idea to implementation, we deliver packaging solutions and brand experiences that give brands the freedom to speak louder, scale faster and grow stronger. We simplify marketing and amplify brands to deliver value. SGK is a Matthews International company.  Matthews International endeavors to make our employment website and application process accessible to all users and applicants. In doing so, Matthews International provides reasonable accommodations to applicants with disabilities. If you have a disability and require a reasonable accommodation or assistance completing the application process, please contact a member of our Human Resource Team.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  工作职责:  负责中国区销售运营中心的管理工作，提升销售运营部综合作战能力。  1）能力建设：梳理线上线下销售运营团队的能力建设模型，推动团队能力建设。  2）商机洞察：洞察各销售渠道及平台发展趋势，探索平台新玩法，深化平台合作关系，拓宽平台销售资源。  3）规则制定：协调线上线下各渠道选品，价格，资源冲突，梳理各渠道制度，流程及规则。  任职资格: 本科及以上学历，8年以上运营工作经验，3年以上运营管理经验，对电商行业有自己独到的见解。 有较综合的运营方法论积累和团队管理经验，有带领并培养优秀运营团队的经验者优先。 追求卓越，有较高的内驱力，推动力及领导力；有较强逻辑思维，分析及解决问题的能力；良好的需求整合能力和沟通协调能力。 了解互联网市场现状及发展趋势，精通天猫，京东等电子商务运作模式与运营规则。

description: Territory: South China  Office location: home office  Reports to: Senior Sales Manager, China  Pacific Biosciences is helping scientists forge a better understanding of biology by providing a unique long-read sequencing technology that generates more complete and accurate data, giving them more insights. Our sequencing systems allow scientists to characterize genomes, transcriptomes, and epigenomes from any organism. Scientists use our technology in areas such as human biomedical research, plant and animal sciences, and microbiology and infectious disease studies. Become part of the new paradigm in long-read sequencing and help shape the future of genomic study by joining the Pacific Biosciences team.  Description Directly responsible for achieving and exceeding the revenue targets for defined PacBio SMRT™ sequencing products within the defined territory. Qualify and develop opportunities within the territory as well as maintain and grow the existing customer base. Develop and execute territory and account specific sales plans that exceed assigned territory revenue targets. Establish and build relationships with key decision makers and economic buyers. Effectively work as a team player with PacBio field marketing team and our sales channel partners to ensure they are up to date with PacBio technology, publications, and marketing materials. Able to motivate and mentor Sales Channel Partner team members to achieve PacBio sales target and support requirements. Utilize and maintain CRM system to effectively communicate within internal organization. Responsible for accurately forecasting territory revenue and sufficiently documenting within CRM. Ensure annual sales objectives are exceeded and territory will generate continued positive growth. Coordinate the sales, marketing, and support efforts by our distributors/dealers in the defined territories. Develop and execute a business plan(s) to meet annual fiscal sales goals and long term growth at the specific key accounts. Conduct effective customer presentations/seminars to provide updates and maintain communication. Work directly with Marketing and other related functions to characterize and define programs to appropriately resource production sequencing level accounts. Organize and lead various teams at Pacific Biosciences to provide resources to institute/companies assigned to ensure operational and revenue continued success. Provide general intelligence on key competitors. Work with PacBio operations, marketing, customer support, technical support, and legal department to ensure customer satisfaction. Help out in other territories as required and requested by your Manager. All listed tasks and responsibilities are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional tasks and responsibilities.  Position Requirements Significant territory management and sales experience in high end capital instrumentation and consumables is required. Previous experience in managing multi-million dollar accounts and track record of continued growth. 5+ years or equivalent direct sales into the life sciences and clinical research markets required. Competitive nature and proven track record of high capital sales success. Scientific or Technical Degree is required, advanced degree preferred. Ability to engage and build relationships at the highest level within customer organizations is critical (President/CEO, CTO/CSO and CFO and other key influencers). Ability to integrate and be accepted as a consultative resource for key decision makers within large organizations and build and implement a strategic business plan that will result in continued growth and solid customer relations. High scientific aptitude with understanding of scientific applications and technology developments as it relates to customer requirements as well as the potential competitive landscape. Strategically minded with ability to work independently and highly adaptable. Comfort and acumen for public speaking and the ability to deliver key presentations. Strong communication and partnering skills with ability to operate as a team player. Role will require a home office and at 50% travel at a minimum. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, national origin, protected veteran status, or on the basis of disability, gender identity, and sexual orientation.

description: Trusted By Known Brands In North America Founded in 2008 , OKT is known for quality LED commercial and architectural lighting in North America. Its main products are T-grid LED linear lights, LED linear suspended/surfaced/recessed/wall mounted fixtures, LED commerical downlights , LED troffers and LED emergency drivers with UL, cUL, Energy Star, DLC certified. OKT lighting occupies a facility of 5000 square meter and possesses experienced and professional staffs with 5 production lines for high production capacity.   THE OKT DIFFERENCE We focus on North American for since 2012. We focus on product innovation. We concern intellectual property –Most are patented in the U.S or pending. We concern stocking issues –Most are equipped CCT and wattage adjustable technology. We set up office and warehouse in Texas to achieve shipping within 48hrs, 24/7 online service，dropship, local RAM, OEM and assembly services.   Your Tasks Marketing Development & product sales according to company strategy & sales objective. Actively seek new sales opportunities through call, networking, social media and trade shows. Understand customer needs, take initiative to contact customers, communicate with them timely and effectively to get orders.   Your Profile Excellent English at listen, read, write & talk; College degree or above( Excellent graduate is also welcome) 1 years or plus on international B2B trade business working experience (Experiences dealing LED lighting products will be an advantage) Be open, honest and positive, dare to face challenges and self-motivated.   We Offer Basic salary + high Bonus (upon business and performance). Five social insurances and one housing fund. We will offer fair opportunities no matter on business or personal development. holidays are provided accordingly to government regulations.   We are a group of passionate lighting enthusiast that make things right. Join us now.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Responsibilities Pre-sales activity will include delivery of technical expertise during the sales process including presentations, seminars, individual consultation, and hands-on demo experiments if needed. Executes technical and application based presentations on illumina’s sequencing and microarray platforms, applications and/or workflows. Post-sales activity includes working with post-installation customers providing additional workflow or applications training in strategically important labs. Supporting/assisting customers with sequencing assay design to accelerate adoption of targeted sequencing on illumina’s platforms. Attendance at tradeshows/conferences in relevant fields. Be the point person for dedicated illumina User Group Meetings in collaboration with field marketing and support team to provide sample to data workflow training Assists sales and field marketing on new strategic initiatives requiring both technical and market knowledge Works collaboratively with territory account managers, marketing, service and support teams to ensure effective account/customer management and communication through pre-sales, during and- post-sales cycle, including review and meeting account pull through targets and goals Escalates technical issues to Technical Support for possible resolution for strategically important labs. Develops and maintain positive relationships with customers in assigned territory Listed responsibilities are an essential, but not exhaustive list, of the usual duties associated with the position. Changes to individual responsibilities may occur due to business needs.  Preferred Requirements Life science industry experience preferred Applied Market Knowledge is a plus Extensive experience and understanding of leading genetics technologies and how they can be applied. Detailed knowledge of technological developments and trends in the sequencing markets Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills in Mandarin and English. Strong negotiation skills and ability to persuade Ability to travel within region to carry out primary responsibilities. All listed requirements are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.  Preferred Experience/Education Typically requires a Bachelor’s degree and a minimum of 0-2 years of related experience; or equivalent work experience. 岗位概述  Responsibilities 售前活动将包括销售过程中的技术知识演讲，如介绍演讲、研讨会、个别咨询等，在必要时，进行演示实验。 对因美纳测序和微阵列平台的应用或工作流程进行技术层面和应用层面的介绍。 售后活动包括与安装产品后的客户的协调，提供在具有重要战略意义的实验室中所需的工作流程或应用培训 支持/辅助客户的相关测序阵列设计，加快在客户因美纳平台上目标测序进程。 参加相关领域的展览会/大会。 作为与现场营销和支持团队合作的专项人员参加因美纳用户组会议，提供样品数据工作流程培训。 提供销售或现场营销新战略项目时所需有关技术和市场知识。 与区域客户经理、营销、服务和支持团队合作工作，保证有效的大客户/客户管理以及负责售前、售中和售后过程的沟通，包括回访和会面已经取得成果或达成目标的客户。 作为技术支持提供技术升级，为具有重要战略意义的实验室提供可能的解决方案。 提升和维护责任区域内客户的良好关系。 以上所列的任务和职责是本岗位的基本功能。然而，各种商务条件下可能需要完成额外的任务和职责。  Preferred Requirements 有生命科学行业经验者优先 有应用市场知识者加分 具有领先的遗传学技术及其应用方面的丰富经验和充分理解 具有技术发展和测序市场趋势的详细知识 优秀的中文普通话和英文口头和书面交流和介绍演讲技能 良好的谈判技巧和说服能力 能在负责区域内出差并完成主要职责 Preferred Experience/Education 科学学科的硕士以上学历（分子生物学、遗传学、或基因组学和/或生物信息学优先）

About Us  Gore is a materials science company focused on improving lives through discovery, product innovation and rewarding careers for our Associates.  About The Industry  Saving lives and improving the quality of life for patients is at the core of everything we do. This meaningful work gives purpose to our lives and inspires us to create solutions that make a dif ference in the lives of others. Learn more at gore.com/products/industries  About The Role  We are looking for a Field Sales Associate to join our Medical Product Division Sale Team in Henan who will be accountable for meeting or exceeding the sales forecast in specific geographic area.  Responsibilities: Develop profitable sales opportunities, proactively make sales calls Develop new business to align with Gore business needs Ensure the KOL management, market data collection, etc., are effective, builds, maintains and defends long-term customer relationships Ensure the cooperation with other product specialists are active and constructive, to achieve team goals and objectives Implement value pricing principle, be a value seller, skilled in the use of premise-based forecasting techniques Implement Gore’s product strategy, understands the needs of the customer  Required Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in medical or medicine Proven sales background, preferably with a minimum of 5 years in the medical devices sales area Will have worked in or able to demonstrate an understanding of the imperatives of a business environment Clinical background in interventional areas or sales experience to this environment Strong communication and interpersonal skills A high level of self-motivation and passion, ensuring the ability to work under minimal supervision Commercial acumen High integrity Capable and willing to travel extensively up to 60% and attend weekend conferences as required  What We Offer  At Gore, we want our Associates to have fulfilling careers driven by curiosity and commitment. In return, we commit to our Associates by offering comprehensive, competitive rewards in the form of compensation, benefits, an Associate stock ownership-type plan, and opportunities for growth and development. Learn more at gore.com/careers  We believe in the strength of a diverse workforce and inclusive work environment. In support of our values and continued success we are proud of Associates around the world who support an inclusive work environment, strive to reflect the diversity of the communities where we operate, and ensure all Associates and external partners are treated with fairness, dignity and respect.  Our Talent Acquisition Team welcomes your questions via email at AP_TA@wlgore.com  Job  Sales  Primary Location  Asia-Pacific-CN-HA-Zhengzhou  Travel%  60%  Shift  Day  Schedule  Full-time

jobTitle: Sales & Trading Analyst – Expert Graduate Programme – 2022
description: Do you thrive on challenge?  Barclays makes markets in nearly all major asset classes, providing sophisticated, timely solutions to our clients. Our Sales & Trading team works in a fast-paced, dynamic and exciting environment, quickly processing information and anticipating market trends to help clients make their next move. Sound like the place for you? Join us as an analyst.  The chance to make an impact  After Intensive Initial Training, You Will Start Your Career As a Salesperson Or a Trader On a Specific Desk In One Of Our Business Areas, Including  Over your time as an analyst, you’ll develop a solid understanding of the global markets while building your communication, quantitative and analytical skills.  Client Capital Management Client Strategy Commodities Credit eFICC Trading Equities Equity Financing Foreign Exchange Municipals Rates Structuring  You May  As a Sales analyst, you’ll start by supporting your colleagues before taking on your own set of clients.  analyse and develop solutions to clients’ needs monitor markets and formulate trade ideas perform various analyses on fundamental and technical data attend client meetings or calls with traders, salespeople and research colleagues.  As a Trading Analyst, You May  monitor markets and generate trade ideas participate in pricing products help out with daily tasks such as trade reporting or P&L analysis assist with managing risk of the team’s trading books.  A place where you can thrive  At Barclays, you’ll be surrounded by people who will help you achieve your ambitions. Our collaborative, supportive environment gives you the chance to build solid relationships with senior leaders, peers and clients alike. You’ll be encouraged you to work closely with experienced colleagues on a daily basis, helping you develop mentoring relationships early in your career. What’s more, dedicated programme managers will support and advocate for you throughout the first several years of your career at Barclays.  During The Analyst Programme, You’ll Also  participate in formal and informal training designed to give you the knowledge you need when you need it receive detailed performance coaching and feedback have opportunities to expand your network and develop leadership skills.  Your role as a Sales & Trading analyst will provide you with the skills and experience needed for a successful career in the world of finance. The analyst programme will help provide a visible path to the necessary steps for promotion to assistant vice president and the tools to get you there.  To Be Considered For This Programme, You Must  successfully complete an undergraduate degree between December 2021 - June 2022.  Ideally, You Would Also Have  resourcefulness, team-orientation, enthusiasm and an entrepreneurial spirit, demonstrated through participation in extracurricular activities have a minimum GPA of 3.2.  It is the policy of Barclays to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, alienage or citizenship status, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic/civil partnership status, disability, protected veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by law.  00275957

JOB PURPOSE AND IMPACT The Sr. Commercial Analyst will support the Commercial Leaders to lead our global and regional projects and initiatives on commercial excellence capabilities, including rolling out Cargill’s Commercial Excellence (CE) program on strategic pricing, sales enablement, route to market for various enterprises in line with their “Go-To-Market “ strategies. We seek a professional who will analyze and translate insight into strategies and tactics to and be a key resource on commercial excellence initiatives  KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES •  Provide analytics support to deliver commercial excellence projects to internal/external business clients by supporting the roadmap and the implementation timeline.. •  Help implement core processes for diagnostics, hypothesis development & testing, development of business recommendations and implementation of core capabilities, and manage communication with businesses on given commercial excellence projects •  Analyze data and survey results to contribute to making the CE Center of Excellence team truly cross functional, with solid and unchallengeable analysis. •  Manage and guide the analysts on the project to support the roadmap and the implementation timeline, and Build visual analytics dashboards in Tableau/Power BI to support the commercial excellence initiatives •  Independently handle complex issues with minimal supervision, while escalating only the most complex issues to appropriate staff.  MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent experience Minimum of 5 years of related work experience Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English Demonstrated ability to problem solve and use analytical thinking Strong proficiency across Microsoft Office products (PowerPoint, Teams, Excel…etc). Demonstrated ability to work effectively and confidentially with various levels of organization and potentially customers  PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS MBA preferred Minimum 5 years’ experience in one of the following: Sales, Commercial Management, FP&A, Trading, Business Development, Demand Planning, Modeling Ability to travel regionally post pandemic – 20-30% Demonstrated strong analytical capabilities –Ability to blend data using Alteryx or similar tools and visualize and analyze it using tools like Tableau/Power BI Commercial mindset, and strong business acumen Ability to quickly understand system architecture Ability to translate business need to technical/functional design for Business Intelligence Language requirements: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English. (Other language could be plus but not required)

工作职责: Proactive sales of the whole product portfolio/solution offers /new products by both in-person and remote interaction to assigned accounts, ensure customer centric selling approach Develop business plans/rolling forecast for assigned account sites Analyze customer needs and present/demonstrate our products/solutions/value proposition as well as create quotations, negotiation and closing the deal with the customer Drive critical after-sales activities and facilitate things moving forward with acceptable time and quality Facilitate internal resources allocation to satisfy customer needs Build and maintain a strategic customer relationship management Propose strategic customer collaborations for potential accounts to support the long-term business growth Use CRM to share customer’s requests and status along the selling process Explore new business opportunities or cross-selling points via the interaction with customers Graduate qualification in a discipline or equivalent experience in biopharma industry 5+ years sales experience in the biopharma industry is preferred Proactive, result driven and collaborative attitude Good negotiation skills Economical and financial know how Good analytical and presentation skills Good interpersonal and communication skills in dealing with people of different levels Flexible and willing to travel Project management Facilitation skill Fluent mandarin required, basic oral English , and solid English reading & writing Ability to travel up to 60% (Adjusted based on Sales region) 任职条件:  Same as above

Product Specialist II  Responsibilities Manage the customer’s Tesla experience in the most positive way. Welcome all walk in guests, answer questions and enthusiastically educate all customers and fans about the benefits of going electric, generally publicize going electric knowledge. Responsible for collecting qualified customer information, assist market events, explore customer needs, stimulate customer demand, cooperate with Owner Advisor to meet store’s sales target. Provide high quality service to existing Tesla owner community. Help Tesla enthusiasts and future owners stay up to speed with Tesla by promoting company’s updated news. Employee must learn about the company and products related knowledge, keep up with industry trends and best practices Develop amazing customer relationships on the sales floor and during test-drive experiences to ultimately create a brand experience customers will recommend to their friends. Competency certification, Probation Review, otherwise he or she will not be able to meet the full time employee’s requirement. Communicate with the external clients and partners in a professional way, and also ensure effective communication and great cooperation with internal colleagues (Among same and different function/ store/region). Keep inventory full and neat (if applicable). Other Responsibilities: Perform other related duties as assigned, based on the business need. Requirements Fresh graduate or 1-2 years’ work experience in retail, industry and key account sales with proven track record to meet or exceed targets and goals. Highly appreciate Company culture and value. Strong communication and customer service experience required. Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry and key account sales experience preferred. During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is required to pass the probationary period. Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 产品专家  主要职责 保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。 通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友宣传特斯拉。 收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销售主管完成门店的销售目标。 对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。 认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。 建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。 通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和要求。 和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地区、跨地区之间）。 保持库存充足和整洁（如适用）。 员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。 职位要求 应届毕业生或1到2年零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验。 对企业文化高度认可。 出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。 良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的变革。 深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。 能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。 持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.  Sr. Sales Contact Center Agent  Your Tasks And Responsibilities Provide Sales system Tier1 support to China Sales workforce via various channels, like phone, email and Askme2. Main applications are CRM, Opera, Fusion, Speaker etc. Responsible for handling special, complex or complaints issues of the Emails and hotlines and follow-up respectively according the guidance processes. Take other additional work, such as knowledge base maintenance, act as the new hire's mentor, take ownership of the business lines, ensuring timely, accurate and value add responses. Proactively support internal process improvement projects. Who You Are Familiar with Sales system especially in Pharmaceutical industry. At least 3years relevant working experience in customer service or call center. Strong communication and customer service orientation. Eager to learn and flexibility in adapting quickly to a changing process environment. Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills. Proficient computer skills, especially with data analysis ability. YOUR APPLICATION  If your background and personal experience fit this profile, please send us your complete application at www.career.bayer.cn If you have any recommendations, please kindly send mail to cnreferral@bayer.com  L ocation:  China : Liao Ning : DaLian  Division:  Enabling Functions  Reference Code:  484128

Build a career powered by innovations that matter! At Novanta, our innovations power technology products that are transforming healthcare and advanced manufacturing—improving productivity, enhancing people’s lives and redefining what’s possible. We create for our global customers engineered components and sub-systems that deliver extreme precision and performance for a range of mission-critical applications—from minimally invasive surgery to robotics to 3D metal printing.  Novanta is one global team with over 26 offices located in The Americas, Europe and Asia-Pacific. Looking for a great place to work? You have found it with a culture that embraces teamwork, collaboration and empowerment. Come explore Novanta.  Job Summary  This job is responsible for growing sales in the appointed sales territory.  Primary Responsibilities Owner of the Sales process: consisting of Call-, Opportunity-, Account- and Territory Management. Pursuing sales leads and prospective sales clients. Provision of regular accurate & detailed regional forecasts and reports. Responsible for the delivery of agreed revenue targets and strategic objectives for region Contract negotiations with new and existing accounts. Strategic marketing and competitive product analysis & strong interaction with sales, application, and product management. Develop relationships with other Novanta sales organizations in the region. Willingness to use modern IT infrastructure. Mandatory is the use of CRM system SFDC. Operate within the corporate guidelines set for legal and ethical behavior. Strict compliance with the quality, occupational safety, and environmental regulations. Required Experience, Education, Skills And Competencies Bachelor’s/Master´s Degree in relevant discipline (Mechatronic, Electrical or Mechanical Engineering). proven in-depth technical knowledge of mechatronic components - 2 - 3 years. Know-how of encoder, motors and controls technology is mandatory. Market know-how in at least 2 of the following markets for 2+ years: Robotics, Medical Robotics, Semiconductor, Metrology and Satellite Communication. Multiyear successful track record of customer management with OEMs and in long cycle qualifications where pre- and post-sales services are a key element of the value proposition to the Customer. Drives, implements, and continuously improves a disciplined sales process that demands lead generation, pipeline management, forecasting, etc. Proven CRM user. Travel Requirements Must possess a valid passport and be able to travel internationally, if required. May require up to 50% travel. Home office location required. Novanta is proud to be an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action workplace. We consider all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, military and veteran status, disability, genetics, or any other category protected by federal law or Novanta policy.  Please call +1 781-266-5700 if you need a disability accommodation for any part of the employment process.

jobTitle: Business Developer 中国区业务拓展
description: Non Destructive Testing / advanced solution for Ultrasonic, Phased Array, Full Matrix Capture (FMC) and Eddy Current 无损探伤，无损检测技术 / 超声，相控阵，全矩阵捕获，涡流 超声检测、磁粉检测、渗透检测、射线检测、涡流检测  • Formulate strategies to approach and develop targets and market segments while developing action plans based upon those strategies. • Develop key relationships to drive sales of products and solutions. • Promote new technologies, products and solutions developed by company • Find and qualify leads; negotiate and close deals with customers. • Identify new sectors/applications for products and solutions available. • Build, strengthen and stabilize long term relationships with existing and new customers. • Develop a strong recurring revenue basis. • Build and manage networks to sustain and accelerate development. • Propose and implement new business opportunities (services, rental, etc.) • Build strong internal relationship with team members and key stakeholders to optimize potential and facilitate productive relationships and culture. • Participate to the joint venture set up with our historical and trustful partner in China  Soft skills expected: • Strong self-starter and able to work autonomously with a soft-structured team. • Self-motivated with discipline to work on the road or from their home office. • Ability to be flexible in a mid-startup high growth environment and flexible to adapt to various market and customer needs with limited resources. • Flexible, resilient and adaptable • Decisiveness • Persuasiveness & resourcefulness • Results oriented and organizational savvy • Strong agile learner. • Collaborative. • Authentic individual with impeccable integrity • A skilled communicator and relationship builder who takes a global perspective and is able to connect with all levels and areas of the organization around the world  Requirements: • Significant experience and comprehension in western culture • Fluent in English and Chinese • Business development experience in China • Sales forecasting & contract negotiation competencies • Customer focus and a solutions-oriented mind • Engineering degree or equivalent background  About us: Acropolis Associates is a retained executive search firm, established in 1999 in New York, which has specialized in the worldwide sourcing of Managers, Directors and Leaders.  Acropolis Associates is Future Manager Alliance’ shareholder in charge of China Mainland and Hong Kong. We are an HR Global Advisory Company.  We can serve our clients in more than 35 countries where our partners and co-shareholders are based: Argentina, Brazil, Chad, Chile, China & Hong Kong, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Greece, India, Iran, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Jordan, Lebanon, Mexico, Netherlands, Northern Ireland, Paraguay, Portugal, Poland, Saudi Arabia, Slovakia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, Uruguay and USA.

Job Mission  With the increasing expectations of all clients and their behavior transformation, the very notion of service is transforming. Client Care Centers are playing a key role in the client journey. They must provide best-in-class services to engage clients and prospects through all the different channels (calls, chats, emails etc.) while communicating what makes the Chanel Difference and ensuring a consistent and connected customer experience across touch-points, markets, divisions. Customer Care China is looking for Top Talents from the industry and is keen with grooming talents to realize their potential and contribute to shape a unique and world-class experience for our clients of today and tomorrow.  Key Responsibilities  As key client touch-point, you will help customers through online chat, email, or telephone. operate from 8 hours per day, 5 days per week to ensure optimal reach through different channels Handling complicate customer case that CCA escalated Handling tough customer complaints with Brand Client Service Values Handling after sales requests (invoice duplicates, tax refund.) Informing on Chanel After Sales and Product Care services (returns, care tips.) Resolution of client complaint cases by collaborating with various departments (local and overseas) on resolutions Deliver a personalized service: maintain a human touch, take time to listen and provide undivided attention  Academic / Professional Qualifications  Composure, cool under pressure, complex problem-solving skills to handle and settle customer cases Self-driven, proactive and maintain a positive attitude in a high pressure/fast-paced work environment Ability to Multi-task, multi-stakeholders and to operate a wide range of different systems simultaneously Excellent communication and comprehension skills Ability to learning on the fly and display adaptability to the continuous changes in a fast-paced environment Ability to type more than 50 words per minute, with accuracy 95%+ Accept flexible scheduling, comfortable working with ambiguity Bachelor’s degree preferred but not essential  Work Experience  Minimum 5 years of working experience in team environment; experience gained from luxury, retail, fashion, hospitality or concierge services, contact centers, online service preferred Candidates with relevant succeed complicate service case handling or supervisory experience is highly preferred

Primary Purpose  The Sales Training Manager is accountable for the regional overall sales capability development to support the business growth.  Primary Duties Fully understand business needs, thereupon set up robust sales training system/policy/procedure aligned with the commercial development & performance component of COS (Commercial Operating System) Deploy sales competency model and educate sales managers and sales representatives to leverage sales competency model to assess the competency level, evaluate the skill gaps and determine sales competency development needs. Based on the sales competency development needs to identify sales training needs priorities and draw up yearly sales training plan Design and develop sales training curriculum and materials according to the identified training needs Apply principles of adult learning and leverage various learning approaches, including on-job-training, coaching, self-paced online learning, peer learning and instructor led training, TTT etc. to implement and deliver the training initiatives Design assessment tool to track and monitor the effectiveness of the training initiatives and behavioral change. Collaborate with stakeholders to establish feedback mechanism to improve sales capability and sales productivity. Lead the regular sales training metrics review and work out the continuous improvement plan Job Specifications Bachelor’s degree required in Business/Science/Finance/Economics or other appropriate discipline. MBA preferred. At least eight years of sales or sales leadership experience in automotive or FMCG industry and sales training/capability development working experience will be a plus Understand the CVP (Customer Value Proposition), have abundant practical, training and coaching experience Experience as Sales Force Effectiveness, System management, reporting development and Experience in project definition and analysis identifying business needs and requirements. Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to interact and build trust with all levels within the organizations, including senior leadership. Be willing and good at hearing people out widely Excellent communication, presentation and training delivery skill Fluent in Mandarin and English About Clarios  Clarios is a world leader in advanced energy storage solutions. We partner with our customers to meet increasing market demand for smarter applications, on a global scale. Our 16,000 employees develop, manufacture and distribute a portfolio of evolving battery technologies for virtually every type of vehicle. Technologies that deliver uniquely sustainable, next-generation performance, and bring reliability, safety and comfort to everyday lives. We add value at every link in the supply chain, contributing to the progress of the communities we serve and the planet we all share. As a 2020 signatory of the United Nations Global Compact, Clarios is committed to aligning our strategies and operations with universal principles focused on human rights, labor, environment and anti-corruption. Clarios is a subsidiary of Brookfield Business Partners, a business services and industrials company focused on owning and operating high-quality businesses that benefit from barriers to entry and/or low production costs.  To all recruitment agencies: Clarios does not accept unsolicited agency resumes/CVs. Please do not forward resumes/CVs to our careers email addresses, Clarios employees or any other company location. Clarios is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/CVs.  Clarios, LLC is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. For more information, please view EEO is the Law, EEO is the Law (supplement), and Pay Transparency Non-discrimination. If you are an individual with a disability and you require an accommodation during the application process, please email Special.Accommodations@Clarios.com.

description: Product Specialist II  Responsibilities Manage the customer’s Tesla experience in the most positive way. Welcome all walk in guests, answer questions and enthusiastically educate all customers and fans about the benefits of going electric, generally publicize going electric knowledge. Through effective communication, identify future Tesla prospects and during test-drive experiences to ultimately create a brand experience customers will recommend to their friends. Responsible for collecting qualified customer information, assist market events, explore customer needs, stimulate customer demand, cooperate with Owner Advisor to meet store’s sales target. Provide high quality service to existing Tesla owner community. Help Tesla enthusiasts and future owners stay up to speed with Tesla by promoting company’s updated news. Employee must learn about the company and products related knowledge, keep up with industry trends and best practices Develop amazing customer relationships on the sales floor and during test-drive experiences to ultimately create a brand experience customers will recommend to their friends. Pass internal testing including but not limited to training, drive skill test, in store test, Role play and related test, Competency certification, Probation Review, otherwise he or she will not be able to meet the full time employee’s requirement. Communicate with the external clients and partners in a professional way, and also ensure effective communication and great cooperation with internal colleagues (Among same and different function/ store/region). Keep inventory full and neat (if applicable). Other Responsibilities: Perform other related duties as assigned, based on the business need. Requirements 3 years’ work experience in retail, industry and key account sales with proven track record to meet or exceed targets and goals. Highly appreciate Company culture and value. Strong communication and customer service experience required. Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry And Key Account Sales Experience Preferred. During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is  required to pass the probationary period. Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 产品专家  主要职责 保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉 粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。 通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确 特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲  朋好友宣传特斯拉。 收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销 售主管完成门店的销售目标。 对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。 认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。 建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲 朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。 通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、 店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和  要求。 和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事 保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地  区、跨地区之间）。 保持库存充足和整洁（如适用）。 员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不 可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。 职位要求 3 年以上零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验； 对企业文化高度认可。 出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。 良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的 变革。 深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。 能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。 持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™  Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam.  More information can be found at www.dsm.com .  The Position: Sales of DSM products directly to customers or through distribution channel in a designated area, achieving the respective budget targets in volume, price and OPEX. Development and implementation of Customer Action Plans (Caps) according to schedule agreed with immediate superior To monitor sales results by customer and product taking corrective measures whenever necessary. To inform management about relevant market data such as: competitive price strategy and/or actions; product demand, etc. To quote price and to develop commercial proposals according to agreed strategy To deliver commercial presentations aiming to improve customer knowledge of DSM products as well as to further develop DSM branding To prospect, searching for new customers, new business and promote innovation To acknowledge and strictly follow SHE policy in all activities The Ideal : Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience in food science/technology or related field Minimum 5 years of experience in nutrition industry Knowledge of industry and markets, in depth know-how about products and/or applications Balance of commercial and technical knowledge, skills and experience Clear English communication skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Team Player Negotiation Skill Ability to perform under stress Initiative Royal DSM is an equal employment opportunity and  affirmative action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.

公司介绍：  Airwallex空中云汇是一家全球领先的金融科技公司，通过构建全球金融基础设施，为各类规模的企业提供数字化的金融科技产品。在全球互联的信息化时代，以更高效安全的方式帮助企业在全世界高速发展。  Airwallex空中云汇的使命是构建新一代的数字化金融基础设施并赋能企业在全球的发展，为其提供端到端的金融服务平台：从付款到收款，从本地到跨境，提供实时、安全且高效的金融解决方案，节省客户的时间及成本；并同时提供网页端应用和API解决方案，从而覆盖从大型机构到中小企业的不同需求。  自2015年成立以来，Airwallex空中云汇现已在全球设立了10个办事处，拥有超过400名员工，获得包括来自腾讯、红杉中国、DST Global、高瓴资本、维港投资、ANZi Ventures、Mastercard和Salesforce Ventures等顶级投资者总计超过3.6亿美元的融资。2019年3月，Airwallex空中云汇在完成C轮融资后估值超过10亿美元，成为亚太金融科技独角兽，并于2018年和2019年连续被毕马威 (KPMG) Fintech100榜单评为全球50强领先金融科技公司之一。  www.airwallex.com  工作职责： 根据公司的战略规划，确保各项指标有效执行，保质保量完成公司制定的销售计划，达成业绩； 通过电话营销，陌生拜访，社群运营，在线跟进等各种销售形式拓展和转化行业客户； 保持对行业相关领域内各类信息的敏感和追踪，及时反馈并建议，探索并推广新的商业合作模式，为公司业务带来可持续发展。 任职要求： 大学本科及以上学历； 一年以上相关工作经验，有银行/跨境支付/外汇/跨境电商背景优先； 有极强的自我驱动力，以结果为导向，对结果负责； 具备优秀的策划与客户沟通能力，能够与客户建立良好的合作关系； 优秀的学习能力和沟通能力，思维敏捷、有良好的应变能力和承压能力； 具有敏锐的市场洞察力和准确的分析能力，能够有效开发并维护客户资源。

jobTitle: Channel Sales Leader 麻醉围术渠道销售主管 R3572598
description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  负责管理和开展公司指定区域指定产品线的分销商关系，完善渠道和区域管理，同时达到市场占有份额目标，以完成规定的区域和客户的销售指标和利润目标。  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Essential Responsibilities 在指定的区域内完成公司下达的销售指标； 执行公司的市场策略和销售政策； 为分销商提供产品支持，协助分销商达成销售指标； 在指定的区域开发/建立并维护良好的分销经营渠道； 建立和维护客户的长期关系，提高客户的满意度； 利用销售工具收集/分析所在区域的市场情况，寻找潜在的机会，提供准确的市场预测； 开展和组织所负责区域的市场推广和销售活动； 任职条件:  Qualifications/Requirements 大学本科或以上学历，医学，临床背景优先； 3年以上医疗器械/耗材分销商管理经验或直接销售经验； 高度诚信和敬业精神，遵守公司相关规定； 较强的市场开拓和沟通能力及优秀的谈判技巧； 能用英语阅读专业资料并写作，熟练操作电脑； 卓越的对内对外沟通技能； 团队工作的技能（包括寻找和利用各种资源达成目标的能力） 良好的演讲技能 能够承受相应压力，并拥有自我学习的意愿和能力。 Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: What makes Gartner Sales a GREAT fit for you? When you join Gartner, you’ll set your career on track for outstanding achievement with a company that knows no limits. We’re the world’s leading research and advisory company, steering clients toward the right decisions with business and technology insights they can’t find anywhere else. Our sales associates earn a competitive base salary, uncapped commissions and exceptional benefits — along with top training and support, and recognition for high performers. If you’re coachable, persistent, smart, executive-savvy, and looking for your next great adventure, Gartner is the place for you.  Interested in learning more, view and register for any of our upcoming recruiting events here !  Account Executive  About This Role  The Account Executive is a field sales role responsible for direct client contract value, retention and growth through contract expansion, and the introduction of new products and services. The territory for this role includes specific high-tech and telecom enterprise accounts.  What You’ll Do Consult with C-level executive clients to develop and implement an effective, enterprise wide strategy that maximizes the value Gartner delivers Manage accounts with the outcome of increased customer satisfaction, retention and account growth Master and consistently execute Gartner’s internal sales methodology Demonstrate senior sales leadership through coaching, mentoring and developing junior sales account executives What You’ll Need Bachelor’s degree is required; Masters or advanced degree a plus 5+ years of proven consultative sales experience in high technology (services, software or hardware) Ability to prospect and manage C-level and senior-level relationships within large global enterprises Proven experience building excellent client relationships, offering value added, insightful and strategic vision into their business Knowledge of the full life cycle of the sales process from prospecting to close Who You Are Comfortable selling to, influencing and building trust-based, value-added relationships with senior executives Able to solve complex problems and successfully manage ambiguity and unexpected change Teachable and embracing of best practices and feedback as a means of continuous improvement Consistently high achiever marked by perseverance, humility and a positive outlook in the face of challenges The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to affirmatively seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.  Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at 203-964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com .  Job Requisition ID:59525  By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.  Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy  For efficient navigation through the application, please only use the back button within the application, not the back arrow within your browser.

description: WATI is an early stage, fast growing SaaS platform that is revolutionizing how businesses communicate with their customers. We believe customer relationships are built through conversations, one message at a time. Through our cutting-edge customer engagement software built on Whatsapp’s Business API, businesses are now able to have personalised conversations, be easily accessible and engage with their customers in-real time - at scale! We live in the on-demand economy, where customers expect fast, simple and easy service and that’s exactly what our platform empowers companies to do.  This is made possible through WATI’s easy-to-use platform that can be made up and running in no time. As a result, small and medium businesses have embraced the platform rapidly, and thousands of customers across 54 countries are now using WATI within just a year of launch.  We are growing fast, and we are now looking for a Customer Success Manager to join the Customer Success team. This role will work closely with our SMB and enterprise clients and act as the customer’s internal advocate, to help remove obstacles that may impede a client’s experience with WATI. The coordination of activities, timely reporting and the management of all risk and escalation will be a significant element of this role.  The ideal candidate will have a strong background of helping customers solve challenges, unique to their businesses and have the utmost passion.  What you’ll do: Maintain a high level of customer response and satisfaction based upon both survey and attrition indicators Increase reference ability Identify additional applicable use cases and business needs for WATI capabilities and successfully deploy into customers account Coordinate relevant performance review data at regular and agreed review points and will be interpreted to determine customer performance and support recommendations to increase the business benefits and usage of product. Continuously optimize and improve the development and sharing of best practices and lessons learned for increasing overall program efficiency Maintain an excellent relationship with the key stakeholders of the account and convert these relationships and conversations into significant outcomes, such as account growth and usage increase Serve as the escalation point for any items within the account Support the contract and renewal process Own, drive and/or support activities that transform business through thought leadership, vision and organizational development  Requirements Strong verbal and written communications skills in English and Portuguese Strong organization and follow-up skills with attention to detail Experience with consultative solution selling methodology Experience connecting and selling to senior executives within large organizations Track record of high performance and extremely satisfied customers Experience with startups/ SaaS is preferred

Careers that Change Lives  A Day in the Life  Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned. Promotes and sells Medtronic's products and services within an assigned geographic area and /or specific customer accounts to meet or exceed sales targets. Responsible for developing, building, and strengthening long-term relationships with stakeholders including distributors and healthcare professionals. Responsible for pursuing leads, assessing needs and providing product services to maximize the benefits derived from Medtronic's products and/or services. Promotes and establishes education of the company's products and/or services. Conducts market research including customers and competitors activities. Implements market development plans/strategies and changes as needed. Communicates customer feedback on new products and/or modifications to existing products or applications to internal stakeholders including R&D, Operations and Marketing. Must Have: Minimum Requirements Bachelors degree required Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience and working knowledge of company products and services Nice to Have  About Medtronic  Together, we can change healthcare worldwide. At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology, therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life. We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday. It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.  We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives. Help us shape the future.  Physical Job Requirements  The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)  Additional Information Posting Date: Aug 15, 2021 Travel: Yes, < 50 % of the Time

One of the largest Management Consulting Firm who focus on medical technology in the global market is currently recruiting a Business Analyst to their Shanghai who is excited about working in a rapidly growing technology company and thrives in a fun, but fast-paced and challenging environment. Committed to customer success and innovation, they are on the forefront of transforming how life sciences companies share information with healthcare providers (HCPs). Today 10 of the top 20 global biopharmaceutical companies are using them to go to market smarter. Headquartered in San Francisco, we have offices around the world, including Philadelphia, London, Barcelona, Tokyo, Osaka, Shanghai, and Beijing.   He or She will report to the director, CAS Team, the business analyst would be responsible for working with our customers to understand their strategic goals, develop proposed custom analytics, and manage the execution of custom analytics projects. The overall goal is to deepen our engagement with customers by identifying challenges they have which are not currently met by our existing suite of software, and then meet those needs through custom analytical services.   The ideal candidate is somebody with both advanced analytical skills and a well-developed business sense that enables them to identify customer needs and communicate proposed solutions in easy to understand ways.   Job Responsibilities:   Developing and managing the delivery of custom consulting projects, including: Working with customers and our customer success team to understand the customer’sstrategy and current business questions and/or challenges. Proposing analytical projects designed to answer customer questions or addresscommercial challenges. Developing project cost, timing and resource need estimates. Conducting analyses, developing written communication of results, and delivering results to customers. Pulling in support from the global data science team and/or local analytics support as needed.   Skills and Requirements:   Knowledge and Experience Undergraduate degree in quantitative or business-related field (advanced degrees preferred) 3+ years’ experience in roles related to data analysis, including some experience with databases Experience in data analysis on marketing and sales data (ideally in the pharmaceutical industry but experience in other industries also welcome). Customer-facing experience in the Chinese market, including managing project requirements and communicating project results. Native Chinese Level with Business English capability. Strong written and verbal communication skills (example presentations welcome). Comfort in working with a high degree of autonomy in a fast-paced, loosely structured startup environment.   Competencies Client service – The ability and willingness to take client challenges and treat them as one’s own. Analytical creativity – The ability to take ambiguous business question and answer it with robust data analysis through a process of trial-and-error. Entrepreneurism – The desire and ability to build a new practice and team, understanding the broader business goals and taking direct action to achieve it. Curiosity – A strong interest in data science and machine learning topics, with the drive to self-teach new techniques as necessary.   To Apply: Please click on the Apply button. Please include a short note outlining why you are interested in the role and why you think you are suitable.   In case you have difficulty in applying or if you have any questions, please contact Richard Hao by wechat & phone 18622086381 or send your CV thru r.hao@proclinical.com.   A full job description is available on request.

Company Description  MicroStrategy transforms organizations into intelligent enterprises through data-driven innovation. We match smart people to dynamic projects and technologies that truly challenge their talents. Curious and creative in outlook, our success is built on the talent and energy of smart and driven people. A pioneer in the BI and analytics space, MicroStrategy delivers innovative software that empowers people to make better decisions and transform the way they do business. We provide our enterprise customers with world-class software and expert services so they can deploy unique intelligence applications.  Job Description  We are looking for a proven individual in the SI/VAR/reselling sector and a background in Business Intelligence.  Your Focus You will work within a matrix organisation and utilise appropriate resources to ensure success of your job responsibilities Develop partner business plans and programme objectives to support revenue commitments Conduct Quarterly Business Reviews, measuring partner performance against pre-established business metrics Recruit qualified partners that have a focus on reselling MicroStrategy products and services Drive enablement and launch of new partners Work with MicroStrategy Partner Enablement teams to enable assigned partners for MicroStrategy Pre-Sales, Sales, Product and Technical Implementation Establish and perform targeted lead generation marketing events with assigned partners Evangelise the partnership including joint value proposition with sales teams to ensure awareness and collaboration, minimising sales conflicts Assist partners, as needed, in the sales cycles to end user clients by utilising Partner Presales Engineers and Field Sales resources Maintain lead management and sales funnel activity with assigned Solution Provider Partners Manage partner resell activity, pipeline and forecasts in Partner Portal (SFA) and submit accurate weekly forecasts to management Achieve / Exceed quarterly and annual quotas Qualifications Bachelors equivalent mandatory, BS/BA Degree, Computer Science or Marketing (with technology focus), MBA preferred 7 + years experience working with and managing VAR/Resellers Strong record of achieving/exceeding revenue quota while working with VAR/resell partners Good knowledge of business intelligence products and market Excellent communication, presentation (PPT) and relationship building skills. Excellent time management capabilities. Strong writing skills Must be willing to travel up to 50% Must be self-starter, motivated and results oriented Able to work independently within a matrix organization Experience in working with partners from recruitment to enablement to business development to closure of deals Experience with Business Intelligence systems or relational database management systems a plus
