Responsible for working directly with customers to collect information, expand/sell additional assembly operations, products and services to current customers, and ensure customers' needs are met. Prepares and presents solutions to customers; engage in customer interactions that drive revenue and margin commitments, while strengthening customer relationships and increasing customer satisfaction. Follow organizational policies and procedures and maintain clear and direct line of communication within the organization to leverage multiple solution resources (tools, equipment, information, training programs, field investigation, surveys, and services) to meet customer requirements.  Primary Job Responsibilities Identify new business opportunities. Maintain good relationships with clients. Work closely with the business owner on a business growth strategy and then develop an action plan with goals and objectives. Analyze current and past financial data, such as sales reports, and provide strategies to cut costs and increase revenue. Perform market research to identify new opportunities and engage with executives to establish strategies for pursuing those new opportunities. Create and improve proposals for our existing and new clients. Provide training and mentoring to members of the business development team. Develop and deliver pitches for potential investors. Develop network with investors and other business partners to generate new leads. Develop relationships with prospective clients, while maintaining existing client relationships. Identify potential clients in the target market and complete appropriate research on the prospective client's business and equipment needs. Travel to destinations to best facilitate transactions or training. Partner with sales teams to create contract-winning proposals for current and prospective clients. Negotiate contract terms with clients and communicate terms to stakeholders. Collaborate with design and production teams to ensure contracted product specifications are executed on-time and as agreed. Become a subject matter expert on our business products, processes and operations, and remain up-to-date on industry news. Be able to foresee and / or anticipate the needs of our current or future clients, studying current and future market trends to ensure Android's positioning as a market leader. All other duties as assigned. Expectations Knowledge of the OEM automotive manufacturing and assembly industry, products, competitors, and trends. Technical knowledge to discuss assembly process capabilities. Deeper understanding of the industry, with the ability to become a subject matter expert on the job. Understanding of how to interpret P&L, Earnings, and Inventory reports. Excellent leadership and organizational skills. Excellent verbal skills – logical, rational, analytical and organized. Innovation and problem-solving skills that include the ability to develop and propose equipment-based solutions for clients. A team player who displays humility and respect for other views; operates with integrity. Robust interpersonal skills. Ability to successfully manage conflict and uncomfortable situations. Self-motivated; ability to work independently. Ability to multi-task to effectively handle numerous projects, initiatives, and issues; operate with a sense of urgency, successfully managing in a fast-paced environment to satisfy multiple customers both internal and external. Ability to prioritize work focus based on varied criteria, deadlines, customer needs, situational urgencies, and department objectives. Proficient in Microsoft applications: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc. Demonstrated achievement in B2B sales. Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including facilitation of group presentations. Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications, including Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Access and industry-specific analysis software. A valid passport. Ability to travel in order to see clients, explore new markets and attend conventions. Qualifications And Experience Bachelor's degree in related field. 5+ years’ experience working in a business development role. Traits/Values Hope: The quality of possessing and adhering to positive, optimistic expectation of future events. Trust: Confidence in one another. Compassion: The quality of an understanding of another's challenges. Justice: Concern for fairness. Wisdom: The quality of having good, sound judgement. Courage: Strength in the face of adversity.
industries: Construction, Staffing and Recruiting, and Human Resources

description: 公司描述  Lesaffre group was founded in 1853, a 166-year-old French group based in Northern France has now become a multi-national and a multicultural company that is committed to providing the best in each of its business areas: baking, nutrition and health, flavours and fermentation.  Lesaffre started its business in China over 30 years ago. Beyond yeast and bread improvers, Lesaffre offers a full range of products and services related to nutrition and health: yeast extracts for food savory and high performance nutrients for micro-organism and cell cultures, yeasts and other probiotics for human and animal nutrition, crop protection, yeasts for beer, wines, and renewable fuels, etc.  In 2010, Lesaffre Management (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. was set up to manage Lesaffre’s business in China, from human resources, sales& marketing, to finance and operation management.  China headquarter： based in Shanghai, managing all Lesaffre business in China  5 regional sales offices： Shanghai, Guangzhou, Beijing, Shenyang and Hong Kong, managing business, implementing marketing initiatives and providing sales services to our customers in China, Hong Kong & Taiwan  4 baking centers： in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Hong Kong, providing R&D and technical support, training and technical services to our customers.  5 modernized plants: Anhui Mingguang, Guangxi Laibin, Guangxi Chongzuo.  For more information about our company, please visit our website: http://www.lesaffre.com.cn  职位描述  Location could be based in Fujian, Jiangxi, Hunan, Sichuan of China. Responsible for the Sales and the distributors to promote sales of Phileo products to achieve or exceed sales target. To coordinate with the technical service of Phileo the establishment of commercial trials and the answers to local legal questions. Visit existing and new accounts with Technical manager or distributer, seek and assess customer needs, provide products and services solutions, and deepen relationships Identify and choose in agreement with the sales management the new distributors or agents necessary for the development of sales of Phileo products. Support to establish/settle the new distributors and train them on the Phileo product range. To report on customer needs. Follow up on quality claims made by his customers on Phileo products. To report on competition monitoring (information, samples, prices.) description: MAIN PURPOSE  The purpose of the position is to manage the strategy and execution of Cartier Jewellery’s key product categories. Identify opportunities and come up with action plans based on market analysis on regular basis with the support of Assistant Jewellery Manager  …………………………………………………………………………………………………………  Experience  QUALIFICATION:  Bachelor’s Degree in related field Strong analytical skills and critical/strategic thinking 2 to 3 years of experience in product management, preferably in luxury goods Previous role must demonstrate strength with regards to quantitative and qualitative analysis, forecasting, budget preparation, interpretation of data and report Must demonstrate ability to work across functions with strong communications & interpersonal skills Strong analytical skills and logical thinking Strong command of numbers Detail-oriented and precise Ability to interpret numbers and translate them into action plans Good project management and planning skills Ability to communicate effectively and collaborate with cross-functions Excellent knowledge of Microsoft Excel (including data analysis functions) and Microsoft Powerpoint Good command of both written and spoken English & Mandarin Positive attitude and team player Self-starter, takes initiative and capable of working independently Be curious & think out of the box …………………………………………………………………………………………………………  Dimension Internal contacts: Report to Assistant Jewellery Manager Liaise with Communication, Merchandising, CRM, PR, Retail, Logistics, VM and Learning & Development teams to implement strategic action plans

jobTitle: Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , Dalian
description: Work is no longer a place. It’s what you do. And how you do it. More fluid, more flexible, powered by your imagination and by some amazing technology! That’s where we come in. We’re Poly. We’re a global outfitter of pro-grade audio and video technology so that employees everywhere can look and sound their best from anywhere. Join us as we pursue our disruptive vision to bring professional audio and video meeting technology and services to everyone. Be a part of our journey!  As an Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , (ICAM) you will work as part of our APAC Inside Sales Team. You will workwithin a defined geographical territory, (Mainland China) and initiate, own and close sales opportunities on Products and New Service through interacting with a nominated set of Poly Channel Partners , as well as being responsible for the successful on-boarding, development and retention of such Partners.  You will be expected to generate and drive a sufficient pipeline of deals to ensure financial targets are met.  The role requires an active cooperation with multiple departments in Poly and so relationship building, and people skills are essential.  主要职责： 根据公司业务方向，开拓三四级城市渠道 渠道认证：渠道客户的选择、认证； 新产品上市的渠道规划与沟通； 管理负责渠道中 Poly耳机音频和视频业务，完成公司销售目标 完成负责渠道的策略和任务规划 善于利用和整合资源，促进不同团队合作，共同高效完成业绩目标 职位要求： 有一定的 IT 行业渠道销售经验优先 优秀的沟通、协作、谈判能力 勤奋，能够在快节奏的环境中工作和成长 2 年以上相关销售工作经验 全日制本科及以上学历，英语可作为工作语言优先 Our Culture  At Poly, leadership principles aren't just something we talk about, they're something we live and breathe. We believe in creating a work environment where people feel empowered, supported, and included –where trust and transparency are built into the way we work - where creativity, curiosity, and continuous improvement are encouraged and nurtured every day. C3 – Customer. Customer. Customer: Customer obsession is everyone’s job. You enjoy solving customers’ problems - big or small. You work closely with customers, channel partners and their teams to deliver innovative solutions. Raise the Bar: You take pride in your work and know details matter. You know that shavings make a pile. You seek every opportunity to continuously improve teams, products, and processes. Communicate Courageously: You speak with candor but aren't a jerk. You constructively challenge your teammates to get to the best possible outcome or decision. Once a decision is made, you fully align and stay aligned. Onward and Upward: You learn from the past but focus on the future. You rapidly adapt to changes in the marketplace. You help to create solutions that move the company forward with energy, momentum, and results. Own It: You know your business, your customers, and your team – inside and out. You don't sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. You act with integrity, spend money like it’s your own, and put Poly first. Take the Leap: Speed matters in business. You encourage and require those around you to think strategically and act decisively. Poly values calculated risk taking. Ride Together: We are one team. We do what we say we’ll do, we treat each other with respect, we have each other’s back, and we hold each other accountable. Leaders Lead: You know you are part of a larger global community and make decisions as good stewards of the earth, its resources and its people. Our Commitment as an Equal Opportunity Employer  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, race, age, religious creed, national origin, physical or mental disability, ancestry, color, marital status, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, medical condition, genetic information, accessibility needs, or any other protected class or category recognized by applicable equal employment opportunity or other similar laws.  No matter where you’re based, you’ll experience a company that believes that teamwork and collaboration drive maximum impact, seeks well-rounded talent to focused on providing the best customer experience, and understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint. And, top of mind to us is continuously and purposefully building an inclusive culture that empowers all of our team members, across the globe, to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.

jobTitle: Sales Executive-Corporate 公司销售代表
description: Grand Kempinski Hotel Shanghai  Grand Kempinski Hotel Shanghai is centrally located in the Lujiazui financial and trade section of the prestigious Pudong district and offers sweeping views of the Huangpu River and the Shanghai skyline. Grand Kempinski Hotel Shanghai has 686 rooms and suites, 6 restaurants & bars as well as extensive banquet facilities for up to 720 guests.It also has an oversized indoor pool, Spa and state-of-the-art fitness center on the 30th floor with panoramic view. Within walking distance to the Oriental Pearl Tower and only a short drive away from The Bund, New International Expo Centre and luxurious shopping centres, the hotel is easy access to any well-known landmarks of Shanghai. The Pudong and Hongqiao international airports can also be reached within 45 minutes.  OVERALL OBJECTIVES  The Job Of Sales Executive Is Executed Satisfactorily When  The Hotel achieves its Financial Objectives.  The Sales team that the person works with achieves their Revenue Objectives.  The person achieves their Personal Objectives.  The TTTT is carried out to the satisfaction of both Director of Sales / Director of Sales & Marketing and Sales Executive  Main Responsibilities  Solicit existing and potential customers and follow up established accounts on regular basis by phone, by correspondence or by personal contact.  Set up appointments and make personal sales calls, telemarketing and site inspections to all existing and potential accounts from corporate commercial accounts.  Follow up on lost business and bring information about them to the knowledge of the department superior.  Negotiate with all customers and send out offers/contracts regarding individual and group business.  Follow the sales and marketing results and propose corrective actions if needed.  Explore industry related data, new developments in certain agencies’ structures, new assignments, industrial complexes, new business centers, new projects which all could be interest and benefit of the hotel and to distribute this information to their colleagues.  Entertain decision makers of the Clients in the F & B outlets of the hotel and to take part in promotional activities with them.  Keep close follow up on developments of the competitor hotels (occupancy, structural alterations, renovation, special campaigns, rate promotions, marketing efforts, theme events etc.) Also explore and compare FIT and Group traffic (who is accommodating guests in which hotel) amongst the competitors.  Bring ideas and participate in the preparations of the promotional theme events, other promotional activities and invitation lists.  When necessary, handle the group and individual reservation requests personally.  Maintain the existence of an efficient customer database system (SFA) which will be capable of identifying report sales calls and other sales activities and carry out updating exercise in certain periods of time.  Update customers with the latest developments in the hotel and informs hotel management of all changes in the customer profile.  Participate preparing the sales action plans, attending sales meetings, developing new ideas such as special packages, programs, promotional activities undertaken by sales department and/or F&B.  Take part in sales training programs, trade fairs / shows, sales blitzes and fam trips assigned by the Director of Sales / Director of Sales & Marketing.  Keep themselves updated with the latest developments in the hotel including all activities, promotions, rates of the Hotel and the other chain hotels.  Keep department superiors informed of all changes in the customer profile.  Prepare reports of each sales calls covering information about the company, their comments, requirements, complaints, of their customers etc.  Cover assigned accounts in a designated Segment or geographic area and visit them at least twice annually.  On weekly basis, prepare an activity report which will cover sales call reports, site inspections, fam trips, new agencies, meetings, entertainment and other functions they participated in during the week and presents to Sales Director.  Accomplish any additional work assigned by Department head or Division head in the time frame required.  Cross selling other Kempinski Hotels in the Area and Globally.  Additional responsibilities and tasks can be added at any time according to the needs of the business and of the hotel.  About Kempinski  Hoteliers since 1897, we have travelled the world in search of the most fascinating destinations without ever forgetting the finest traditions of our European heritage. We are dedicated to please and educated to entertain. We never compromise on the European elegance of service and this, blended with our cultural empathy, allows us to deliver incredible experiences in truly original destinations. We pride ourselves on delivering a beautiful performance for each and every one of our guests. And for our employees, we provide a stage on which they can flourish and realise their full potential.  Grand Kempinski Hotel Shanghai  Grand Kempinski Hotel Shanghai is centrally located in the Lujiazui financial and trade section of the prestigious Pudong district and offers sweeping views of the Huangpu River and the Shanghai skyline. Grand Kempinski Hotel Shanghai has 686 rooms and suites, 6 restaurants & bars as well as extensive banquet facilities for up to 720 guests.It also has an oversized indoor pool, Spa and state-of-the-art fitness center on the 30th floor with panoramic view. Within walking distance to the Oriental Pearl Tower and only a short drive away from The Bund, New International Expo Centre and luxurious shopping centres, the hotel is easy access to any well-known landmarks of Shanghai. The Pudong and Hongqiao international airports can also be reached within 45 minutes. distribute them to customer base Provide tire merchandising market support to customer base Promote point of purchase usage Sales/Business Development Meet/exceed regional sales and productivity goals Deliver the Dealer Tire program to assigned dealers (book of business) Develop new business through alliance partner field contacts Collaborate with other team members to meet/exceed goals Other Responsibilities Meet/exceed objectives as it pertains to dealer calls, presentations and training sessions (provided via webex tutorial) Provide feedback and strategic information to the Sales Management team Submit timely contact reports and forecast reports to the Sales Manager as required Maintain contact with appropriate departments within Dealer Tire in order to ensure maximum success Complete all administrative documents required to process orders Position Requirements Must possess and demonstrate flexibility with changing work responsibilities, customer needs and market conditions Bachelor’s degree with at least three years of sales/service experience or equivalent work experience. Tire wholesaling/retailing industry preferred Successful completion of Dealer Tire’s “Tires 101” training program Prior experience selling and project managing a book of business Skilled at taking in many inputs, prioritizing, coordinating resources and executing Ability to build relationships at all levels and good communication with dealer management and Dealer Tire Proficiency at intermediate level with all Microsoft Office products Strong and quick assessment skills with ability to critically think in the moment and add value Strong customer relationship skills and ability to sell at the top Must be able to read, write and speak fluently in Chinese Ability to read, write and speak fluently in English preferred

General Summary  The Business Development Manager is responsible for target build and closure through market development. Accountability will center on margin and relationship building but will include prospecting, forecasting, achievement of sales objectives and directing activities across functional groups in support of account goals. Expectations include the ability to sell at all levels of management and build relationships that ensure Avient will continue to get the first and last look. Being skilled at customer centric selling approaches and effectively selling the value of our products and services are also keys to success. Individual must have the ability to assist customers in problem solving to deliver solutions, bring energy, enthusiasm and professionalism to their daily routines, and able to perform the function independently and effectively coach and direct personnel in marketing and other disciplines to achieve results. This individual will be able to influence effectively at the peer level, as well as with the next level of the organization, as a thought leader influencing cross functionally. Up to 75% travel is required.  Essential Duties & Responsibilities  The purpose of the Sales Function is to deliver: Profitable revenue growth, including robust new business development. Achieve stated gross margin targets as a percentage of sales. Approach the sales process with a high degree of professionalism and effectiveness by successful utilization of customer centric selling skills and tools, such as use of scorecards, business reviews, EVE tools, high/wide/deep, 5 warning signs, prospecting & new account calls, and development of a robust sales funnel, collecting ARs, avoidance of bad debts, cross selling, and effective CRM system management. Develop account relationships, identify opportunities and capture the specification for Avient’s products at strategic accounts within assigned geography or industry. Establish, track and close new business targets consistent with short- and long-term objectives at designated accounts within the territory. Develop contact matrix and establish strong relationships with key decision makers and project facilitators. Prospecting and cold calling. Develop, execute and manage sales plans, sales budgets, and expense budgets. Negotiate pricing and contracts to deliver value and growth. Establish account development plans and network resources up, down and across both the customer’s organization and Avient. Deliver the planned results (AOP). Develop account relationships, identify opportunities and capture service opportunities at strategic accounts within assigned geography or industry. Understand key players, applications, requirements, trends, and needs as well as Avient’s potential and share within the targeted industry. Become an industry and product expert to leverage successes across the industry. Coordinate closely with regional sales teams as well as collaborating with the technical area as necessary to accelerate and drive profitable growth through solutions selling to targeted accounts. Establish a linkage between the customer’s business strategy and Avient’s capabilities. Monitor the competition to better understand issues and threats and develop plans to eliminate barriers. Implement Avient’s, pricing and market strategies as well as business practices. Negotiate customer contracts and value packages to insure an acceptable return on Avient resources invested. Participate in strategy development, help position the business and develop the offer. Assist in defining the target markets, and commercial strategy. Establish individual performance standards, goals and objectives-- measure and provide feedback. Develop written Account Plans for strategic accounts including metrics to define annualized sales potential at each account. Develop, execute and manage sales plans and budgets. Manage expenses and report in a timely fashion. Manage strategic relationships, cultivate new alliances, and monitor competitive activity. Requirement Bachelor or above, major in polymer will be a plus. 8+ years of experience in Sales function. Preferred to have sales experience in plastic materials. Solid sales experience in Auto industry will be preferred. Good English level, fluent reading, writing and oral. Able to travel.

该职位来源于猎聘  We are now looking for a (Senior) Sales Expert Ports to join our team, Sales Asia Pacific.  The primary responsibility of the (Senior) Sales Expert, Ports is to increase order intake by actively seeking new customers and developing a lasting relationship with existing clients through excellent service. He/she also act as a Subject Matter Expert in the area of Ship Traffic Control (Vessel Traffic Monitoring Systems), executing the regional Smart Ports strategy, providing consultation and solutions to our customer, potential customer and the sales team.  As a (Senior) Sales Expert Ports, reporting to ASM of China, your work will focus on these responsibilities:  Sales & Business development Achieve the successful sales development and agreed targets; Identify new target customers/distributors and new sales opportunities in the assigned territory by meeting potential and existing customers; Realization of Order intake value targets in assigned region / accounts Build, maintain, broaden and strengthen good relationships with customers and partners. Selection, acquisition and retention of key accounts (partners / end-users) Apply Strategic Selling Techniques to engage prospective customers towards Wartsila Voyage on multi departmental and management levels. Manage the technical and commercial process: create proposals, quotations, organize bidding, conduct negotiations and close deals Cooperate with service and PMO team to provide good after sales service to customers and achieve customer satisfaction; Provide all necessary information, training and support to key accounts and distributors; Communicate with product team in obtaining product support Cooperate with Finance department to improve the performance of receivables Account Management Building Strategic Account Plans for assigned key Partners and End-Users Conduct Order intake analysis and Pipeline management Gain Executive Level Account Involvement both internally and externally Managing the Contract Renewal Process Manage virtual account / project teams related to assigned Customer base, using Internal and external (customer) departments. Monitor the output of the teams. Work closely with APAC regional sales and PMO team Manage possible complaints and escalations and Channel Conflicts. Reporting & Marketing Manage the sales opportunity pipeline and monthly report to management Monitor market development and innovation trend and feedback to product/solution development team in HQ Attend sales meetings and ensure that all subsequent action required is undertaken Provide Customer information / feedback on a regular basis To be successful in this role, we expect you to have: Computer, transportation engineering, information management, communication and other related professional backgrounds, master's degree or above MBA/Master’s degree in technical field or equivalent experience, with a minimum 5 years of international sales experience. Essential experience selling complex solutions and multimillion projects to governmental authority or systems integrators, primarily in the MSA, Ports, Coast guards, etc. Strong understanding of the Maritime Authority and knowledge of port operations, maritime logistics, vessel monitoring sensors and technology You should have the mind set for creating solutions and willingness to learn strategic selling methodology. Speaking in public and keeping presentation are familiar to you and you enjoy it. You already use Office tools and can easily use ERP and CRM applications. Travelling both nationally and internationally is included in this job (estimated 30% to 50%), where the situation allows it. We highly value an entrepreneurial style in working and you should be able to work autonomously. We still work as a team, so the communicational skills and a want to work together is important. Interest for new technologies and all new is needed as well as analytical skills.

Sateri is the biggest viscose staple fiber supplier globally with capacity about 1.5 million tons in China, and continue investing viscose and lyocell fiber expansion globally. Our products come from natural plantation, crossing value chain and coving viscose staple fiber, and lyocell fiber. As a sustainable material and good substitute to cotton, viscose staple fiber is growing rapidly to inspire textile and personal hygiene applications today. To support achieve such a high growth, Sateri marketing team is taking initiatives to pull viscose consumption from consumer side and pull viscose applications along value chain. Communication team is highly engaging into series of commercial communication activities, and position Sateri as leading responsible brands along value chain, as well promoting our products to market. In other hand, Sateri is working with different value chain partners to lead market trend and pull market demand. We are seeking for a candidate who is creative, strategic, and proactive. Candidate is expect to work with brand/communication team to plan and implement planned market communication activities (i.e. trade show, customer events, media promotion, sales tool etc.), and support strategic marketing projects and promotion activities jointly with key downstream partners. This position focuses on Lyocell business unit.  Qualifications 1.University degree, major in communication, advertising, or marketing relevant. 2.Minimum 6-8 years market communication experience required with good tracking record 3.Candidate shall be familiar with relevant B2B2C communication experience, solid background on communication strategy development, budget management & relevant communication tools and practice process. 4.Independent project driver yet a great team player 5.Joint marketing experience with partners would be a plus 6.Textile or consumer goods industry background would be a plus 7.Bi-lingual, Chinese and English. Good English writing and language skills 8.Excellent PPT and presentation skills  AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY 1.In line with Lyocell marketing strategy and objective, develop implementable Lyocell market communication plan to support company branding and new product promotion activities. 2.Coordinate and implement communication activities in plan and deliver measurable results, incl. exhibition, trade events, digital, media, joint marketing activities with strategic partners; 3.Strategic project & key products communication rollout 4.Downstream marketing activations support，Develop and upgrade sales tool to support sales and business development. Identify and upgrade effective communication solution and tools to improve communication effectiveness. 5.Brand co-marketing support，Collaborate with downstream brands & drive co-marketing programs based on brand business development needs.

description: At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.  At EY, Managed Services (MS) is a significant part of our business, comprising more than $4b in revenue with major clients across the globe. We help clients with people based, asset based and integrated solutions, leveraging our deep sector and domain expertise to deliver enhanced value to our clients. In MS we are also ambitious, seeking to more than double our success in the future. Join us in this newly created role and you’ll be right at the heart of the action, directly engaging with clients, influencers and deal makers in ways that will impact EY, our clients and people, as well as your own career.  The opportunity  As the Asia-Pacific Managed Services Client Executive (CE), you will ensure that EY invests in the right opportunities and drive innovation in the right areas across Service Lines and markets. You will achieve this by being in the market, talking to clients about their evolving needs and driving a portfolio of campaigns for priority Managed Services solutions within EMEIA.  Your Key Responsibilities Support the Asia-Pacific MS and Asia-Pacific Solution/Offering leaders to develop and execute Managed Services’ to go market plans specifically in the areas of Risk Management and Financial / Tax Transformation Execute on the MS go to market strategy across Asia-Pacific that is utilised by Area and Regional teams to identify, design, develop with clients, and execute high quality MS pursuits Drive new and existing qualified business opportunities and maximise new sales and cross sell opportunities Experience in selling solutions that are based on a global delivery model capability Foster and maintain relationships across target buyers within strategic clients Develop and maintain partner and vendor relationships Collaborate with our aligned sales community to communicate and promote strategic solutions internally Support Asia-Pacific /regional/solution leaders with the development MS GTM programmes and monitor progress – comprising awareness development, solution prioritisation, campaign design and development, client engagement and pursuit execution. Skills and attributes for success You will have experience of business development, solution selling and the complexities of managed services and Digital Transformation deals within professional services or a similar technology organisation Experience in delivery sales and customers outcomes across an internal matrix organisation as well as multiple customer stakeholders The influencing skills to successfully collaborate with senior client and EY stakeholders Demonstrated success working in a matrix environment The ability to effectively forecast, review projection of performance and targets  To qualify for the role, you must have Bachelor’s Degree with an advanced degree preferred  Ideally, you’ll also have 12+ years of experience executing complex and large managed service sales deals focused on Risk Solutions (e.g. Cyber Security, Third Party Risk Management, Internal Audit) and Financial Transformation (ideally in Tax systems and processes), preferably in a partnership/professional services or technology provider environment Experience in a leadership capacity in a managed services environment Experience structuring , managing and closing multimillion deals Board presentation experience or experience as a board member Knowledge and understanding of outsourcing and offshoring operating and cost/pricing models for managed services  What We Look For Professionals who possess the skills and attributes to drive transformational performance across a portfolio of accounts and solutions Expert client facing and client relationships skills; sustained high-impact c-suite relationships Expertise in the Managed Services field including knowledge of market and industry dynamics Strong content expertise (technical/sector). An innovative and creative mindset Experience in a matrix organization Comfortable managing through ambiguity and complexity, while working in a virtual setting  What Working At EY Offers Exciting work building out a key offering, working a team of like-minded professionals Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues around Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you  If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.  The Exceptional EY Experience. It’s Yours To Build.  EY | Building a better working world  EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.  Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.  Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

Highly appreciate Company culture and value. Strong communication and customer service experience required. Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry and key account sales experience preferred. During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is required to pass the probationary period. Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 产品专家  主要职责 保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。 通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友宣传特斯拉。 收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销售主管完成门店的销售目标。 对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。 认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。 建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。 通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和要求。 和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地区、跨地区之间）。 保持库存充足和整洁（如适用）。 员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。 职位要求 应届毕业生或1到2年零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验； 对企业文化高度认可。 出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。 良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的变革。 深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。 能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。 持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

工作职责:  Under minimal supervision, the Senior Sales Executive is responsible for new account development and/or expanding existing accounts within an established geographic territory. This position sells ULs products, systems, and/or services to customers in an assigned territory, industry, or accounts. Identifies and pursues prospects through various lead generated activities, including tradeshow, direct mailing, advertising, cold-calling, on key industry players and referral program. Meets with prospects to understand their purchase decision makers, decision making process criteria, and their needs. Develops sales presentations for potential new clients. Leads the sales presentations in support of growing the clientele for ULs services. Responsible for meeting with and presenting to the highest profile/potential clients. Provides value propositions, handles objections, prepares quotes, and closes sales by getting prospects’ commitments. Retains existing customers that are not managed by account management teams. Identifies and resolves a wide range of issues with little or no supervision. Coaches and mentors lower level staff on effective direct sales skills and sales processes. Supports junior staff in the identification and evaluation of important customer information. Performs other duties as directed. 任职条件: University Degree (Equivalent to Bachelors degree) in a related discipline plus generally eight years of directly related experience. Extensive knowledge of company policies and sales processes. Requires the ability to gain cooperation of others, conduct presentations of technical information concerning specific projects or schedules to senior level management and customers. Has extensive knowledge of companys products and services. Significant business travel and work outside of the office required.

At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.  At EY, Managed Services (MS) is a significant part of our business, comprising more than $4b in revenue with major clients across the globe. We help clients with people based, asset based and integrated solutions, leveraging our deep sector and domain expertise to deliver enhanced value to our clients. In MS we are also ambitious, seeking to more than double our success in the future. Join us in this newly created role and you’ll be right at the heart of the action, directly engaging with clients, influencers and deal makers in ways that will impact EY, our clients and people, as well as your own career.  The opportunity  As the Asia-Pacific Managed Services Client Executive (CE), you will ensure that EY invests in the right opportunities and drive innovation in the right areas across Service Lines and markets. You will achieve this by being in the market, talking to clients about their evolving needs and driving a portfolio of campaigns for priority Managed Services solutions within EMEIA.  Your Key Responsibilities Support the Asia-Pacific MS and Asia-Pacific Solution/Offering leaders to develop and execute Managed Services’ to go market plans specifically in the areas of Risk Management and Financial / Tax Transformation Execute on the MS go to market strategy across Asia-Pacific that is utilised by Area and Regional teams to identify, design, develop with clients, and execute high quality MS pursuits Drive new and existing qualified business opportunities and maximise new sales and cross sell opportunities Experience in selling solutions that are based on a global delivery model capability Foster and maintain relationships across target buyers within strategic clients Develop and maintain partner and vendor relationships Collaborate with our aligned sales community to communicate and promote strategic solutions internally Support Asia-Pacific /regional/solution leaders with the development MS GTM programmes and monitor progress – comprising awareness development, solution prioritisation, campaign design and development, client engagement and pursuit execution. Skills and attributes for success You will have experience of business development, solution selling and the complexities of managed services and Digital Transformation deals within professional services or a similar technology organisation Experience in delivery sales and customers outcomes across an internal matrix organisation as well as multiple customer stakeholders The influencing skills to successfully collaborate with senior client and EY stakeholders Demonstrated success working in a matrix environment The ability to effectively forecast, review projection of performance and targets  To qualify for the role, you must have Bachelor’s Degree with an advanced degree preferred  Ideally, you’ll also have 12+ years of experience executing complex and large managed service sales deals focused on Risk Solutions (e.g. Cyber Security, Third Party Risk Management, Internal Audit) and Financial Transformation (ideally in Tax systems and processes), preferably in a partnership/professional services or technology provider environment Experience in a leadership capacity in a managed services environment Experience structuring , managing and closing multimillion deals Board presentation experience or experience as a board member Knowledge and understanding of outsourcing and offshoring operating and cost/pricing models for managed services  What We Look For Professionals who possess the skills and attributes to drive transformational performance across a portfolio of accounts and solutions Expert client facing and client relationships skills; sustained high-impact c-suite relationships Expertise in the Managed Services field including knowledge of market and industry dynamics Strong content expertise (technical/sector). An innovative and creative mindset Experience in a matrix organization Comfortable managing through ambiguity and complexity, while working in a virtual setting  What Working At EY Offers Exciting work building out a key offering, working a team of like-minded professionals Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues around Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you  If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.  The Exceptional EY Experience. It’s Yours To Build.  EY | Building a better working world  EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.  Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.  Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Financial Services

description: 职位来源于智联招聘。  Job Responsibilities / 岗位职责： Conduct researches in targeted industry and prepare high quality customer lists. Identify clients’needs and approach key decision-makers through professional cold calls, emails and other tools. Collect political and business news, finish marketing research independently. Invite Decision Makers from Fortune 500 corporations to attend or sponsor our business summit/conference. To collect potential attendees information, including name, position, phone number , and so on. To achieve sales target and assessment efficiently. Provide on-site coordination and services to all the attendees. Qualifications / 基本要求： College degree or above, major in English, Business, Management or Finance preferred . Excellent communication skills in both English and Mandarin, CET6 or above CET6以上. Extrovert, Proactive, result-oriented and stress-resistant . Possess a passion for sales, self-motivation and ambition for a considerable income. Relevant sales experience preferred; proficiency in office software like Word, Excel, Power Point..etc preferred. Salary and Benefits / 薪资福利： Basic salary + Commission + Performance salary. Excellent career prospects（Junior Sales/Senior Sales / Sales Manager/Sales Director/VP for Sales). Attractive benefit package (Insurances / housing fund, commercial insurance, public holidays and Annual leaves)s. Comprehensive and professional training Program (research skills, sale skills, industry knowledge, etc). Rich corporate culture (company trips, outdoor events, dinner parties, etc). 以担保或任何理由索要财物，扣押证照，均涉嫌违法。

该职位来源于猎聘  Purpose/Objective  This position is expected to well implement company’s selling strategies, lead distributors to achieve annual selling targets, provide sufficient supports to channel partners and help customers solve their problems.  Area Of Responsibilities Responsible for selling instruments and reagent; Facilitate sales activities and monitor the sales performance of dealers, including daily dealer management; Provide pre-sales technical support to end user and dealers; Provide basic product training for internal and external groups, including workshops and instrument demonstration; Initiate and support the regional marketing programs; Prepare sales forecast and analysis and develop plans to maximize sales opportunities; Monitor competitive activities and customer response and provide feedback to the management team; Routine customer visit and build up good relationship with key customers. Person Specification： University degree or above; with Min. 3 year related work experience; Ability to deliver clear presentation and speak to internal & external groups; Fluent in English & Chinese writing & speaking; Familiar with MS-Office (Word, Excel, Access, Outlook, PowerPoint);

Meet our Team  We partner with Hitachi Vantara’s Sales team and leadership to translate the company’s sales strategy into an effective operating model. Our Sales teams represent Hitachi Vantara to major clients across many industries and markets, and our team supports all of the planning, operational management, and execution functions that drive successful and high performing sales people. Our data-driven culture and insatiable curiosity drive actionable insights that bring value to the organisation, and we need highly capable and experienced professionals to passionately partner with our stakeholders.  What You’ll Be Doing Using the variety of tools and data sources available to you, you will drive market-leading Sales Analytics & Intelligence Monitoring our master data to ensure it is clean, you will develop preventive and detective controls to ensure that it is ready for reporting at all times. You will also review and support all of the APAC regional teams with managing their master data proceses, and provide support and guidance when required. You will play a key role in supporting Sales Operations leadership and the regional teams in Sales Planning Your expertise will be highly sought after in the entire lifecycle of segmenting our customer base, and you will be able to generate insights and reporting that assists the regional teams to deploy quota appropriately. On a bi-annual basis, you will be heavily involved in the Go-To-Market planning and review cycles, devoting significant effort to meeting Global deadlines and requirements. On a weekly basis you will assist in managing the Sales Processes & Cadence across the APAC area. You will be across all the forecast submissions on a weekly basis, highlighting areas of concern or opportunity, and being the contact point for issues and resolution. You will provide expertise and support the global team through regular reporting and requests for further detail. You will also have a keen business mind, and you will pull together Win/Loss information across the APAC area, striving to find the relevant factors, and once recorded in the CRM identifying trends and insights that you can share across the teams. You will have a passion for solving problems with data, identifying opportunities to develop operational Reporting and Insights across the APAC region, especially in areas where you can help solve real-world problems for each of the regional teams in APAC. All of the above activities that you will be doing, are part of your role to provide Sales Support. You will partner with Sales and Sales Operations teams to help drive the region forward, providing support where needed.  What You Bring To The Team 5+ years’ experience in a high performing Sales Operations team within a multi-national Information Technology or Technology Solutions is preferred Good understanding of the key requirements of the role, global best practices in Sales Operations, and how you can add value to the organisation. Extensive and broad experience with Salesforce.com, PowerBI, and Excel is required Possessing the skills as to how to interlock systems and processes and structure models in the way that are strong, reliable, low maintenance and repeatable. Looking at a Dashboard or a report and explaining the story behind the data, not just the data you can see. Inquisitive and intuitive mindset, seeking to find new patterns and insights from data is essential Proficient in communicating in English (both written and verbal) A Bachelor’s degree in Comerce, Economics, or Business is required, and with (or are seeking to) further post-graduate study in Business, Business Administration, or Data Analytics is preferred Our Company  Hitachi Vantara is part of the Global Hitachi family. We balance innovation with an open, friendly culture and the backing of a long-established parent company, known for its ethical reputation. We guide customers from what’s now to what’s next by unlocking the value of their data and applications to solve their digital challenges, achieving outcomes that benefit both business and society.  Our people are our biggest asset, they drive our innovation advantage and we strive to offer a flexible and collaborative workplace where they can thrive. Diversity of thought is welcomed and our employee base is represented by several active Employee Resource Group communities. We offer industry leading benefits packages (flexible working, generous pension and private healthcare) and promote a creative and inclusive culture. If driving real change gives you a sense of pride and you are passionate about powering social good, we’d love to hear from you.  Our Values  Research tells us that some applicants, especially those from underrepresented groups, can be put off from applying for roles if they need flexibility or feel they don’t meet all of the set criteria. We strive to create an inclusive environment for all and are open to considering home working, compressed/flexible hours and part-time arrangements. Get in touch with us to explore how we might be able to accommodate your specific needs.  With Japanese Roots Going Back Over 100 Years, Our Culture Is Founded On The Values Of Our Parent Company Expressed As The Hitachi Spirit  We are proud to say we are an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.  Wa – Harmony, Trust, Respect  Makoto – Sincerity, Fairness, Honesty, Integrity  Kaitakusha-Seishin – Pioneering Spirit, Challenge
industries: Information Technology and Services, Human Resources, and Management Consulting

description: 工作职责:  The Field Account Manager will be responsible for revenue growth within an assigned group of accounts, proactively selling the full range of the BioProcess portfolio, and developing strong customer relationships in order to leverage our position within the target organizations.  Main Responsibilities & Tasks Proactive sales of the whole product portfolio/solution offers /new products by both in-person and remote interaction to assigned accounts, ensure customer centric selling approach Develop business plans/rolling forecast for assigned account sites Analyze customer needs and present/demonstrate our products/solutions/value proposition as well as create quotations, negotiation and closing the deal with the customer Drive critical after-sales activities and facilitate things moving forward with acceptable time and quality Facilitate internal resources allocation to satisfy customer needs Build and maintain a strategic customer relationship management Propose strategic customer collaborations for potential accounts to support the long-term business growth Use CRM to share customer’s requests and status along the selling process Explore new business opportunities or cross-selling points via the interaction with customers Qualifications & Skills Graduate qualification in a discipline or equivalent experience in biopharma industry 5+ years sales experience in the biopharma industry is preferred Proactive, result driven and collaborative attitude Good negotiation skills Economical and financial know how Good analytical and presentation skills Good interpersonal and communication skills in dealing with people of different levels Flexible and willing to travel Project management Facilitation skill Fluent mandarin required, basic oral English , and solid English reading & writing Ability to travel up to 60% (Adjusted based on Sales region) 任职条件:  Same as above

Are you looking for a job in Wuhan? Vidoukin is hiring an After-sales spare parts Manager.   Job Qualifications: Bachelor degree or above, major in mechanical/electrical/automobile or marketing related. 3years+ of experience in spare parts or marketing related to OEMs, and work experience in new energy vehicles is preferred. Understand vehicle structure and spare parts composition related knowledge, and understand national after-sales spare parts policies. Possess project management experience and team management experience. Negotiation skills, good language communication skills and teamwork spirit.  Job Responsibilities: Formulation of company’s spare parts business model plan, lead its promotion, and sign related contracts. Spare parts business management, perfect and optimize spare parts business workflow. Put forward the requirements for spare parts system development and promoting the completion of spare parts system development. Managing the spare parts business team and promoting the completion of various tasks on time. Promoting the achievement of various KPIs in the spare parts business.  Seize this opportunity by contacting Nordan at nordan.obrecht@vidoukin.com   #jobs #careers #hr #hiring #recruitment #humanresources #manager #management

About GLOBALFOUNDRIES  GLOBALFOUNDRIES is a leading full-service semiconductor foundry providing a unique combination of design, development, and fabrication services to some of the world’s most inspired technology companies. With a global manufacturing footprint spanning three continents, GLOBALFOUNDRIES makes possible the technologies and systems that transform industries and give customers the power to shape their markets. GLOBALFOUNDRIES is owned by Mubadala Investment Company. For more information, visit www.globalfoundries.com  Introduction  The account sales will need handle many customers- fabless IC design house in China, be responsible for engaging with new and existing customers, finding out new biz opportunity and growing business in GF; The person need take the ownership to co-work closely with internal SBU, pricing, planning, fab team, etc to drive business growth, need engage with assigned customers, close the design win with proper sales tactical strategy and maintain long-term relationship with key potential customers. Also be responsible for driving design wins into production, achieving the yearly Sales revenue target and overall business growth in China with deep understanding of China semiconductor industry, main fabless players, etc.  As sales person, host customer visit, arrange meeting, travel frequently are all necessary.  Your Job Reporting to Key Account Manager and help manage existing customer accounts Maintain customer relationship, find out new business opportunity with existing and new customers Support managing channel business development Support initiating pricing proposal, arranging internal alignment meetings and maintaining salesforce, quotation, forecast system Work with internal engineer team to provide the best solutions to meet customers’ requirements Facilitates communication between customers and Fab to ensure all business requirements are met in areas of product performance information, and evaluates design requirements to determine whether they fit with GLOBALFOUNDRIES capabilities Ability to make technical presentations to potential and existing customers is preferred Work closely with FEs, Customer Service Representatives, and Administration as a team to communicate information and maximize GLOBALFOUNDRIES customer satisfaction Other Responsibilities Perform all activities in a safe and responsible manner and support all Environmental, Health, Safety & Security requirements and programs Required Qualifications 1-5 years of working experience in semiconductor as engineer, Foundry PIE or product engineer is preferred Good English speaking /writing skills Experience in handling salesforce, Kinaxis system is preferred Customer oriented and result driven Passion to sell Good communication skills Preferred Qualifications Bachelor or Master in Electrical Engineering, Material Science, etc GLOBALFOUNDRIES is an equal opportunity employer, cultivating a diverse and inclusive workforce. We believe having a multicultural workplace enhances productivity, efficiency and innovation whilst our employees feel truly respected, valued and heard.  As an affirmative employer, all qualified applicants are considered for employment regardless of age, ethnicity, marital status, citizenship, race, religion, political affiliation, gender, sexual orientation and medical and/or physical abilities.  All offers of employment with GLOBALFOUNDRIES are conditioned upon the successful completion of background checks, medical screenings as applicable and subject to the respective local laws and regulations.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  岗位职责： 敏锐的商业嗅觉，通过顾问式销售，准确了解客户需求，帮助客户梳理业务 痛点和需求，挖掘潜在需求和商机； 制定销售计划和策略，完成销售指标，负责商务谈判，合同签订、回款等事 项； 快速接触关键用户，洞察行业招聘趋势，用户业务痛点及原因； 从客户业务出发，和客户共同讨论解决方案； 善于进行销售阶段的精细化管理，对项目进行有效推进； 协调实施及CSM团队帮助客户落地成功计划，和客户建立长期、双赢的合作 关系。 及时收集客户的反馈，竞争对手的市场动态，协助公司制定对应市场策略。 任职资格: 全日制统招本科及以上学历； 5年以上销售经验，有B2B软件或SaaS相关产品销售经验者优先，有企业应 用系统（BI，Big Data，APM，ERP，CRM，HR）销售经验者优先； 熟悉B2B采购流程，有学习能力并运用常用的销售方法和技巧，如解决方案 销售、顾问式销售等； 具备良好销售技巧与谈判能力， 具备一定的市场分析及判断能力； 尊重与遵守公司业务管理规范，执行力强，为人正直； 注重效率，具备管理多个工作及项目的能力，管理时间、精力和优先级的能 力； 敏捷的学习能力，目标感强，对新事物的好奇心，强烈的影响愿望和目标意 识； 能够快速掌握行业新方向、新产品或解决方案，能适应高强度、快节奏的工 作环境。

What We Offer  1、达成公司分配的各项业务指标。0.75  2、按公司规定完成每日客户拜访及提交相关报告（访问报告、访问信息表、每周工作计划、项目清单等）。0  3、在规定区域内主动寻找潜在客户，维护和发展客户关系。0  4、以客户为导向，充分了解客户需求，并为客户提供相应的产品及解决方案; 收集客户对产品、服务的意见和建议并反馈给公司。0  5、协调客户与售后服务部门的工作，以提高客户满意度。0.05  null6、充分调动公司的资源，制订有竞争力的行动计划。0.03  7、按公司批准的销售条款及交易价格进行销售，进行有赢利的销售。0.02  8、追踪订单的执行情况，确保及时交货及货款回笼。0.05  9、收集市场和竞争对手信息，以便公司正确预测市场，制定销售策略。0.05  10、上级交代的其他任务。0.05  Tasks And Qualifications  学历:  Education 大专 College 专业  Major  工作经验:  Work Experience 工作年限  1-3年 1 Year -3 Years 要求  Demand  通用技能:  General Skill 团队合作 Teamwork  人际交往 Interpersonal Skills  商业敏感度 Business Acumen  分析能力 Analytical Thinking  说服性沟通 Persuasive Communication  专业知识-技能  Professional Skill 具备产品知识  具备FLT行业知识  具备商业能力  具备解决问题的能力  以目标为导向的项目管理  英语能力:  English Skill 相关证书要求Relevant Certificate  读写Read&Write  一般 Normal 听说Listen&Speak  计算机能力:  Computer Skill 熟悉Office办公系列软件

At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.  At EY, Managed Services (MS) is a significant part of our business, comprising more than $4b in revenue with major clients across the globe. We help clients with people based, asset based and integrated solutions, leveraging our deep sector and domain expertise to deliver enhanced value to our clients. In MS we are also ambitious, seeking to more than double our success in the future. Join us in this newly created role and you’ll be right at the heart of the action, directly engaging with clients, influencers and deal makers in ways that will impact EY, our clients and people, as well as your own career.  The opportunity  As the Asia-Pacific Managed Services Client Executive (CE), you will ensure that EY invests in the right opportunities and drive innovation in the right areas across Service Lines and markets. You will achieve this by being in the market, talking to clients about their evolving needs and driving a portfolio of campaigns for priority Managed Services solutions within EMEIA.  Your Key Responsibilities Support the Asia-Pacific MS and Asia-Pacific Solution/Offering leaders to develop and execute Managed Services’ to go market plans specifically in the areas of Risk Management and Financial / Tax Transformation Execute on the MS go to market strategy across Asia-Pacific that is utilised by Area and Regional teams to identify, design, develop with clients, and execute high quality MS pursuits Drive new and existing qualified business opportunities and maximise new sales and cross sell opportunities Experience in selling solutions that are based on a global delivery model capability Foster and maintain relationships across target buyers within strategic clients Develop and maintain partner and vendor relationships Collaborate with our aligned sales community to communicate and promote strategic solutions internally Support Asia-Pacific /regional/solution leaders with the development MS GTM programmes and monitor progress – comprising awareness development, solution prioritisation, campaign design and development, client engagement and pursuit execution. Skills and attributes for success You will have experience of business development, solution selling and the complexities of managed services and Digital Transformation deals within professional services or a similar technology organisation Experience in delivery sales and customers outcomes across an internal matrix organisation as well as multiple customer stakeholders The influencing skills to successfully collaborate with senior client and EY stakeholders Demonstrated success working in a matrix environment The ability to effectively forecast, review projection of performance and targets  To qualify for the role, you must have Bachelor’s Degree with an advanced degree preferred  Ideally, you’ll also have 12+ years of experience executing complex and large managed service sales deals focused on Risk Solutions (e.g. Cyber Security, Third Party Risk Management, Internal Audit) and Financial Transformation (ideally in Tax systems and processes), preferably in a partnership/professional services or technology provider environment Experience in a leadership capacity in a managed services environment Experience structuring , managing and closing multimillion deals Board presentation experience or experience as a board member Knowledge and understanding of outsourcing and offshoring operating and cost/pricing models for managed services  What We Look For Professionals who possess the skills and attributes to drive transformational performance across a portfolio of accounts and solutions Expert client facing and client relationships skills; sustained high-impact c-suite relationships Expertise in the Managed Services field including knowledge of market and industry dynamics Strong content expertise (technical/sector). An innovative and creative mindset Experience in a matrix organization Comfortable managing through ambiguity and complexity, while working in a virtual setting  What Working At EY Offers Exciting work building out a key offering, working a team of like-minded professionals Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues around Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you  If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.  The Exceptional EY Experience. It’s Yours To Build.  EY | Building a better working world  EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.  Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.  Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

description: 工作职责:  该职位旨在根据外部系统，深入市场品类的发展情况，竞争品牌的产品/活动动向，电商消费人群的分析以及给出合理报告建议。 结合内部系统，分析内部产品进货数据，每周/天GMV趋势，库存等业务报告，并能结合外部情况给出帮助业务增长的洞察力分析。  主要工作职责： 定时发布品类业务分析报告，结合DIAL系统，尼尔森市场报告，阿里妈妈等数据来给出分析 给出品类的发展趋势报告，并能结合业务情况给出生意增长点的深入分析，来帮助业务增长 任职条件:  基本技能/经验/能力要求： 本科或以上学历 3年以上相关经验，有品类管理或数据分析管理最佳 优先技能/经验/能力： 敏锐的数据分析能力，以及解决问题的思考和行动能力 熟练应用电脑及OFFICE 软件 有良好的英语基础及语言处理能力

Company Description  With a 1200-strong workforce, ITK Engineering GmbH is an internationally renowned technology company that sets itself apart with its exceptional expertise in digitalization, electrification, automation and connectivity of systems. Since 2017, the company has been a one hundred percent subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH. Come join a globally expanding technology partner and help shape your future through innovative strength, high quality standards and a passion for new technologies.  ITK Engineering GmbH 成立于1994年，总部在德国，并在北美、日本等国家和地区设有分部，业务遍及汽车、工业、航空、非道路用车、轨道交通和医疗等多个行业领域，致力于为客户量身定制功能软件开发、系统仿真模型开发及软件系统工程测试验证和咨询等灵活的软件技术解决方案  Job Description Sales of engineering services to external and Bosch internal customers. Main business fields: powertrain, chassis control and driver assistance, vehicle systems. Key tasks Acquisition of engineering projects. Acquisition of new customers while building up a close personal relationship with the customer. Commercial negotiation, contracting and accounts receivable. Close cooperation with project managers and technical experts in the BEG organization. Support of the development of new business fields. Qualifications Commercial sales experience. Technical background related to Bosch Engineering's business fields. Independent work attitude. Strategic thinking. Persistence in following up business opportunities with customers and internally. English language skills. Additional Information 该岗位内部推荐奖金为人民币5,000元整（仅限博世内部员工申请），具体请参见《博世中国内部推荐政策》 Internal Referral bonus of this vacancy: RMB 3,000 (Valid only for Bosch associates). For the detailed regulation, please refer to Bosch China Internal Referral Policy

description: Discover a world of opportunities. #HumanChemistry  See what chemistry can do for your career: careers.evonik.com  Exploring opportunities. Growing together.  VACANCY REFERENCE NUMBER 150742  Customer Service Representative  Location: China : Shanghai Xinzhuang  Function: Logistics & Supply Chain Management  Career Level: Graduates (< 2 years)  Legal Entity: Evonik Specialty Chemicals (Shanghai) Co., Ltd  Business Line: Catalysts  What We Offer  You will work on exciting and challenging topics together with a team in an ultra-modern, innovative and creative environment. Intensive on-the-job training with expert colleagues guarantees you will quickly become familiar with your duties and perform them independently. Performance related pay and the opportunity for personal and professional development are of course part of the package. Since 2009 Evonik Industries AG has been certified as a family-friendly company by the German Hertie Foundation.  Click here to learn more about Evonik from our employees  Responsibilities  Manages and processes customer orders as part of OtC process Follow up OtC procedure of business line. Ensure all customer orders are taken and processed accurately and efficiently as well as ensure order processing is fully in compliance with Evonik policies and related international and national governing law and regulations. Meet and exceed customer expectations through successful customer relationship. Meet the demand of customer requirements through appropriate sense of urgency, with competing priorities. Executes precious metal and refining services business: Follow up guidance of business line to manage key raw material, precious metal via weight account in SAP Monitors accounts receivables and assures timely payment Aligns on comprehensive SAP R11 topics on Smart Material division and secures implementation in the business line  Requirements  Working experience in customer service function is a must Key user for SAP transaction related to sales order and purchase order Strong communication skill with internal and external customers The ability to manage conflicting priorities, prioritizing both customer and company requirements while acting in a professional manner Strong capability to capture customers' need and manage customer relationship Mature, earnest, hardworking and with good analytical skills. Good oral and written English  Your Application  To ensure the fastest process of your application and to protect the environment, please apply online via our careers portal at https://careers.evonik.com.  VACANCY REFERENCE NUMBER 150742  Please note that Evonik will not accept any unsolicited application documents sent by staffing firms. Evonik works in conjunction with preferred service providers and will not pay any fee to staffing firms in the absence of an appropriate framework agreement. Should Evonik receive a candidate profile from a staffing firm with which it has no framework agreement, and should this candidate subsequently be considered in the recruitment process or offered employment, no claims from the staffing firm will be entertained in this regard.

Competency certification, Probation Review, otherwise he or she will not be able to meet the full time employee’s requirement. - Communicate with the external clients and partners in a professional way, and also ensure effective communication and great cooperation with internal colleagues (Among same and different function/ store/region). - Keep inventory full and neat (if applicable). - Other Responsibilities: Perform other related duties as assigned, based on the business need. Requirements ork experience in retail, industry and key account sales with proven track record to meet or exceed targets and goals. - Highly appreciate Company culture and value. - Strong communication and customer service experience required. - Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. - Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. - Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. - Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. - Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry and key account sales experience preferred. - During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is required to pass the probationary period. - Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 产品专家  主要职责 保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。 通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友宣传特斯拉。 收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销售主管完成门店的销售目标。 对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。 认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。 建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。 通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和要求。 和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地区、跨地区之间）。 保持库存充足和整洁（如适用）。 员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。 职位要求 零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验； 对企业文化高度认可。 出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。 良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的变革。 深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。 能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。 持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

Job Description  Manager, FMCG Client Engagement  About This Job  Retail Measurement Services is a syndicated service to track the movement of consumer goods from manufacturer to the consumer through the retail trade, in which clients would be able to track sales, distribution and marketing factors for markets and brands over time. This role is to lead Client Engagement and One NielsenIQ Business growth independently; Coach and develop team.  Responsibilities  Commercial Management: Meet NielsenIQ Revenue OP, and independently manage pipeline and revenue conversion; Based on iconic Retail Tracking Service, able to initiate and confirm new projects by collaborating with cross practice teams to provide One NielsenIQ solutions to client business issues, develop strategic initiatives for each client. Independently manage key clients including contract renewals, wins concessions in Negotiations and deliver sales pitch and presentation independently Oversee the management of assigned research projects including proposal preparation, pitching and delivery of final results. Client Engagement Maintain and Develop client relationship for both local and MNC clients, providing insightful & actionable business advice according to clients' business issues. Build client relationship and rapport with local decision makers, ensure maximum client satisfaction Develop business opportunities and manage JBP & account plan for clients. Able to present publicly for client webinar, forum or industry summit Data Insights And Analytics Providing FMCG industrial insights and sales-oriented data analysis based on client’s business questions, including but not limited to industry and category trends, competition landscape, execution optimization, etc. Strategic thinking to improve the quality of ideas by skillfully analyzing, assessing, and reconstructing ideas and identifying problems and issues. a Little Bit About You  As a Client Engagement role, you will empower and enable the team to collaborate successfully with Practices, work with internally client delivery team and external clients to grow business. Challenges self and team to build high-performing teams and imports/exports talent considering the best interests of the business and the development goals of individuals. Uses coaching, mentoring and sponsorship to drive associate career growth.  Qualifications Over 7 years research or marketing experience in leading Market Research/FMCG/Retailing companies A consultant mindset in problem diagnosis and actionable solution proposed based on data and data analysis Strong commercial sense with in-depth understanding of trade marketing strategy Good logical thinking and analytical skills Good presentation skill Fluent English level in both oral and written About NielsenIQ  NielsenIQ is a global measurement and data analytics company that provides the most complete and trusted view available of consumers and markets worldwide. We provide consumer packaged goods manufacturers and retailers with accurate, actionable information and insights and a complete picture of the complex and changing marketplace that companies need to innovate and grow. Our approach marries proprietary Nielsen data with other data sources to help clients around the world understand what’s happening now, what’s happening next, and how to best act on this knowledge.We like to be in the middle of the action. That’s why you can find us at work in over 90 countries, covering more than 90% of the world’s population. For more information, visit www.niq.com.  NielsenIQ is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action-Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, protected veteran status or any other protected class.
